The sag measurement module was designed to perform the performance evaluation.

title: V2X 통신 및 LSTM을 활용한 주변 차량 경로 예측 알고리즘
keyword: Machine learning(머신러닝),Distance prediction(거리예측),V2X Communication(차량통신),LSTM(장단기 메모리유닛),Path prediction(경로예측)
abstract: To bring the autonomous vehicle into the life, many researches are conducted on path prediction based on recognition sensors. Still there are many obstacles on recognition derived from the sensors’ costs and flood of their raw data. To solve the problems, V2X communication is considered to be the replacement or complementary component. On the prediction step, machine learning is emerging as one of the best method for the path prediction. In this paper, we proposed distance prediction which is the basic of path prediction of upcoming 3 seconds, based on data derived from mono camera and V2X communication and machine learning algorithm.

title: V2X 통신과 Camera Sensor를 통한 주변차량 차선변경 예측 알고리즘
keyword: Lane change prediction(차선 변경 예측),V2X(Vehicle to Everything),BSM(Basic Safety Message),SVM(Support Vector Machine),RF(Random Forest)
abstract: PreScan simulator is a simulation platform used in the automotive industry for the development of ADAS based on sensor technologies such as radar, rider, camera, and GPS. PreScan is also used to design and evaluate V2V and V2I communications applications and autonomous driving applications. In this study, PreScan simulator is used to collect information predicting lane change of vehicle through camera sensor and V2X communication data. After that, the data collected using Pycharm will be trained to find out how it correlates with the factors necessary for lane change, and the predicted lane change probability is compared and analyzed with the accuracy of prediction of SVM(Support Vector Machine) and RF techniques.

title: 차량 기본 장착용 NG e-Call 단말기 제어 보드 성능 시험
keyword: eCall(긴급구난체계),NG e-Call(차세대긴급구난체계),e-Call IVS(e-Call 단말기),C-ITS(지능형교통체계),Vehicle Crash(차량사고),Context-Aware(상황인식),AECS(자동비상통보시스템),MSD(최소사고정보),ESD(확장사고정보),PSAP(긴급구난관제센터)
abstract: This paper introduces a result to perform the NG e-Call IVS control board performance analysis with collision testing and real-driving. The NG e-Call IVS control board has main features such as real-time data analyzing of vehicle and its sensors, automatic and manual vehicle accident triggering, MSD or ESD message generating. We had tested the NG e-Call IVS control board’s functions of e-Call Mode Processor, Crash Detection Algorithm, Sensor Data Analysis, Vehicle Accident Threshold under real vehicle collision, rollover, real-driving and so on. We had proved the stable performance of the proposed the NG e-Call IVS control board thru the result from this evaluation.

title: 실차 테스트를 통한 ACC 기능의 추종 민감도에 따른 응답시간의 선형성에 대한 연구
keyword: Acc(적응형 정속주행),Sensitivity(민감도),Field test(실차 시험),Response time(응답시간),Cut-in(컷-인),Cut-out(컷-아웃),Proving ground(시험장)
abstract: In this paper, we study the response time according to the sensitivity of ACC function in automated driving technology. Research is actively conducted to get confidence in autonomous driving of passengers. In order to reduce the rider’s concern about automated driving technology, it is necessary to show a linear relationship according to the setting mode. Accordingly, the scenario selected cut-in and cut-out scenarios to reflect the situation in which the driver may feel anxious. In addition, vehicle tests were conducted on the responsive mode and distance level that the driver can set. Experimental results show the nonlinear relationship of the follow-up response with sensitivity as a result of measuring the delay time of the response time.

title: ADAS 관련 국가별 NCAP 동향
keyword: Autonomous Driving(자율주행),ADAS(첨단운전자보조시스템),Global NCAP(글로벌신차평가프로그램),Euro NCAP(유럽신차평가프로그램),ANCAP(호주신차평가프로그램),ASEAN NCAP(동아시아신차평가프로그램),KNCAP(한국신차평가프로그램),JNCAP(일본신차평가프로그램),C-NCAP(중국신차평가프로그램),LATIN NCAP(남아메리카 신차평가프로그램),NHTSA(미국 도로교통안전국),IIHS(미국고속도로안전보험협회),Test Protocol(시험프로토콜),Assessment Protocol (평가프로토콜)
abstract: ADAS(첨단운전자보조시스템) 및 자율주행 기반기술인 AEB(자동긴급제동), FCW(전방충돌경고), LKA(차로이탈방지), LDW(차로이탈경고) 시스템은 전세계적으로 관련 법규가 강화되며, 상용화가 가속화되고 있는 추세이다. 이에 따라 신차안전성을 평가하는 각국의 NCAP(신차평가프로그램)의 ADAS 시험평가항목의 비중과 기여도가 높아지고 있다. 하지만, 각 국가별 NCAP 시험, 평가 프로토콜이 다소 차이가 있어 본 논문에서 국가별 NCAP 프로토콜을 비교, 분석하여 차이점과 동향을 알아보고자 한다.

title: 500㎾급 발전기용 LFG엔진에서 물분사에 의한 NOx 저감 특성 연구
keyword: LFG(Landfill gas, 매립지가스),Water injection(물분사),Intake port(흡기관),Injection timing(분사시기),NOx(질소 산화물),Water injection wetting(물분사 부착)
abstract: The purpose of this study is to investigate the characteristics of NOx emission reduction by injecting water into the intake port of internal combustion engine for 500㎾ generator using LFG fuel generated from landfill site. Injectors were mounted to each cylinder to control water injecting water into each intake port of 12 cylinder engine. The device was configured to control the start and end of the injection using the cam position signal of the engine so that the injection can be performed only during the intake valve opening period. When the water injection amount was 38 ㎎, the measured NOx reduction was 75%. As a result of measuring and confirming using a rig, it was confirmed that about 90% of the injected water was introduced into the cylinder as a result of measuring the water inflow rate in the combustion chamber. Using the amount of water supplied into the cylinder, it was found that the temperature reduction calculated by the ideal adiabatic condition was about 10 degrees at maximum.

title: 자율주행 자동차를 위한 정밀도로지도 활용성 검증 = HD Map Usability Verification for Autonomous Car
keyword: 자율주행,정밀도로지도,위치추정,일렉트로닉 호라이즌,시뮬레이터,Autonomous driving,High Definition(HD) map,Localization,Electronic horizon,Simulator
abstract: This paper presents the viability of a high-definition(HD) map for fully autonomous cars. The HD map stores driving information that can be used by autonomous cars to address sensor-only limitations. To confirm the viability of the HD map for autonomous cars, this paper utilized four approaches. First, localization was used to match the point cloud data of the LiDAR sensor with those in the HD map. Second, an electronic horizon was extracted from the road geometry and traffic regulations in the HD map. Third, the acceptability of the HD map was verified after importing the HD map into the simulator. Lastly, autonomous driving simulation and experiments on trajectory tracking were performed to ensure the reliability of the HD map. These approaches demonstrated that the HD map was capable of handling perception limitations and allowed fully autonomous driving.

title: 통합 IVI 시스템 HMI 사용성 평가
keyword: Usability Evaluation(사용성 평가),IVI integrated System(통합 시스템),Customization(맞춤형 HMI),Personalization(적응형 HMI),AVN(AVN),Cluster(클러스터)
abstract:
최근 차량 내 클러스터 게이지, AVN 등의 개별 시스템의 통합화 기술 적용으로 분리되어 있던 정보를 한 디스플레이에 통합하여 표시하는 추세를 보이고 있다. 벤츠 A-Class 2019와 폭스바겐 Touareg 2019는 AVN 화면에서 클러스터 정보를 편집하는 기능을 제공하고 있으며 테슬라 Model 3는 AVN에서 기존 클러스터 정보 및 차량설정(도어/위도우 잠금 기능, 와이퍼 기능 등) 표시하고 있다. 이와 같이 통합시스템을 적용하는 차량에서 디스플레이를 통해 표시 및 처리해야 하는 정보가 증가하고 있으나 통합시스템을 활용한 기능 및 기능의 사용성에 대한 연구는 미흡하다.
  본 연구는 통합시스템의 적용에 따라서 사용자에게 필요한 기능을 제안하였다. 3가지 컨셉(접근성 강화, 맞춤형 HMI, 적응형 HMI)을 바탕으로 통합 검색, 통합 즐겨찾기, 제안 기능을 도출하였다. 기능의 사용성 평가는 총 32명을 대상으로 Within Subject Design으로 진행하였으며 제안된 기능의 사용성 검증을 위하여 최신 AVN 적용 차량(그랜저)을 기준 차량으로 제안된 기능을 구현한 키오스크(클러스터 및 AVN) 간 비교 평가를 수행하였다. 실험 피험자의 과제 수행시간을 측정하였고, 기능 조작에 대한 기억용이성, 일관성, 직관성, 전반적 만족도를 평가하였다.
  평가 결과, 통합 검색 및 통합 즐겨 찾기의 과제수행 시간은 기준차량과 비교, 유의한 차이를 보였다. 또한, 동일한 피험자가 3번이상 반복하여 평가한 제안기능에서는 사용횟수가 증가함에 따라 수행 시간이 감소함을 확인할 수 있었다. 결과적으로, 통합 시스템을 적용한 디스플레이에서 제안된 기능의 효용성을 검증할 수 있었으며, 향후 일부 제안기능의 부족한 부분을 추가 연구 및 검증을 통해 보완한다면, 통합시스템에서 다양하고 많은 정보/컨텐츠를 사용자가 안전하고 효과적으로 사용하는데 본 연구가 기여할 것으로 기대된다.

title: EPS로직을 이용한 SBW 반력 제어에 관한 연구
keyword: SBW(스티어 바이 와이어),Reaction force(반력),EPS(전동스티어링)
abstract:
Vehicle steering technology, which is currently being mass produced, uses a steering column to steer the wheels with the linear motion of the OBJ connected to the carrier using a motor-driven actuator connected to the steering column or rack gearbox. In this method, the driver’s manual torque is directly connected to the vehicle’s wheel based on the reliability of the structural connection of the mechanical device. However, in order to implement the active steering technology in the future, SBW is necessary. With the development of various sensors, the new steering technology of the vehicle has developed into the active steering technology of the vehicle by using the sensor for processing software of the recognition information, and the decision subject of the steering has been moved from the person to the ECU. Therefore, Unnecessary time of driver’s operating has increased and the steering column will be a device that measures the steering angle and provides a reaction to the driver in some situations where driver intervention is required. In the present situation that the driver has to intervene in a certain level of steering prior to the fully autonomous driving, in order to make the driver feel the current level of steering feeling for the products driven by the communication using the wire, not only securing the performance of the actuator, A reaction force column device capable of generating a steering feel of the steering wheel by the driving condition is required. In the case of the reaction force device, the motor torque is varied for each vehicle speed only for the purpose of assisting the driver. At this time, the column torque (Nm) sensed by the driver is measured, and this torque will be the reaction force in SBW. The reaction torque of SBW can be variously designed according to the type of reducer and conditions of use.
  In this study, the SBW reaction system using the torque sensor is designed to provide the steering feeling to the driver by using the EPS logic which is used in the past. The basic logic of EPS, torque loop assist, damping control, restoration control, is tuned to the SBW and the rack pulling force damping logic is added for natural movement when the steering wheel is released.

title: 소형 모터구동소자(FET)를 적용한 SBW 반력장치 ECU 연구
keyword: FET,ECU (Electronic Control Unit),EPS (Electronic Power Steering),SBW (Steer By Wire),Reaction force,Fully Redundant
abstract: As the commercialization of autonomous cars is nearing in the automotive industry, there is a great deal of discussion about the necessity of steering wheels of driver steering devices. Among the many discussions, there is an opinion that the driver’s intervention is required in the transition phase of autonomous driving, or the steering wheel is required for the driver who enjoys manual driving. In this case, the steering device is configured by SBW(Steering By Wire) to allow the steering wheel to be accommodated, thereby enabling both autonomous driving and manual driving. The SBW system consists of a reaction force that can make the driver’s steering feel and an actuator that enables steering. Then connect the two devices by wire (CAN). This helps reduce discomfort during driver steering. By replacing wires with Universal joints with wires, the steering and reaction devices can be accommodated. The reaction device allows the driver to feel the steering depending on the driving environment. In this study, the reaction force device was designed with redundancy. Even when the car breaks down, it minimizes the sense of heterogeneity and enables the car to run. Redundancy systems improve performance and fail / safe, but also increase the size and cost of the ECU. In order to improve fuel economy and optimize cost of vehicles, the reaction force ECU also needs to be miniaturized and optimized. In order to satisfy this problem, the miniaturized FET is applied to ECU. As a result, package optimization was possible by reducing the 2-board multilayer PCB of the existing ECU to 1 board PCB. In addition, production processes and costs can be significantly reduced, resulting in cost competitiveness.

title: MDPS 시스템 제어를 위한 모터 위치 제어 기반의 Cascade 제어기 설계
keyword: Motor driven power steering(전동식 동력 조향),Cascade Controller(직렬 제어),Motor Position Control(모터위치 제어)
abstract: This paper proposes a cascade controller based on a motor position control for MDPS systems. The proposed controller consists of a steering performance control and a motor position control. A system response from the driver’s torque to the column rotational position is a design reference of steering performance controller and the controller generates a motor position reference to achieve the pre-designed steering performance. The motor position controller adjusts the motor torque for tracking the motor position reference signal. This paper demonstrates simulations to reveal the performance of the proposed cascade controller.

title: 포인트 클라우드를 이용한 딥러닝 기반의 주행 가능 영역 및 차량 검출을 위한 의미론적 분할에 관한 연구
keyword: Deep Learning(딥러닝),LiDAR(라이다),Point Cloud(포인트 클라우드),Semantic Segmentation(의미론적 분할),Drivable Space Detection(주행 가능 영역 검출),Vehicle Detection(차량 검출)
abstract: In this paper, we propose a deep learning based semantic segmentation network for drivable space and static or dynamic vehicles detection using point cloud obtained 3D LiDAR. For input of the network, we generate 2D top view image of 3-channels using 3D point cloud information. The network for semantic segmentation consists of a fast and simple Fully Convolutional Neural Network (FCN). The dataset for learning uses the KITTI dataset, which is frequently used for autonomous driving experiments. And the ground truth used for training and evaluation is composed 5-classes: ‘background’, ‘road’, ‘car’, ‘van’, and ‘truck’. Our Experimental results verified that it is possible to detect the drivable space and vehicles for recognition of autonomous driving system at high inference speed.

title: 오토사 이식을 위한 친환경 제동 시스템의 프로토 소프트웨어 개발
keyword: Multi-core,Resource,iMEB(integrated Mobis Electronic Brake),PMSM(Permanent Magnet Synchronous Motor),VDC(Vehicle Dynamic Control)
abstract: The automobile industries is forecasted to struggle for researching and developing green vehicles such as EV(Electric Vehicle),HEV(Hybrid Electric Vehicle), PHEV(Plug-in HEV) and FCEV(Fuel Cell Vehicle). One of advantages with ECOfriendly vehicles is able to use regenerative braking force. It means that it increases energy efficiency with cooperative controls of regenerative braking to reduce the heat loss due to the friction brake. Therefore, Fuel cell brake system needs basically not only conventional brake function but support function for regenerative braking. In addition to, the safety system like a brake system be required more accurate and complicated software for its stability. As a result, the software of ECO-friendly brake system gets heavy and complex. This paper proposed the optimized proto software(SW) for fuel cell brake system. The proto SW’s architecture and compensation designs are proposed to preempt verified application SW and to reduce development duration without AUTOSAR platform. The proposed proto SW based on firmware is verified enough on the rig. Before migration with AUTOSAR platform SW, Application SW is able to be verified and confirmed under the proto SW. As a result, it makes to reduce SW development period because Application SW can be developed in parallel with AUTOSAR platform.

title: 미지입력관측기를 이용한 현가시스템의 상태 및 노면 추정
keyword: Suspension system (현가시스템),State and Road profile estimation (상태 및 노면 추정),Unknown input observer (미지입력 관측기),Quarter car (1/4 차량)
abstract: This paper proposes state and road estimation method by using the unknown input observer. In order to state estimate by using previous method such as Luenberger observer, known system input should be necessary. However, in the suspension system such as quarter car model, since unknown road input is included which can be considered disturbance of the system, state estimation cannot be achieved by using the previous method. Therefore, in the paper, not only system state but also road profile can be estimated by using the unknown input observer method. This method can be used for the vehicle suspension control design such as damping control or body motion control, in the future. The simulation and experimental results are presented to validate the proposed method.

title: 분할 코어를 적용한 EPS용 SPMSM의 공차에 따른 코깅 토크 분석
keyword: Cogging torque(코깅토크),EPS(전동식 파워 스티어링),Segmented-Core(분할코어),Tolerance(공차)
abstract: The Electric Power Steering(EPS) system is directly related to safety. So, the whole system is mechanically connected. Due to mechanical characteristics of the steering system, vibrations generated by the EPS motor are transmitted to the driver. Cogging torque is generated by the interaction between the permanent magnet and the slot structure. Cogging torque is one of the torque ripple components. This paper investigates the cogging torque according to manufacturing tolerance of SPMSM with Segmented-Core for EPS. First, manufacturing tolerances for each part of the motor will be introduced. Then, the harmonics of the cogging torque due to each manufacturing tolerance of the motor part are analyzed. Finally, by comparing the simulation result with test value, the validity of this study is demonstrated.

title: 기능통합 드라이브 액슬을 적용한 샤시모듈의 입력하중 기여도 분석 및 시스템 단위 조향성능에 대한 시험적 연구
keyword: Integrated Drive Axle(기능통합드라이브액슬),Load Contribution(하중분배),R&amp,H(승차감&amp,조향성능),Lateral Force(횡력),Kinematic(운동학),Compliance(컴플라이언스)
abstract: The Integrated drive axle developed by Hyundai WIA Company is more competitive in cost and weight than the 3rd generation corner module. Through this, the direction for developing R&H performance was prepared in the parts of the vehicle. However, considering the development process of the Full vehicle to achieve the efficiency of test evaluation at the development stage by verifying the correlation between the test at the system level and the actual vehicle, Existing test results have the disadvantage that they cannot be used to check the contribution of system change. To compensate for this, the contribution analysis of parts of load in chassis module was analyzed and this study was conducted as a basic step for analyzing the effects of the response of unit external force and the steering performance factor.

title: 마찰재 편마모 형상에 따른 브레이크 드래그 영향성 분석
keyword: CBS(Conventional Brake System),Brake System(브레이크 시스템),Pad Taper Wear(마찰재 편마모),Drag Torque(드래그 토크),DOE(실험계획)
abstract: Many vehicle manufactures are constantly trying to reduce brake drag. Brake drags are becoming an important factor in green cars. In order to reduce brake drag values, calipers, discs and rotors must be properly designed. Nevertheless, the brake drag increases with driving. It is estimated that the brake drag will increase as the brake pads wear. In this study, the effects of brake drag on the brake pad shape were analyzed. Six factors for the shape of the friction were selected and the DOE method was conducted. The main effects and interactions for each factor were analyzed.

title: 노킹 센서 위치 최적화에 관한 연구
keyword: Knock sensor (노크 센서),Experimental modal analysis (실험적 모드 해석),Knock frequency (노크 주파수),Frequency response function (주파수 응답 함수),Mode shape (모드 형상),Acoustic cavity resonance frequency (음향공동주파수)
abstract: The knock sensor is attached on engine cylinder block to detect abnormal engine combustion(knock) and to provide feedback to engine control unit(ECU). Then the ECU control abnormal engine combustion with control of ignition timing and etc. A generally used knock sensor is an accelerometer that detects cylinder block surface vibration and estimate the engine knock. The position of knock sensor is selected by measurement of knock signal at many cylinder block surfaces through trial and error. But engine cylinder block has many structural resonances. So the knock sensor signals don’t show reliable results because of the complex of engine combustion knock and cylinder block surface vibration. The purpose of this paper is to understand the characteristics of cylinder block vibration by experimental modal analysis and to optimize knock sensor position by combining of cylinder block dynamic behavior and calculated engine knock frequency.

title: 제조과정을 고려한 브레이크 실드의 진동 피로 해석
keyword: Vibration fatigue(진동피로),Fatigue analysis(피로해석),Manufacturing deviation(제조편차),Thickness distribution(두께분포),Stamping(스탬핑)
abstract: CAE based durability assessment is used in vehicle development widely to reduce cost and time for physical testing. Recently there is a trend to consider manufacturing variation in CAE process to advance reliability of the analysis result. Vehicle chassis components should withstand various loads by wheel movement during vehicle operation. Especially, brake shield is very sensitive to resonance effect due to its thin and planar shape. Durability assessment of brake shield should include vibrational load in frequency domain as well as static load. This paper describes vibration fatigue analysis of brake shield considering manufacturing process that includes thickness variation from stamping and assembly condition.

title: 동일 시스템 차량에서 Watt linkage 특성에 대한 연구
keyword: Lane Changing(차선변경),ISO(국제표준화기구),R.C.H(Roll Center Height),L.F.D(Lateral force deflection),R.C.C(Rear cornering compliance),Kinematic(기구학적),Subjective Test(주관평가)
abstract: The stable behavior of the vehicle is one of the important factors in order to reduce driver anxiety and increasing vehicle satisfaction. This purpose of this thesis is to study the watt linkage, which is included in the suspension system and it helps with the lateral behavior. The behavior and the basic characteristic values of the vehicle that have the watt linkage parts or don’t have watt linkage parts have been studied in the same suspension package. In this study, the design requirements of this part were studied through FEM analysis. Furthermore, the study on the effects of the behavior performance on the cases mounted to the vehicle through the Vehicle Dynamics CAE was conducted. Based on the results of the above study, several times test were conducted in accordance with ISO test methods to determine the level of performance in the actual vehicle by making the prototype. The unique characteristics of the vehicle were analyzed through the Vehicle Dynamics CAE. It was able to study the performance of a vehicle with Watt linkage in same suspension systems.

title: 용접 비드 끝단 타입에 따른 내구 영향도 연구
keyword: Welding Bead(용접 비드),Suspension(서스펜션),Weld Strength(용접 강도),Weld Durability(용접 내구력),Welding end type(용접 끝단 형상)
abstract: This paper introduce how the welding bead end type affects the strength and durability of product. Welding is a functional part that connects each metal panels and endure stimulus from the tire wheel. Weld Strengh & Durability is the most important performance for the stability of the suspension vehicle. In this paper, weld strength & durability are compared according to the welding end type and based on the results, we proposed the optimal welding end type.

title: CVJ 절각력 저감을 위한 설계인자 민감도 분석 및 최적화 연구
keyword: Constant Velocity Joint(등속조인트),Bending Resistance(절각력),Funnel Angle(퍼넬각),Offset Radius(옵셋반경),Offset Angle(옵셋각)
abstract: Due to the high performance of the constant velocity joint, various problems may arise in terms of the function and strength of the constant velocity joint. Due to the miniaturization, strength degradation may occur. High keratosis of the joints can lead to problems of functional problem strength degradation. In this study, we discuss the articulation (functional) problems of constant velocity joints that can be caused by high keratinization. We have applied a design concept called angle offset to implement a high-angle joint. The angle offset can compensate for the strength by ensuring sufficient groove depth even under high angled conditions. However, there is a disadvantage in that machining is difficult and it is not easy to match the exact dimensions. As a result, a high friction force between the initial ball and the groove is generated, thereby causing a high bending resistance. High friction forces reduce the efficiency of the joint and can be a source of durability problems. In this study, the design factors affecting the bending resistance are derived and the sensitivity is analyzed to derive the factors that can minimize the bending resistance. The optimization technique uses DOE and the strength analysis will also confirm the strength robustness of the model.

title: 파워트레인 마운트 단품 시험 효율 및 정확도를 높이기 위한 다축 동시 인가 블록 사이클 시험법 개발
keyword: 파워트레인 마운팅 시스템(Powertrain Mounting System),주행하중측정 (RLDA, Road Load Data Acquisition),멀티 블록 사이클 시험(Multi Block Cycle Test),MAST(Multi Axial Simulation Table)
abstract: There have been two types of powertrain mounting component test. They are single axis block cycle test and multi-axial real time test. In case of single axis block cycle test, the test schedule is short and simple test rig set up but the correlation between the vehicle test or the subsystem module test is not so good. In case of multi axial real time test, the correlation is better than single axis test but the test schedule is longer than single axis test. It is needed to develop new test method for the short test schedule with the better correlation. This study shows new test method(multi axial block cycle test) can have similar failure mode and test result with current test method.

title: EPS DC Motor 보호를 위한 설계 방안 연구 - Software 제어에 의한 -
keyword: EPS,DC MOTOR,Control Software
abstract: A new point of view in Brushed DC Motor on EPS is proposed by Software Control, which is an upgrade protecting method based on the principle of current accumulation. As a result of the application of Software Control, this paper shows to achieve steering performance and prevent the Motor from heat loss simultaneously.

title: 랙 타입 MDPS용 다극모터 설계
keyword: MDPS(전동조향),Rack Type(랙타입),Motor(전동기),NVH(소음진동)
abstract:
This paper describes the cost reduction and light weight design for BLAC motor, one of the core part of Rack type MDPS. Motor cost reduction and weight reduction methods include improved motor power density, material modification of motor component, and optimization of motor design parameters.
  In order to improve the power density, we designed a 10-pole and 12-slot structure with a higher power density than the 6-pole and 9-slot structure. The 10-pole and 12-slot structure was optimized by the experimental design method.
  On the other hand, the 10-pole and 12-slot structure is inferior in noise characteristics compared to 6-pole and 9-slot structure, and requires an NVH characteristic analysis. The NVH analysis was performed by reflecting the designed motor structure and the calculated electromagnetic force into the MDPS system modeling. This achieves NVH performance equivalent to that of a 6-pole 9-slot motor.

title: DMD 헤드램프 차량 적용 효과에 대한 연구
keyword: DMD(Digital Micro-mirror Device),DLP,ADB,Pixel Light,고분해능(High resolution),Micro-Mirror
abstract: Adaptive Driving Beam (ADB) is one of most famous technology in automotive headlamp. In a few years, there are many ADB systems were developed such as Matrix, Multi-Beam and DMD headlamp. Among these technologies, DMD headlamp is classified as a high-end technology because it could control hundreds of thousands of micro-mirror. This paper discussed the effects of DMD Headlamp and future development direction.

title: 사출 크래시패드용 스크림 인서트 PAB 슈트 개발
keyword: Scrim(스크림),Crash pad(크래시패드),PAB(승객석에어백),PAB 슈트(승객석에어백 슈트)
abstract: 본 논문은 사출 크래시패드의 에어백 전개부의 강건화 구조 개발 및 검증 과정에 대해 설명하고자 한다. 미국 신차평가제도(NCAP)가 강화됨에 따라 요구되는 충돌성이 향상되고 있다. 이에 따라 전개압이 증가된 승객석에어백이 장착되는 PAB 슈트 구조 역시 강건화 필요성이 대두되고 있다. 본 개발에서는 힌지부에 스크림을 인서트 사출하여 PAB 슈트를 제작하였다. 스크림은 메쉬 타입으로 제작된 직물이다. 제품의 성능을 검증하기 위해 각 온도 조건에서 전개 평가를 실시하였다. 평가 결과를 분석하여, 의도된 전개 거동을 확보하기 위해 힌지 구조, 스코링 패턴, 소재 등 다양한 요인을 변경하였다. 이와 같은 방법으로 각 요인별 영향도를 확인하였으며, 이를 통해 최적 조건 도출 및 성능 검증을 완료하였다.

title: LED 헤드램프용 Duct 설계에 대한 연구
keyword: LED Headlamp,LED 방열시스템,Fan,Duct
abstract: For headlamps with multiple LEDs, a heat dissipation concept using a fan and a duct is applied. In this paper, we review the configuration conditions for the optimal design of the fan-duct system as a heat dissipation concept for a multimodule LED and introduce the process of applying it to the mass production design.

title: 전장부품 열을 활용한 전기버스 통합 열관리 시스템 개발
keyword: Electric Bus(전기버스),Thermal Management System(통합 열관리 시스템),Heat Pump(히트펌프),AMESim,Heating COP (coefficient of performance, 난방 성능계수)
abstract: The objective of this study is to improve the one charge mileage of the electric bus using the wasted heat from electric devices and batteries. The heat pump, using R-407, is designed for heating a passengers’ compartment by using discharged energy from the coolant of batteries. The traditional heating system using the coolant is combined with the cooling system for the electric devices. AMESim is the 1D simulation tools using the bond graph theory. The thermal management system for electric bus is designed by using AMESim model and investigated with the vehicle test.

title: 자율주행용 고정밀 지도를 위한 차로단위 교통정보 제공방안에 관한 연구
keyword: Traffic Information(교통정보),Lane-Unit(차로단위),Standard Node Link(표준노드링크),Autonomous Driving(자율주행),High Precision Map(고정밀지도)
abstract: This paper propose a method to provide lane-based traffic information by improving the previously constructed node-link system. The link structure set along the centerline of the road has limitations to support the route planning and route guidance of lane level for autonomous driving. Therefore, this study analyzes domestic and international standards and research cases, and applied the method to add / expand lane links to the existing node-link so as to be compatible with the existing node-link system. The additional and extended feature consists of seven attributes: LANE_ID, LINK_ID, F_NODE, T_NODE, GROUP_ID, LANE_NO, and LANES. It can be linked with previous node-link system through by foreign key. Moreover, additional and extended can be possible to provide traffic information of lane level.

title: LPL EGR 사이클론 응축수 분리기의 설계 변수에 따른 해석적 연구
keyword: CFD(전산유체해석),HPL(고압라인),LPL(저압라인),Condensate(응축수),Separator(분리장치),EGR System(배기가스재순환시스템)
abstract: The EGR systems are classified as HPL and LPL EGR ones depending on the supply position of the recirculated exhaust gas. Recently, LPL EGR system with high EGR rate is increasing. in order to cope with the exhaust gas regulation to be strengthened. Depending on the operating conditions of the charge air cooler and the engine, strong acidic condensate is generated inside it. Condensate causes charge air cooler corrosion and engine problems. Therefore, it is necessary to preliminarily separate the condensed water from the exhaust gas outlet of the EGR cooler. Cyclone condensate separator is a device that separates condensate from exhaust gas through rotary flow by centrifugal force. In this study, the separation performance of the cyclone condensate separator according to the cylinder diameter and cone length was compared and analyzed over for several models by CFD numerical analysis.

title: 단면 변화를 통한 범퍼 빔의 저속 충돌 성능 개선
keyword: Bumper Beam(범퍼 빔),Low-velocity Collision test(저속 충돌 시험),Section deformation(단면 변형),Plastic(소성),Structural optimization(구조 최적화)
abstract: This study aims to improve the weight and stability by optimizing the structure of bumper system. Prior to the section design, ANSYS low speed collision simulations were performed for each material speed, and thickness using a closed D-type bumper beam model and parameters affecting the bumper performance were searched. The bumper beam performance was compared based on stress, deformation, plastic strain and weight. The performance of the bumper beam according to the sectional shape is important in terms of production cost saving and energy efficiency. Based on the results of this study, we will analyze and compare the performance of C and I type bumper beam and design an effective cross section design.

title: BSR 사전 대응 위한 마찰기반 구조해석기법에 대한 연구
keyword: BSR(버즈/스o/래틀),Stick and Slip(스틱/슬립현상),Friction Model(마찰모델),FEA(유한요소해석)
abstract: The Buzz, Squeak and Rattle (BSR) is regarded as unintended noise, and caused by friction from the gap between parts of a system. Customers increasingly perceive squeak and rattle as direct indicator of build-quality and durability of vehicles as revealed from the J.D. Power surveys and etc. The high profile nature of squeak and rattle has motivated the manufacturers to pay attention to the early phase of vehicle development program, and thus leading them to put a special effort to detect BSR issues in the virtual development stage even though it is challenging task. The purpose of this thesis is to develop BSR evaluation process using FEA, and to identify the occurrence of BSR at the early stage of the design phase. In this paper, method to identify potential Squeak/Rattle locations in the vehicle sub-system using a contact finite element analysis is presented. In the FEA sub-model version is used and methodology of the analysis is based on the implicit transient or explicit analysis to account for kinematic behavior.

title: 교통약자용 의료용 스쿠터에 대한 주행진동 및 기계적 충격에 대한 연구
keyword: Vibration,Mechanical shock Robust statistics,Proficiency statistics,Vulnerable users,Medical powered scooter
abstract: Automobiles and motorcycles have driving vibration and mechanical impact test items. However, the medical powered scooter has not yet developed this test item. Therefore, we found the test profile through the actual road test and the mechanical impact test of the medical powered scooters. In addition, the validation of the test profile was verified using Robert-statistics and proficiency statistics techniques. We conducted the test through a nationally recognized testing laboratory for validated test profiles. We confirmed that there was no leakage, short circuit, burst or explosion among the components of medical powered scooters. In the future, these vibration levels and mechanical impact levels will be used to create standards for stability and reliability of medical powered scooters for vulnerable users.

title: 시트 오염의 로지스틱 판별 기술
keyword: Seat(시트),Stain(오염),Stain resistance test(오염제거시험),Soiled fabric(오염포),Logistic regression(로지스틱회귀식)
abstract: The present study developed Logistic regression models for discrimination of seat stain degrees. Seat stains have been qualitatively evaluated by a tester using gray scale (G/S) chart (1 ~ 5 points), but quantification of seat stains is needed due to inter-tester variability (e.g., visual acuity, color preference) and intra-tester variability (e.g., condition, feeling). To quantify seat stain degree, a driver’s lower body shaped-seat stain machine was developed for considering real ingress/egress conditions. Seven leather seats and 14 fabric seats, selected for considering full coverage of Lab color space in seat color dimensions, were contaminated using soil cloth (E128), and were measured color difference (ΔE) using color-difference meter. Ninety six ordinal Logistic regression (logit model) model candidates were developed, and then optimal models for leather and fabric seat were selected considering discriminability for 4.5 ~ 3.5 of G/S and %concordant (leather: 95.2%, fabric: 96.7%). Logistic discriminant methods developed in the study can contribute to quantification of seat stain degrees and reduction of customer’s satisfaction.

title: ISG용 베인타입 오일펌프의 베인 형상에 따른 구조해석
keyword: Oil pump(오일펌프),ISG(공회전제한장치),Vane(베인),Rotor(로터),Intrusion length ratio(삽입길이비),Protrusion length ratio(돌출길이비)
abstract: A vane-type oil pump for ISG commercial vehicle has been developed to respond to the reinforced fuel economy regulations by reducing the driving power consumption. The pump has a construction of a single suction and two separate discharges to both low-pressure and high-pressure lines. In this paper, structural analysis of the vane pump has been carried out. The effect of the relative position of the vanes and the rotor in the fast-running pump on structural safety has been investigated. The maximum stress of the pump decreases as the thickness of the vane increases. If the length and thickness of the vane are constant, the maximum stress increases with the increasing ratio of protrusion length of the vane.

title: 적산거리 위변조에 안전한 적산거리계 보호 프로토콜
keyword: Odometer protection(적산거리). Forgery(위변조),Message Authentication Code(메시지 인증코드),Integrity(무결성),IVN(차량 내부네트워크),HSM(하드웨어보안모듈)
abstract: The odometer value is an important criterion to estimate the overall condition of the vehicle. Although the forgery of the odometer value of the vehicle is reported steadily, there are no fundamental security technology measures to prevent it. Therefore, we propose a protocol to prevent malicious manipulation of vehicle odometer data through verification, backup, and restoration logic using message authentication code.

title: 영역별 오차 특성을 고려한 레이더 센서 융합
keyword: Track-to-track fusion(트랙간 센서 융합),Interacting Multiple Model Kalman Filter(IMM 필터),Object Tracking(물체 추적),Radar(레이더),Advanced Driver Assistance System(첨단 운전자 보조 시스템)
abstract: In this paper, we propose the track-to-track fusion algorithm considering zone-based error analysis of two radar networks. Error analysis of each radar was performed by comparing radar values and ground truth values from Differential Global Positioning System (DGPS) in the uniformly divided area based on the relative distance to the target vehicle. After that two famous distributed fusion algorithm, Convex Combination, Covariance Intersection were applied and compared using real experimental data. Through radar network fusion, we can possibly track objects in blind areas near the ego vehicle, which could not be detected by rear radar alone.

title: Long Short Term Memory 기반의 운전자 행동 모니터링 시스템
keyword: Deep Learning(딥 러닝),Long Short Term Memory(장단기 메모리),Recurrent Neural Network(인공 순환신경망),Driver Behavior Monitoring(운전자 행동 관찰),Steering Prediction(조향 예측),Time Sequential Data(시간 순서 데이터)
abstract: The driver behavior monitoring system is a system for observing unexpected maneuvers of a driver and alerting dangerous situation to prevent traffic accidents. In this paper, we propose the ‘Long Short Term Memory (LSTM)’ based driver behavior monitoring system. The LSTM is suitable for monitoring driver`s behavior because it is easy to process long term sequential data through selective memory algorithm using the partially storing method. The verification about the prediction simulation was conducted by comparing the actual driving data and the prediction results using the LSTM which implemented by computer language.

title: 샘플링 기반 경로 계획과 모델 예측 제어를 이용한 자율 주차 시스템
keyword: Model predictive control (모델 예측 제어),Path planning (경로 생성),Path following(경로 추종),Autonomous parking(자율 주차),Parking control(주차 제어),Path re-planning(경로 재생성)
abstract: In this paper, we propose a path planning and a path following method for the autonomous parking system. In order to consider the non-holonomic constraint of a vehicle, RRT star is used to plan paths. Model predictive control with the vehicle kinematic model is proposed to follow the path. To realize the autonomous parking system, we also consider the path re-planning at the point where forward and reverse paths are switched. The proposed method was validated via simulation results.

title: RLD 기반 타이어 연계 쿼터 서스펜션 모듈 특성에 관한 연구
keyword: RLD(Road Load Data, 도로 하중 데이터),Vehicle test(실차 시험),Quarter car(1/4 차량),Suspension Tuning(현가장치튜닝),Tire(타이어)
abstract: The development process of a modern car suspension system consider the target value of the suspension parts characteristics according to purpose of vehicle development. It apply to the design by referring to the benchmark data of the competition vehicle segment and the existing development DB(database). However, it is difficult to predict the actual characteristics of the suspension, so it is necessary to tuning the characteristics of the suspension parts and the specifications of the tires through vehicle tests. A variety of test methods are used for quantitative evaluation, because suspension test is almost subjective test. In this Study, we produce a road test condition by reproducing displacement and load based on RLD measured by vehicle test, and propose a characteristic test method of Tire Coupled Quarter Suspension Module.

title: 함수형 현가장치 모델과 K&C 시험결과의 정합성에 대한 연구
keyword: K&amp,C,SPMD,FSM(함수형현가장치모델),Vehicle test(실차시험),VI-CRT
abstract: In this paper, we compare the characteristics of wheel geometry when wheel is loaded about real vehicle test result and VI-CRT. VI-CRT is capable of modeling based on Vertical, Roll, Steering, Lateral, Longitudinal and Align characteristic of basic measurement test of K&C. In addition, modeling using single travel and single compliance test result is also posssible to improve the analysis accuracy. When the results of the analysis program and the actual vehicle are compared through the K&C test function built into the VI-CRT, We confirmed that the analytical model including single mode shows higher accuracy.

title: 멀티 모델 추정기를 활용한 3륜 틸팅 차량의 노면 경사각 추정
keyword: 3 wheel vehicle(3륜 차량),Road angle(노면경사각),Kalman filter(칼만필터),Tilting(틸팅),Estimation(추정)
abstract: This paper introduces the road angle observer. In this paper, the estimator that combines a kinematic model with a dynamic model of a three wheel vehicle is proposed. The dynamic model has four states, including lateral velocity, yaw rate, tilt angle, and tilt angle ratio. Likely, kinematic model has two states, including roll and pitch angles. According to the models, Kalman filter is used to estimate vehicle lateral speed, vehicle roll and pitch angle. To verify this proposed algorithm, simulation verification using Carsim ADAMS and Matlab&Simulink is performed and a discussion of the result is provided. In addition, this paper proposes a semi-active tilt system.

title: 승용디젤엔진용 고내구 주철 실린더 라이너 개발
keyword: Cylinder Liner,High Strength,Mo-C Precipitation
abstract: In order to achieve the needs of continuous improvement of fuel efficiency of the engine, the development of the passenger diesel engine is progressing in the direction of increasing the combustion pressure for the lightening of the engine and the combustion efficiency. Especially, The cylinder block constituting the combustion chamber is a core part having the largest weight in the engine. Therefore, Aluminum block with cast iron cylinder liners is developing to reduce the weight of integrated cast iron structural blocks. However, cylinder liners currently used in gasoline engine aluminum block have gray cast iron with a tensile strength of 250MPa, which limits the durability of passenger diesel engines with combustion pressures up to 70% higher than gasoline engines. In this study, high strength cast iron added Mo, Cu, Ni has been developed, and its tensile strength has been increased by 16% and the bonding strength with Al cylinder block by 19% compared with the conventional cylinder liner. Also hardening mechanism and durability, workability of developed high strength cylinder liner were investigated.

title: CAE를 활용한 차체 외판의 강성예측 및 평가
keyword: Dent Resistance(덴트 저항성),Indentor(인덴터),Outer-Panel Stiffness(외판 강성),Control factor(제어인자),Orthogonal Array (표준직교표),Try-out Process(트라이 아웃)
abstract:
Stiffness on outer panel is increasingly important as the automotive industry continues to reduce vehicle weight and improve vehicle performance. Various type of steels are being used to outer panels for improving dent resistance and stiffness. Outer panels are required for proper dent performance, along with good formability.
  How can we evaluate automotive body panel to have stiffness or dent resistance. In order to evaluate automotive body panels to resist denting, we need to know about factors that have an effect on the stiffness.
  In stamping process, there are some influencing factors that are divided into two (categories)groups. One is controllable factor, another is uncontrollable (factor). There are no ways to deal with uncontrollable factor efficiently. So, by using the factors that is under control, we could achieve the purpose to meet our specifications easily and efficiently.
  The study shows how to handle controllable factors concerned with stiffness on outer panel and provides difference between simulation model and actual model.

title: 능동소음제어 성능향상을 위한 탑승자 위치 기반 2차 경로 모델링 컨셉 연구
keyword: Active Noise Control(능동소음제어),Secondary Path(2차경로),Filtered-X LMS(FxLMS 알고리즘),Occupant Position(탑승자 위치)
abstract: In this paper we present secondary path modeling based on occupants position for active noise control system. In most ANC systems, the secondary path filters are constructed by designing the system without considering the position of the occupants in the modeling of the secondary path. The disadvantage of such a system is that the convergence of noise control is impaired when the occupant"s position changes from the optimal position designed for secondary path modeling. To avoid this issue, this thesis allows optimal feedback to be provided to occupants by considering the location of the occupants in the secondary route modeling and configuring the active noise control system by referring to the various secondary routes designed for this purpose. Experimentation with modeling and simulation using the proposed method has shown that the convergence performance of active noise control systems is improved.

title: 레이저를 활용한 Hard IP용 PAB DOOR 융착에 대한 영향인자 연구
keyword: Crash Pad(크래시패드),Laser Welding(레이저융착),PAB Chute
abstract: 본 논문에서는 Hard IP용 PAB Door 레이저 융착에 대한 인자별 영향도를 확인하고, 인자별 최적화를 통해 레이저 융착에 대한 효과성을 논하고자 한다. 먼저 영향인자를 소재, 장비, 구조로 설정하고, 각 인자별 수준을 나눠 검증을 실시하였다. 현재 크래시패드, PAB Door에 적용중인 양산소재를 바탕으로 각 소재별 투과율을 확인하고, 그에 따른 융착정도를 확인하였다. 융착정도는 각 시편별 인장력, 판단력 평가를 통해 검증하였다. 이러한 자료를 바탕으로 소재 인자별 크래시패드, PAB Door 제품을 제작하였고, 레이저장비 조건별(출력, 속도) T/O를 실시하였다. 제작된 제품에 대해 융착정도 및 이관수준 평가를 실시하였고, 이를 통해 최적화된 조건을 도출하였다. 이 같은 시험 기법을 통해서 Hard IP용 PAB Door 레이저 융착에 대한 설계인자별 영향도를 검증하고, 레이저 융착을 위한 설계 기준을 알아보고자 한다.

title: 상용차 하이브리드 냉방시스템 운전 모드 변화에 대한 성능 특성 연구
keyword: Hybrid air conditioning system(하이브리드냉방시스템),scroll type electric controlled compressor(스크롤타입전동압축기),Commercial vehicle(상용차),Cooling capacity(냉방성능),COP(시스템효율)
abstract: The objective of this study was to investigate performance characteristics of hybrid cooling system with scroll type electric compressor in a commercial vehicle. Tested hybrid cooling system had additionally the electric compressor besides present mechanical compressor to use selectively according to operating conditions. Applied electric compressor is scroll type and has 18.0 ㏄ displacement. In order to analyze performance characteristics of hybrid cooling system with respect to cooling capacity and COP(Coefficient of Performance), other components including two different types of compressors were installed and tested under various operating conditions such as compressor speed and air flow rate of the evaporator. When the electric compressor was operated with 4,500 rev/min, cooling capacity was about 4.0㎾ and COP was 3.5. To analyze hybrid system operating characteristics due to reasonable cooling capacity with electric compressor operation, mechanical compressor and electric compressor was operated by turns every 10 minutes under certain system operating conditions. Because surge pressure was found when two compressors was switched, operating strategy was required to have some time to balance the system pressure.

title: 브레이크용 모터의 축 방향 하중에 따른 기계적 손실을 고려한 특성 분석
keyword: Axial load(축 방향 하중),Loss measurement(손실 측정),Mechanical loss(기계적 손실),Motor characteristic(모터 특성),No load loss(무부하손실)
abstract: This paper presents characteristic analysis of surface permanent magnet synchronous motor(SPMSM) considering mechanical loss according to rotor axial load by oil pressure in brake system. If rotor is forced in axial direction, mechanical loss increases. Mechanical loss is one of major components which affect on efficiency. To consider mechanical loss, no load loss is measured at axial load condition. Mechanical loss is calculated by subtracting core loss from no load loss. Mechanical loss is increased as rotor axis is forced and rotates more quickly. Motor characteristic comparison between model with axial load and model without axial load is done. In case of model with axial load, motor performance decreases compared to model without axial load. In conclusion, Mechanical loss by axial load reduces torque and efficiency in high speed region.

title: 브러쉬의 전기적, 기계적 손실을 고려한 차량 Throttle Valve 용 PMDC 전동기 성능 예측
keyword: Brush(브러쉬),Commutator(정류자),Electrical loss(전기적 손실),Mechanical loss(기계적 손실),PMDC(영구잣거형 계자 직류전동기),TNI curve(토크, 속도, 전류 특성곡선)
abstract: When the PMDC motor rotates, the friction between the brush and the commutator causes electrical and mechanical losses. Therefore, to accurately predict the characteristics of a PMDC motor, the influence of the brush have to be reflected. However, it is difficult to predict the contact resistance and the friction coefficient by the brush because of the large nonlinearity. Therefore, in this paper, PMDC motor is experimentally measured and friction coefficient and brush resistance are calculated through mathematical modeling. Based on this, PMDC characteristics are predicted and compared with experimental data.

title: 고속버스용 휠체어 탑승 승강장치 설계 연구
keyword: Wheelchair Lift(휠체어 승강장치),Express bus(고속버스),Transportation abbreviation(교통 약자),Finite Element Analysis(유한요소해석),Design(설계)
abstract: In the rapidly aging society, wheelchair users are continually increasing. For public welfare for the disabled, the public transportation service systems should be improved. In order to improve the mobility of the disabled, it has been required to develop a special model of the express buses. For a development of express bus for wheelchair users, it has to be developed with the specially designed entrance and lift systems. This study has been conducted to the design of a wheelchair lift system for express buses and evaluated structural integrity using finite element model. For the analytical evaluation, the strength analysis for standard load and endurance load were performed using FMVSS Part 571.403. In case of standard load, the maximum stress of the lift system was 29.5% of the yield stress, and it was evaluated that the lift system ensures against the guarantee load. It is expected that the result of this study will be utilized in the related welfare industry.

title: 차량 주행 안정성 향상을 위한 차량 질량 추정 알고리즘 개발
keyword: Electronic Stability Control(ESC) System(전자식 주행 안정화 컨트롤),Commercial Vehicle(상용차량),Vehicle Mass(차량 질량),Recursive Leasts Square(RLS) Method(회기 최소 자승기법),Recursive Leasts Square(RLS) with Forgetting Method(망각인자회기최소자승기법)
abstract: Recently, when a lot of passengers are loaded on luggage such as trucks and buses, the vehicle mass becomes high and excessive lateral acceleration occurs during traveling, so that the vehicle is rollover easily. Therefore, it is essential to secure the stability of the vehicle attitude. In order to secure the stability of the driving, it is necessary to accurately measure the weight of the moving vehicle in real time. By accurately grasping the weight of the vehicle, the braking force can be effectively distributed. Also, it is important to measure the exact weight of the vehicle while driving to optimize the ESC(Electronic Stability Control) and regenerative braking algorithm. In this paper, we have developed a mass estimation algorithm using the least squares method to determine the mass of a vehicle. Vehicle model and data were generated using TruckSim software to verify the algorithm.

title: 우편집배용 이륜차 브레이크 성능 검증에 관한 연구
keyword: Brake pad(브레이크 패드),Brake dynamometer(브레이크 다이나모미터),Caliper(캘리퍼),마모도(abrasion),이륜차동역학해석프로그램(Bikesim)
abstract: 본 논문은 현재 집배용으로 사용되고 있는 이륜차의 필드고장사례분석을 통해 선정된 안전관련 중요도가 높은 브레이크 부품의 품질 및 성능을 실험적 분석 방법을 통해 검증하는데 목적을 두고 있다. 브레이크 다이나모를 이용하여 벤치마킹 제품, OEM 정품, A/S 제공품의 3가지 샘플을 대상으로 상대적인 성능비교를 통해, 브레이크 마모 및 성능저하 요인을 파악하였다. 또한, 실환경에서 여러 가지 조건이 반영된 패드 마모량 측정을 통해 시험적인 방법과 결과를 비교하고 검증하였으며 최종적으로 성능 개선 방향을 제시하였다.

title: 카본 세라믹 복합재를 이용한 제동시스템 개발 및 성능향상에 관한 연구
keyword: High Performance Brake System(고성능 브레이크 시스템),Function Analysis(기능 분석),Substance-Field Model Analysis(물질-장 모델 분석),Carbon Ceramic Composite Brake(카본 세라 복합재 브레이크)
abstract: Luxury car industry recently increased to 10.5% per every year. For this reason, it is very important issue for motor company to improve profitability and value of brand. Therefore, needs of high performance brake system have strongly required because of increase of engine power and customer’s favorites etc. Also, competitive motor companies actively reinforce domestic production in order to maintain quality and infra for luxury car. In this situation, we will show you the new carbon ceramic brake to improve brake reliability for luxury car and to compete competitors. Finally, we will propose future braking technology through technology evolution trend prediction.

title: Soot Particle이 공기유량센서에 미치는 영향성 평가
keyword: Air Flow Sensor (공유유량센서),HFM (Hot Film Air Mass Flow Meter) (열막식 공기유량 센서),Exhaust Gas (배기가스),Soot Particle (입자상 물질),Particulate Matter (입자상 물질),Diesel (디젤)
abstract:
To control the air fuel ratio of internal combustion engine system, HFM (Hot Film Air Mass Flowmeter) is mostly used. It is very important to control AF ratio for emission control and fuel efficiency. However, soot particle in the intake air by the diesel vehicles which is old or not to equip DPF system will cause the problem to HFM.
  The goal of this paper is to evaluate the effects of the soot particle in the intake air on HFM (Hot Film Air Mass Flowmeter). To achieve the goal, 2.0L diesel engine was used to generate the soot and exhaust gas which was surrogate intake air including the soot particle for evaluating the effects of the soot particle on the HFM.
  The result of this work is that the circular shape of grid which was the part of HFM’s entrance increases the efficiency of flow rate and soot particles, but increasing soot deposit in the sensor element in HFM causes the decreasing the performance of the HFM.

title: 열관리 시스템 개발을 위한 엔진 웜업 예측 해석 기술 개발
keyword: (Engine Warm-Up),(Thermal Management),(Temperature),(Friction)
abstract: Engine warm-up prediction is a technology that predicts changes in engine solids, cooling water, oil temperature, and friction amount in response to changes in engine operating conditions. In order to optimize TMS (Thermal Management System) It is a technique that must be secured. In order to secure engine warm-up analysis technology, we acquired necessary data for the three mass production engines (R 2.2 EU6, Kappa 1.0 MPI, and Seta 2 improvement 2.4 GDI), and constructed the warming analysis model and verified the analytical and test correlation.

title: 차량 기본 장착용 e-Call 단말기 제어 보드 개발
keyword: e-Call System(긴급구난체계),e-Call IVS(e-Call 차내장착단말기),ITS(교통체계),Vehicle Crash(차량사고),Crash Detection(사고감지),Vehicle Signal Sensing(차량신호감지),PSAP(응급구난센터),EDR(사고기록장치),MSD(최소사고정보메시지)
abstract: In this paper, We propose the e-Call In-Vehicle System Control Board which implements some functions of MSD message sending to Public Safty Answering Point after vehicle signal sensing and crash detection real-time when a vehicle crash such as vehicle collision or rollover. We designed the hardware and firmware of the e-Call In-Vehicle System Control Board for usefulness of Korean e-Call System thru analysis the standards, technical reports, benchmarking reports related in e-Call system of EU, Russia, Republic of Korea. We developed the e-Call In-Vehicle System Control Board and confirmed the experimental results for validate basic e-Call functions. This study show that the e-Call In-Vehicle System Control Board can be use as an equipment for a e-Call system of vehicles.

title: APF를 이용한 차량 충돌 히피 경로 계획 및 추종 제어
keyword: Path Planning(경로 계획),Autonomous Driving(자율 주행),Path Tracking(경로 추종),Artificial Potential Field(인공 포텐셜 필드),Emergency Braking(긴급 제동),Cut-in(끼어들기)
abstract: This paper proposes collision avoidance path planning based on Artificial Potential Field(APF) in dynamic driving environment. Repulsive potential fields constructed by using obstacle information and attractive potential fields based on road information are used in the proposed approach. Through this approach, a collision avoidance path is configured, considering the changes in the gradient descent of potential field; this potential field should be based on the surrounding information. The stanley method is used for planned collision avoidance in path following. Dynamic driving environment is constructed with the application of emergency braking and cut-in of the target vehicle. Also, the validity of the proposed APF collision avoidance path planning has been verified, using CarSim and MATLAB / Simulink.

title: 체결조건에 따른 휠볼트 축력 변동 및 파손 원인 해석적 분석
keyword: Wheel bolt(휠볼트),Clamping force(체결축력),Clamping Torque(체결토크),Lateral force(횡력),Bolt teeth stress(볼트치 응력)
abstract: As the vehicle becomes increasingly high performance, it may happen that the wheel nuts are loosen or the wheel bolts are broken during the endurance test. This paper examined the variation in the bolt clamping force and the bolt teeth stress in relation to the clamping conditions of the wheel nuts.

title: 선회 성능 향상을 위한 eLSD 제어 알고리즘 및 랩타임 시뮬레이션
keyword: eLSD(전자식 차동 제한 장치),Vehicle dynamics(차량 동역학),Yaw rate control(요레이트 제어),Traction Control(구동력 제어),Lap time simulation(랩타임 시뮬레이션)
abstract: The eLSD (Electronic Limited Slip Differential) is the device that provides limited slip differential function by electric control of friction clutch. The advantage of eLSD is that it can control LSD function according to vehicle state properly. Traditionally, many studies about eLSD were performed to improve traction and stability of the vehicle, but it also can be used to improve turning performance of the vehicle. In this paper, we propose eLSD control algorithm in order to improve turning performance of the vehicle that is applied eLSD. The proposed algorithms are compared with the eLSD basic control algorithm and open differential in the simulation environment in terms of turning performance and stability of the vehicle. The simulations are conducted using CarSim of Mechanical Simulation and VSM of AVL. We conduct basic test scenario like steady-state circular test and ramp steer test using CarSim, and conduct lap time simulation at circuit using VSM.

title: 플라스틱 사출형 볼조인트의 성능에 대한 사출성형 조건의 최적화
keyword: Plastic injection ball joint(플라스틱사출형볼조인트),사출성형해석(Injection molding analysis),실험계획법(DOE, Design of Experiment),완전요인실험(Full factorial design)
abstract: The important basic performance of ball joint is rotational torque and axial stiffness. In case of plastic injection molding type ball joint, deflection caused by volumetric shrinkage of injection molded part greatly influence ball joint performance. The deformation of the injection molded part generates the contact pressure between the ball stud and the plastic bearing, and ultimately shows the rotational torque and axial stiffness characteristics of the ball joint. In this study, the effects of injection molding conditions on the rotational torque and axial stiffness of plastic injection ball joint were evaluated and optimized injection molding conditions showing optimal rotational torque and axial stiffness. Injection moldability of the plastic injection part was evaluated by Moldflow for injection molding analysis, and rotational torque and axial stiffness were evaluated by Abaqus for structural analysis. Design of experiment(DOE) method was used to identify injection molding conditions that affect ball joint performance and to determine optimal injection molding conditions.

title: NVH와 내구성능을 고려한 엔진마운팅 목표전개기법 최적 컨셉설계
keyword: Engine Mtg NVH design(엔진마운팅 NVH설계),Analytical Target Cascading Optimization(목표전개최적화),Meta-model(메타모델),Rubber durability(고무내구)
abstract: Rubbers of vehicle engine mounting are attached at the engine that contributes the biggest vibrating energy. To design the engine mounting, NVH and durability performances are important, but those mostly conflict with each other. To solve this challenging task, Analytical Target Cascading optimization algorithm was used. Engine mtg. system was divided to dynamic solution and durability solution. To connect these two functional differences, rubbers’ stiffness was calculated individually from dynamic solver and FEM solver. And then the Analytical Target Cascading optimized the engine mtg. reducing the difference between them. To avoid abandonment due to late solution, Meta modeling was derived from design of experiment analysis. As a result, the optimized design became to satisfy both NVH and durability performance target.

title: 가상 주행을 활용한 노면재현기법(하이브리드 시뮬레이션) 검증
keyword: Hybrid Simulation(하이브리드 재현법),Virtual Driving(가상 주행),Tire Model(타이어 모델),3D Road Profile(3차원 노면 프로파일),Road Simulator(로드 시뮬레이터),RLDA(노면 입력하중 계측)
abstract: Today’s vehicle developers must validate new technologies on vehicle platforms with numerous variants, while using fewer resources and meeting tighter deadlines. Hybrid simulation ? the integration of physical tests and virtual models ? holds tremendous potential to accelerate and enhance traditional development processes, but it presents considerable technical challenges. One of the most daunting challenges is when the physical test rig and the virtual model can’t interact in real-time. To enable hybrid simulations in situations where real-time techniques are not possible, we can use Hybrid System Response Convergence (HSRC). And then that method is applied prototype vehicle for durability test. Finally, Durability test results from traditional method and HSRC method were compared.

title: 파워트레인 다이나모를 이용한 후룬기반 4WD 시스템의 연비 특성 평가
keyword: 4-wheel drive(사륜구동),AWD(All-wheel drive),ATC(Active Transfer Case),4WD Powertrain Dynamo(4WD 파워트레인 다이나모),4WD evaluation(4WD 평가),Fuel efficiency(연비)
abstract: 4WD vehicles are better at handling and driving safety than 2WD vehicles, but the weight and power loss of the vehicle will be increased by additional driving devices, resulting in a drop in fuel economy. Therefore research is needed to improve the fuel economy of 4WD vehicles and how to evaluate and validate them. However it is difficult to measure actual improvement rate of fuel efficiency of vehicles through single unit evaluation. And evaluation using a vehicle chassis dynamo is limited to the number of assessments dependent on the cost. In order to overcome these shortcomings of vehicle fuel economy assessment, Hyundai Wia has developed a more efficient analysis of the fuel economy factor of 4WD vehicles and the reliability of the improved fuel economy. Hyundai WIA has developed the 4WD Powertrain Dynamometer (PT Dynamo) to overcome the disadvantages of this assessment and to verify the effective analysis of the fuel economy factors of 4WD vehicles and the reliability of the measures to improve fuel economy. PT Dynamo includes most of the actual vehicle’s driven systems, such as the vehicle’s engine, transmission, 4WD Transfer case, and differential gear. It is also designed to enable simulated driving on the vehicle’s driving load characteristics and tire surface friction models in real time. This study has developed and verified PT Dynamo and evaluated the fuel economy characteristics of 4WD vehicles, and would like to provide a more efficient way to improve fuel economy.

title: 냉각수 제어 밸브 일체형 ATF 열교환기 적용이 연비에 미치는 영향에 대한 연구
keyword: Plate type(판 형),ATF(자동변속기 오일),Heat Exchanger(열교환기),coolant control valve(냉각수 제어 밸브),fuel economy(연비)
abstract: An ATF heat exchanger reduces transmission warming up time by elevating the ATF temperature quickly and regulates the temperature appropriately to ensure lubricating characteristics by heat transfer between the coolant and ATF. In another aspect, heat transfer from the coolant to the ATF causes insufficient energy to heat the cabin. In this study, the heat transfer characteristics of the plate type ATF heat exchanger is analyzed. the flow pattern of Coolant control valve is analyzed by the computational fluid dynamic method. The influence on fuel economy vehicles With a plate type ATF heat exchanger integrating a coolant control valve have been investigated.

title: 자동변속기 유성기어 시스템 내에서 부시 압입 및 이탈에 대한 고찰
keyword: A/T(자동변속기),Bush(부시),forced press fitting(강제압입),Breakaway(이탈)
abstract: The bush is normally operated as sliding bearing inside transmission gear system. The main purpose of bush is to prevent misalignment rotation of the inner shaft. The bush can product in simple than rolling bearing. Also bush is applicable to the planet gear and clutche for high speed rotation and prevention of noises. However, the bush have disadvantage burning and breakaway than rolling bearing under boundary lubrication and over misalignment. So this paper explains the cause of the bush burning and breakaway, in addition describe relation of bush forced pressure fitting and breakaway.

title: O-ring 특성 분석을 통한 주행감속기용 Floating Seal 개발
keyword: Floating Seal(플로팅 씰),Finite Element Analysis(유한요소해석),축대칭(2D-Axisymmetric),쇼어 경도(Shore Hardness),Universal Testing Machine ? UTM(만능시험기)
abstract: Floating seal is a component of the undercarriage of an industrial excavator or tractor. It is mounted on the drive reducer, roller, and idler to prevent foreign material from entering and leakage of internal lubricant. In addition, it performs the rotational function such as the role of the bearing, so that the rotational motion of the mounted component is smooth. Floating seal consists of housing, O-ring and seal-ring. O-ring made of nitrile butadiene rubber is compressed by housing and seal-ring to have sealing performance. In this study, we measured the material properties of the O-ring and evaluated the sealing performance of the floating seals according to the change of housing gap through the test and finite element analysis.

title: FEM 해석을 통한 상용차용 에어브레이크 챔버의 경량 설계
keyword: Light-weight(경량화),FEM(유한요소법),Air Brake(공압브레이크),Connnercial Vehicle(상용차)
abstract:
Recently, because extremely strengthen of fuel efficiency regulations, the light-weight technology studies actively have been carried out to improve fuel efficiency. In specially, the large-sized vehicles such as trucks and buses for loading people or cargo have a very high driving distance compared with passenger cars. So the effect of fuel economy improvement is very important factor in selecting a commercial vehicle.
  In generally, It is well known that reducing weight of unsprung mass is more effective than reducing weight of sprung mass on vehicle for fuel efficiency. Therefore, various researches for reducing the weight of the brake parts have been continuously carried out. In addition, since the brake system is an important parts directly connected with the safety of the vehicle. It is essential to confirm the stability of the brake parts due to the weight reduction.
  In this paper, we tried to establish an analytical model of air brake chamber for commercial vehicle. And we predicted the structural stiffness of head housing in air brake chamber by material change from steel to aluminum. Also, in order to ensure the same level of rigidity as conventional products, we confirmed the structural rigidity of the thickness and shape change of the head housing in brake chamber.

title: 고밀도 깊이 지도 획득을 위한 스테레오 카메라와 라이다 센서 융합
keyword: Autonomous vehicle (자율 차량),Sensor fusion (센서 융합),Lidar sensor (라이다 센서),Stereo camera (스테레오 카메라),Stereo matching (스테레오 정합)
abstract: 실외 주행 환경에 대한 깊이 정보를 획득하기 위하여, 라이다(Lidar) 센서와 스테레오 카메라는 보편적으로 사용된다. 라이다 센서에 의한 깊이 정보는 소수의 포인트에 대하여 정교한 값을 제공하며, 스테레오 카메라를 이용한 방법은 다수의 포인트에 대하여 상대적으로 부정확한 깊이 정보를 제공할 수 있다는 특징을 가진다. 본 논문에서는 이 같은 두 종류의 센서로부터 획득되는 정보를 융합함으로써 많은 수의 포인트에 대한 정교한 깊이 정보를 획득할 수 있는 방법을 제안한다. 제안하는 방법은 크게 두 단계로 구성된다. 첫 번째로, 라이다 센서로부터 획득된 점군(Point cloud)을 기반으로 3차원 변이 지도를 생성한다. 두 번째로, 앞 단계에서 획득 된 3차원 변이 지도를 바탕으로 픽셀 단위 비용을 정의하고, 비 정방 윈도우를 이용한 스테레오 정합을 수행한다. 제안하는 방법은 KITTI 데이터 셋을 통한 정량 및 정성적인 분석을 통하여 성능 개선을 확인하였다.

title: 고급차(제네시스), 고성능차(N) 상품성 확보를 위한 엔진 감성 성능 개발
keyword: Impulse Combustion (후연소 사운드),Launch Control (발진 제어,론치 컨트롤),Boost Pre-charging (부스트 프리차징)
abstract: Since Hyundai Motor company developed first new alpha engine, HMC has focused to get higher engine performance and better fuel economy. Recently HMC is preparing to enter new high performance , luxury market. To achieve success in that market, powertrain developments are also required to have different approaches. In this study, to satisfy our new customer’s need, two major engine control logic has been developed and applied. One is making after-burn sound and the other is developing launch control with turbocharger pre-charging. The result of two development were impressive in term of customer emotional satisfaction and will be applied to mass production vehicle.

title: 습식 DCT용 유압제어 핵심부품의 형상이 누설 유량에 미치는 영향
keyword: Dual Clutch Transmission(듀얼 클러치 변속기),Flange(플랜지),Spool(스풀),Clearance(간극),Leakage(누설)
abstract: Recently, Dual Clutch Transmission(DCT) with high efficient of the manual transmission and convenience of the automatic transmission has been researched and developed. DCT is divided into dry and wet depending on whether the oil is used or not. Wet DCT have to use hydraulic pressure to deliver the clutch’s large torque without loss. Therefore, It is necessary to develop a solenoid-type control valve capavle of high pressure control at level of 60bar. In this study, the effect of spool and flange geometry affecting leakage has been investigated using computational fluid analysis. Also, prototypes were fabricated to evaluate leakage according to clearance.

title: Deep Neural Network를 이용한 자율 주행 차량의 차선 유지 시스템 성능 향상
keyword: Autonomous vehicle(자율 주행 차량),Lateral motion model(횡 방향 모델),Lane keeping system(차선 유지 시스템),Deep neural network(심층 신경망),Deep learning(딥러닝)
abstract: In this paper, we propose the method to compensate for unmatched disturbance caused by lateral control of autonomous vehicles using deep neural network. We utilize dynamic lateral model based lane keeping system considering look-ahead distance for autonomous driving vehicle. On the curved road, it makes it difficult to control the system because of unmatched disturbance caused by external signals. To mimic the strategy of human driver, The deep neural network computes an additional control input added to a conventional control system. The proposed algorithm is verified in MATLAB/Simulink environment and the error of state is reduced in the curved road.

title: die casting법을 이용한 중형 상용차 V-arm제품의 피로내구 평가 연구
keyword: Medium-duty commercial vehicle (중형 상용창),Fatigue fracture (피로파괴),Fracture section(파단면),Die casting (주요용어),Structural strength analysis (구조강도해석),n-Code (앤코드)
abstract: In this paper, we evaluated the fatigue and durability performance of a V-arm that supports the axle of a commercial vehicle and is subjected to vibration or shock load from the road surface. The V-arm is designed to have high strength in order to prevent damage due to vibration and impact load considering the use environment of the product. Therefore, the weight of the product also increases, which is one of the obstacles to the weight reduction of the vehicle. In order to lighten the V-arm with the above characteristics, the product was molded using the die casting method. The die casting method is widely used as a manufacturing method capable of producing complex shapes at a high speed. The shape of the V-arm is relatively small, but the size and thickness of the product are larger and thicker than those of the general die casting, making it difficult to develop the product. It is necessary to develop the production technology and evaluate the fatigue load technically. In order to evaluate the reliability of the product using the high vacuum diecasting technique, fatigue analysis was carried out using fatigue limit test and ANSYS n _Code Design Life using samples obtained from the developed product.

title: 승용차 냉각 저항 개선을 위한 Diffuser Type의 Air Guide 설계
keyword: Air Guide(에어 가이드),Cooling Drag(냉각 저항),Numerical Analysis(수치 해석),Aerodynamic Performance(공력 성능),Passenger car(승용차)
abstract: An idea is suggested to reduce the cooling drag by installing a diffuser type air guide between grille inlet and cooling module of the passenger car. Numerical study has been performed to figure out the effects of diffuser shaped air guide on the cooling drag. Driving speed of 140km/h is considered as a simulation condition with the moving wall boundary condition.

title: 차량 공공도로 주행 특성을 적용한 타이어 연비 측정 방안에 대한 연구
keyword: Tire Fuel Efficiency(타이어복합연비),Rolling resistance(회전저항),Rolling resistance Coefficient(회전저항계수),Actual car driving(실차주행),Slip&amp,Camber Angle(슬립/캠버각)
abstract: At the moment when interest in tire fuel economy grows naturally due to economic fluctuations, national regulations are being formed due to constraints due to limited use of limited fossil fuels and social attention to environmental problems. As a result, the tire energy consumption efficiency indicator system has been established. This system displays the two performance characteristics of the fuel economy and safety of the tire. The lower the rotational resistance of the tire, the better the fuel economy. The higher the wet road surface braking force, It is characterized by excellent. However, the current measurement of the rotational resistance of the tire efficiency rating system is based on only the straight running, and it is considered that the method is a method that does not take into consideration the rotation section traveling during actual vehicle driving. It is assumed that considering the feature that the slip angle camber angle change of the wheel / tire occurs through the turn driving when the actual vehicle travels, it is assumed that the correct fuel consumption is determined by the tire.

title: 타이어 특성을 고려한 차량 응답성 분석에 관한 연구
keyword: Frequency Response (주파수 응답),Tire Design (타이어 설계),Cornering Stiffness (코너링강성),Aligning Stiffness (복원모멘트 강성),Lateral Relaxation Length (횡 이완 길이)
abstract: Tire design variables, such as tread patterns, mold cavities, compounds, and structures, affect the response performance of the vehicle. In this study, the following experimental methods are used to find tire characteristics that affect the response performance of a vehicle. First, the structural variables were adjusted to make samples of different response levels, and then various indoor tests were performed using FLAT-TRAC to derive the tire characteristics associated with the vehicle’s response from the prepared samples. In order to evaluate the response performance of the vehicle for each tire samples, a objective outdoor test was then performed on the proving ground using various measurement equipments as like RT-3000, steering robot, etc. Finally, the relationship between the response performance of the vehicle and the characteristics of the tire was compared from these results.

title: 차량 핸들링 성능 향상을 위한 액티브 서스펜션 제어 연구
keyword: Active Suspension(액티브 서스펜션),Ride and Handling(승차감 및 핸들링),Power Pack(파워팩),Control Logic(제어로직)
abstract: Active Suspension System which improves vehicle Ride & Handling performance is a technology that has received much attention in recent years in the chassis field. Some companies have produced this technology, and many others are also working on it. Although this technique can be implemented in various forms, this paper describes a system that can actively control vehicle body motion by combination of a motor/pump with a damper.

title: 볼조인트 회전토크와 강성에 대한 부품공차내의 설계 민감도 분석
keyword: Ball joint(볼조인트),사출성형해석(Injection molding analysis),실험계획법(DOE, Design of Experiment),완전요인실험(Full factorial design),민감도해석(Sensitivity analysis),부품공차(Part Tolerance)
abstract: In order to investigate the rotational torque and stiffness characteristics of the ball joint by an analysis, the finite element model and the analysis process were constructed and the finite element model was verified through comparison with the test results. The rotational torque and stiffness characteristics of the ball joint are influenced by the tolerance condition of parts. Design of experiment(DOE) was used to set the important design parameters for the ball joint performance and to analyze the sensitivity in the tolerance region of design variables. From this, the main design parameters for ball joint rotational torque and stiffness performance were established, and the base technology for ball joint design was acquired.

title: LPL EGR 시스템용 알루미늄 EGR 쿨러 구조강도 해석
keyword: Low pressure loop EGR System(저압루프EGR 시스템),Aluminum EGR Cooler(알루미늄이지알쿨러),Extrusion tube(압출튜브),Heat Transfer Fin(전열핀),Structural Strength Analysis(구조 강도 해석),Internal Pressure Analysis(내압해석)
abstract: The FEM structural strength analysis was performed on aluminium EGR Cooler for LPL EGR system. The structural reinforcement design was developed through internal pressure simulation for EGR Cooler using the extruded tube and ‘Fin & Tube type’ to avoid stress concentration site, which exceed fracture stress of material. 50 percent decreased in number of heat transfer fin, and 40 percent decreased in volume of housing as a result of optimization design changing from extruded tube to Fin & Tube type. In addition, the maximum stress from contact surface of exhaust gas and coolant decreased by 11.3 and 71.5 percent, respectively.

title: 능동형 히피조향보조 제어 연구
keyword: Evasive Steering Assist(ESA, 회피조향보조),Electronically Controlled Suspension(ESC, 전자제어서스펜션),Rear Wheel Steering(RWS, 후륜조향장치),Electronic Stability Control(ESC, 차체자세제어장치),Motor Driven Power Steering(MDPS, 조향보조장치),Advanced Driver Assistance System(ADAS, 운전자지원시스템)
abstract: The purpose of this study is to develop the ESA(Evasive Steering Assist) logic that provide the assist steering for collision avoidance in a frontal collision situation. The proposed ESA logic utilizes only the traditional chassis control system, such as the RWS, ESC, ECS and MDPS systems to prevent weight increase and cost increase. When collision case, the proposed ESA logic calculate the proper toe angle of rear wheels (for RWS), partial brake pressure (for ESC), suspension damping force (for ECS) and steering column torque (for MDPS). As a result, the yaw-rate response of the vehicle is increased and the vehicle is controlled to avoid the frontal collision. The proposed ESA logic is designed on commercial software, MATLAB/Simulink, and the performance of this logic is verified through the HILS (Hardware-In-the-Loop Simulation) and vehicle experiments.

title: 자율주행 차량을 위한 Full Redundancy MDPS 시스템 개발
keyword: Full Redundancy System(이중화 시스템),MDPS(전동스티어링),Autonomous Vehicle(자율주행 차량),Torque Sensor(토크 센서),Angle Sensor(조향각 센서)
abstract: An autonomous vehicle is a vehicle that travels to a given destination by recognizing the surrounding environment without the driver’s intervention, judging the driving situation, and controlling the vehicle. In an autonomous driving vehicle, the MDPS system is a system that performs a steering function by receiving an operating command of an autonomous driving system that the vehicle judges and drives completely independently of the driver. The risk of accidents is very high in case of failure of the steering device in the autonomous driving stage 3 or more without obligation of the driver. Therefore, a Full Redundancy MDPS system that requires normal steering function even when MDPS system fails is needed. The control system of the Full Redundancy MDPS can produce a normal 100% output with a double designed motor each output 50%.
