Finally the validity of the improvement model is confirmed by comparing the efficiency and thermal characteristics of the improved model with the existing model.

title: 차량 탑승객의 성별에 따른 온열쾌적감 비교
keyword: Vehicle Comfort (차량쾌적성),Comfort Model (쾌적모델),Mean Skin Temperature (평균피부온도),Thermal Sensation Vote (온열감 응답),Comfort Sensation Vote (쾌적감 응답)
abstract: With the recent development of self-driving cars, vehicles are not just a means of transportation but becomes a living space. Thus, it is important to provide a comfortable indoor environment to passengers in the vehicle. To achieve this, HMC Comfort Model ver.1, which predicts the thermal comfort of passengers, was developed in 2017. However, since this model was developed for Korean males in their 2-30s, it is difficult to apply it to females where different physiological and psychological responses are shown. Therefore, in this study, the data to develop comfort model specialized for gender were obtained and analyzed. Experiments were conducted on Korean females in their 2-30s in actual vehicles located in climate chambers with hot and cold conditions. During the experiment, skin temperature was measured and thermal comfort of subjects was evaluated. The results were compared with previous results of Korean males and necessity of specialized comfort model for women was confirmed through differences between two results.

title: EV 상용차용 히트펌프 시스템 냉방 성능 특성에 관한 연구
keyword: Chiller(칠러),Compressor work(압축기 일),Cooling capacity(냉방 성능),Exterior heat exchanger(외부열교환기),Heat pump system (히트펌프 시스템)
abstract: The cooling performance evaluation of heat pump system for light-duty commercial electric vehicle was studied experimentally. In order to identify the cooling performance characteristics of the heat pump for light-duty commercial electric vehicles, it was evaluated by varying the temperature, flow rate of chiller coolant, and electric compressor speed, under the exterior air temperature of 35°C and interior air temperature of 25°C. Increasing the compressor speeds shows the cooling capacity of the system increases by 7.5% on average, and the compressor work by 27% on average. As a result, the system COP(coefficient of performance) decreases by 14.5% on average. Increasing the temperature of chiller coolant shows the cooling capacity of the system increases by 0.07 kW on average, and the compressor work by the compressor increases by 0.15 kW on average. As a result, the system COP decreases by 8.7% on average. Increasing the flow rate of chiller coolant show the cooling capacity of the system increases by 0.03% on average, and the compressor work by the compressor increases by 0.04% on average. As a result, the system COP does not change.

title: 자기 강화 메커니즘을 이용한 클러치 토크 추정
keyword: Self-Energizing Mechanism(자기 강화 메커니즘),Clutch torque(클러치 토크),Clutch Disk Torque Friction Coefficient(클러치 디스크 토크 마찰계수),Cushion Spring(쿠션스프링),Slip Control(슬립 제어)
abstract: In modern transmission control, fast and smooth shifting is the most important issue. Efficient power transfer requires fast shifting, and accurate slip control is necessary to improve the driver"s ride comfort. In order to improve the slip control performance, it is very important to know the clutch torque. A clutch torque can be known from the clutch disk pressure and torque friction coefficient. The pressure applied to the clutch disk can be measured from the motor current and the force sensor. However, the torque friction coefficient cannot be measured by the sensor. Also, the friction coefficient is unknown because it changes with temperature, slip speed, and pressure on the clutch disk. Therefore, clutch torque estimation with the indirect method has been actively studied. In the forward-direction clutch torque estimation through the engine torque, the exact clutch torque cannot be estimated because the engine torque is inaccurate. Also, the backward-direction clutch torque estimation method using the compliance model has a disadvantage in that the clutch torque cannot be estimated when there is a backlash of the gear. Thus, in this manuscript, we propose a clutch disk torque friction coefficient estimation with a ball-ramp self-energizing mechanism. In the self-energizing mechanism in which the torque caused by friction reinforces the normal force, the gain of the actuator force to the clutch normal force varies according to the friction coefficient. Apply the actuator"s position and force to the model to obtain the change in gain and estimate the clutch disc torque friction coefficient. he ball-ramp actuator is modeled for the torque friction coefficient estimation, and the test bench experiment verifies the clutch torque estimation performance during shifting. Finally, verification of the proposed model and estimation of the clutch disc torque friction coefficient during shifting are conducted via test bench experiments.

title: 가솔린 엔진 연소압 기반 제어 기술 개발
keyword: In-cylinder Pressure Sensor(연소압센서),Combustion Control(연소제어),Knock detection(노킹감지),Fuel Economy(연비)
abstract: State-of-art engines have introduced various technologies (VVA, EGR, MPI-GDI dual injection, etc.) to improve fuel economy and performance. Due to the interactions between technologies, optimized combustion control becomes more difficult, which causes drivability problems in vehicles. In-cylinder pressure sensor (ICPS) is the ultimate sensor to measure combustion directly; however, has not been accepted for mass production due to high cost and lacking durability. In this paper, the combustion control using the low-cost ICPS is demonstrated in a 4-cylinder engine. Ignition angle control of each cylinder based on both HR50 feed-back and knock detection is implemented in production-level ECU, and its fuel economy benefit is measured in engine dynamometer tests.

title: ACSF 표준 기반 위험평가 지수에 의한 차선변경 제어시점 판단 알고리즘
keyword: Threat Evaluation (위험 평가),Lane Change (차선 변경),Autonomous Driving (자율 주행),Radar Sensor(레이더 센서),Automatically Command Steering Function (ACSF,자동명령조향기능)
abstract: Research on advanced driver assistance systems (ADAS) has been actively conducted around the world. ADAS is a driving aid as well as an active safety system to help passengers avoid dangerous situations while driving. Lane change is an operation requiring integrated maneuver in the longitudinal and lateral direction. Also, it always should be performed in consideration of dangerous factors. It is very important to decide the timing of lane change because the lane change is made momentarily and frequently in highway or local roads. In this paper, we propose the control point decision algorithm of our automatic lane change system using the threat evaluation index based on automatically command steering function (ASCF)international standard. The verification of the proposed algorithm is conducted by a scenario experiment using test vehicles.

title: Ethernet 기반 AVN Linux플랫폼환경에서 EarlyCamera시작시간 개선 안
keyword: AVN(헤드유닛),Linux(리눅스),Ethernet (이더넷),boot time(부팅시간),Performance enhancement(성능개선),IVI(차량 내 인포테인먼트)
abstract: In this paper, it is proposed a new structure that can preferentially execute the necessary processes in order to satisfy the operation within 2 seconds of the rear-view camera in the initial boot process. The proposed structure achieves the goal of operating the rear-view camera within 2 seconds by operating the System Daemon after executing the essential process through the early daemon. Our goal is to run the camera service within 1.4 seconds since boot.

title: Filesystem 구조 분석을 통한 Storage Memory 분석 기법 설계
keyword: Filesystem(파일시스템),Storage memory(저장 메모리),Linux(리눅스),AVN(헤드유닛),IVI(차량 내 인포테인먼트)
abstract: This paper analysis from ext4 file system to storage device driver. Ext4 is currently the default file system on Linux distributions and eMMC is popular storage device in embedded systems. But, there are very difficult to analysis several I/O layers in Kernel distribution. This paper propose methods how to analysis ext4 file system and storage device.

title: 고이득 관측기를 이용한 서스펜션 상대속도 추정 = Suspension Relative velocity estimation using High gain observer
keyword: High gain observer(고이득 관측기),Suspension relative velocity estimation(서스펜션 상대속도 추정),Quarter car test bench(1/4 차량 테스트 벤치),Semi-Active suspension(반 능동적 서스펜션)
abstract: 본 논문은 차량의 용수철 상질량에 장착된 가속도 센서를 기반으로 한 서스펜션 상대속도 추정 관측기를 다루었다. 서스펜션의 상대속도의 경우 차량의 승차감 개선을 위해 필요한 감쇠력 제어에 필수적으로 필요한 정보이다. 대부분의 기존 논문들은 뒷바퀴의 로드 입력이 앞바퀴에서 들어오는 노면 입력과 같은 입력이 들어온다고 가정하여 추정하는 알고리즘에 대해 다루었다. 하지만, 이는 뒷바퀴에서 들어오는 입력이 앞바퀴와 일정 시간 이후에 들어오기 때문에 차량의 속도를 정확하게 추정하지 못할 경우 오차가 크다. 그렇기에 본 논문에서는 상질량에 장착된 가속도 센서 하나만을 이용하며, 앞바퀴의 노면 입력을 사용하지 않는 관측기를 제안하였다. 새로운 관측기는 기존의 논문에서 사용한 노면 입력에 강건한 관측기에서 시작된다. 이후 관측기의 정확도를 올리고 관측기의 안정성을 위한 게인 값의 범위를 지정해주었다. 시뮬레이션을 통해 전 차량 모델에서의 관측기의 상대속도 추정 정확도를 검증하였다. 최종적으로, 새로 설계한 관측기는 여러 종류의 노면 입력으로 1/4 차량 테스트 벤치를 활용하여 실험적으로 검증되었다.

title: 실차에서의 샤크 핀 안테나와 노이즈 소스 간 전자기 노이즈 커플링 레벨에 대한 Full-Wave EM 시뮬레이션 = Full-Wave EM simulation on electromagnetic noise coupling between a shark fin antenna and a noise source in a vehicle
keyword: Shark fin antenna(샤크 핀 안테나),Noise coupling(노이즈 커플링),EM simulation(전자기 시뮬레이션),Antenna impedance matching(안테나 임피던스 매칭)
abstract: This study uses Full-Wave EM simulation to determine the noise level coupled between a blower motor mounted on a vehicle and a shark fin antenna. We build a model of the shark fin antenna and match impedance to change the receive frequency band from FM band to AM band. This shark fin antenna model is mounted on the roof of a vehicle model as it is mounted on a real vehicle. Small dipole and loop antennas are also modelled as source antennas to describe a blower motor noise source and mounted on the same place at which a real blower motor is. As a result, the S-parameter between the two antenna ports which shows the electromagnetic noise coupling is derived .

title: 디젤엔진용 SCR 후처리장치의 요소분해 개선을 위한 주요 설계인자들의 최적화 연구 = Optimization Study on the Major Parameters for Urea-decomposition Efficiency Improvement of SCR System in Diesel Engine
keyword: Diesel Engine(디젤엔진),Urea-based Selective Catalytic Reduction System(요소 선택적 촉매환원장치),Computational Fluid Dynamics(전산유체역학),Cummulative Density Function(누적밀도함수),Optimization method(최적화기법)
abstract: The Selective Catalytic Reduction(SCR) of nitrogen oxides by ammonia has been proposed as a solution for mobile diesel engines to meet automotive emission regulations. In this study, in order to improve the NOx removal efficiency of an automotive urea-based SCR system requires optimized injection system to minimize wall deposition film while providing uniform distribution of exhaust gases and reductant mixture in front of SCR catalyst. The focus of the current study is to optimize the injection parameters of Urea-Water-Solution(UWS), internal flow simulation was first performed using a computational fluid dynamics. In the computational fluid dynamics, the spray/wall interaction of injected UWS spray droplets and the heated surrounding gas is modeled using the Eulerian-Lagrangian approach. A specially validated wall deposition properties are implemented to simulate the depletion mechanism of individual UWS droplets. Also, to evaluate the influence of wall film on the atomized droplets, two different spray model are used. The results real that the Cumulative-Density-Function(CDF) spray model predicts the area and thickness of the wall deposit formation, which is important for the understanding of their impingement on wall. Next, a regression model was found by using the Optimization method, based on the results of the CFD analysis. Then, the optimal solutions of the injection parameters providing the highest ammonia conversion were compared with those of the base model.

title: 고정자 형상 변화를 통한 EV용 구동모터의 유기전압 고조파 저감 설계
keyword: Chamfer(챔퍼),Concentrated winding(집중권),Induced voltage(유기전압),Interior permanent magnet synchronous motor(IPMSM, 매입형 영구자석 동기전동기),North(노치),Slot opening(슬롯 오프닝),Traction motor(구동 모터)
abstract: This paper proposes the method of reducing induced voltage harmonics in high speed region through the stator optimal design of the electric vehicle traction moto. The design variables of the stator that are sensitive to lowering the induced voltage harmonics are selected using the analysis of variance(ANOVA). From the selected design variables, optimal design was carried out using the response surface method(RSM). Through the optimal design, the harmonic of the induced voltage is reduced so that the line to line induced voltage does not exceed the DC link voltage.

title: 시·공간 정렬을 이용한 다중 IR 대역 센서 모듈 시스템과 이를 이용한 이미지 융합 방법
keyword: Frame(프레임),Time Alignment (시간 보정),Spatial Alignment (공간 보정),IR Sensor(열화상센서),3D Depth Sensor (3차원 센서),RGB Sensor (카메라 센서)
abstract: In this paper, we propose a multi-IR sensor module system using frame synchronization and spatial alignment and time-space convergence method using the same. Especially, the space and time of frames and images obtained from thermal infrared sensor module, RGB sensor module and depth sensor module The present invention relates to a multi-IR sensor module system frame synchronization and image fusion method using synchronization.

title: Gazebo 시뮬레이터를 활용한 모바일 로봇의 장애물 회피 알고리즘 검증
keyword: Navigation(네비게이션),Obstacle avoidance(장애물 회피),Simulator(시뮬레이터),Mobile robot(모바일 로봇)
abstract: This paper deals with the validation of an obstacle avoidance algorithm, the dynamic window approaches, in different in-door navigation environments. The navigation environments come from the AutoRace challenge where a ROSenabled TurtleBot3 completes missions during self-driving. Among six missions, we selected two requiring obstacle avoidance, which are called roadworks and tunnel, respectively. They differ in the sense that the roadworks feature static obstacles while the tunnel is filled with obstacles whose number and position are not predetermined fixed. In order for TurtleBot3 to cope with the many different cases in navigating through obstacles, a ROS-compatible robot simulator, Gazebo, is used for the purpose of validating fine-tuned parameters in the ROS navigation package. By applying Gazebo prior to actual tests, the validation can be done in time-effective way. This enables TurtleBot3 to pass through roadworks and tunnel specifically with 3 obstacles in 13 and 14 seconds, respectively.

title: 도어모듈판넬의 강성 해석 정합성 향상 연구
keyword: PP(폴리프로필렌),GF(글라스 파이버),PP-GF(섬유강화폴리프로필렌),Door Module Panel(도어모듈),Deflection Analysis(구조해석)
abstract: The door Module is a structural steel part that is mounted inside a car door and assembled with a window guide rail, door latch and speaker. Steel have been used in the past, but they are being replaced by glass fiber reinforced plastics(GFRP). Due to the demand for lightweight, low density materials gave been developed through thinning thickness of panels and reducing of glass fibers. However, if the thickness is thinner and the fiber content is reduced, the stiffness of the panel is lowered. Therefore, the design and simulation technique for compensating the rigidity of the panel is required. In this study, the actual deformation amount of a door module panel injection molded with PP-GF20 material was measured and the simulation results and the accuracy were compared. By adjusting the flexural modulus of the PP-GF20 material, the accuracy could be increased from about 50% to 85%. It was found that the flexural modulus of the material should be measured in accordance with the molding design characteristics of the actual door panel.

title: 장시간 주행 허리 통증 예방을 위한 시트 Lower-Thoracic Support (LTS) 기술 개발
keyword: Seat(시트),Lower-thoracic support(흉부 하단 지지),Low back pain(요통),Long-term driving(장시간 주행)
abstract: The present study analyzed effectiveness of seat lower-thoracic support (LTS) technology for fundamental prevention of low back pain in long-term driving. A LTS was applied to T10 ~ T12 spine area on seat back by integrating with air cell in-/deflation system. Spine posture bending rates of non-lumbar and LTS were measured and compared by applying a 5-step spine posture estimation method (S1. non-lumbar support spine posture measurement, S2. optimal/maximum LTS spine posture measurement, S3. marker projection to spine, S4. spine posture estimation, S5. spine posture bending rate calculation). Posture and comfort satisfactions of non-lumbar and LTS for one-hour driving were evaluated per 5 minutes by eight seat experts using questionnaire with ten-point scale (0: extremely dissatisfied, 5: moderate, 10: extremely satisfied). The LTS seat makes bended-spine posture maximum 44% erect compared to non-lumbar seat. Posture and comfort satisfaction of LTS were higher 1.5 ~ 2.8 times compared to those of non-lumbar. The LTS can contribute to making/maintaining erect-sitting posture for prevention of lower back pain in long-term driving.

title: 하이브리드(알루미늄&스틸)타입 도어의 열변형 개선 구조 개발
keyword: Hybrid door,Door Panel,Aluminium,Steel,Adhesive,Corrosion,Thermal deformation,Hemming
abstract: It describes a hybrid door that is being developed in advance by applying aluminium to the outer panel with the greatest weight saving effect on the door and steel on the inner panel assembly requiring high formability and weldability.

title: 차량 전방위 충돌성능 고려한 중량절감 부품선정 프로세스 개발 및 자동화
keyword: Mass Innovation,Cost Innovation,Automation,Energy,Weight,WCI,Strain,SAF,Stress,SMI,Crash,Hyperworks,collision,Vehicle Safety
abstract:
Up to now, automobile vehicle CAE analysis has been focused on satisfying individual performance like as durability, vibration, safety, etc. using data from vehicle design division. Recently fuel economy has become more important in addition to basic performance. For this reason, efforts to increase fuel efficiency and reduce manufacturing cost also have become important at the same time.
  This study is concerned with the method and automation tool for selecting the parts that can reduce weight while considering the entire collision performance. This study introduce the objective analysis index in addition to the weight reduction activities that have been carried out from the past based on the collision analysis. It is possible to analyze the energy absorption rate, strain and stress generated in each part by considering all the collision modes to be considered during vehicle development. We conclude that this data analysis can maximize the weight reduction effect in the vehicle development process. In addition, by automating these indicators with the post-processing program Hyperwork, weight/cost reduction was maximized.

title: 범퍼처짐, 어퍼레그 상해 상충성능 최적화
keyword: Pedestrian protection(보행자보호),Equivalent Static Load Method(등가정하중법),Mechanism analysis(매커니즘분석),System design(시스템설계),Upper-leg,LS-DYNA
abstract: It is hard to make product which perfect satisfy both performance that has trade-off relation. Especially, performance of pedestrian injury in crash performance always has trade-off performance because of it needs reduce stiffness of vehicle component even though other performance need high stiffness. One of the difficult pedestrian injury is upper-leg that represent force and moment of femur and pelvis when it contact bumper cover, hood and head-lamps. Here trade-off relation occurred between upper-leg injury and body deflection of bumper cover that components need high stiffness for satisfy quality condition that avoid body deflection. Previous vehicle development process try to reduce bumper stiffness for upper-leg injuy first then bumper deflection is measured when proto product built if it is not satisfaction added stiffness design performed. In this paper, we try to reduce wasteful development process by 1) establish bumper deflection analysis method and 2)trade-off optimization analysis between bumper deflection and upper-leg injury.

title: C/Pad PAB 도어 설계 개발가이드 정립
keyword: PAB Door(도어),Deployment Stability(전개안정성),Optimal Factor(최적인자),Guide(가이드)
abstract: PAB Door is a structure to guide for airbag deployment. Door optimization design is essential for airbag deployment stability. This study for Door optimization proceeded in the following process, analysis of development car, catia modeling verification, effect factors test, drawing optimal factors and establishment of development guide. It will be applied to the guidelines of the vehicle development phases to enhance the airbag deployment stability.

title: 칵핏모듈 BSR 이음평가용 동시 다축 가진 모드 개발
keyword: Cockpit Module(칵핏모듈),Excitation Test(가진 시험),BSR (Buzz, Squeak, Rattle Noise)
abstract: In this study, We investigate the problem of the mode with existing cockpit module BSR. And we propose a new excitation mode method to implement a mode with a cockpit module that reflects the vibration motion of an actual vehicle when driving on the road. In the existing vibration evaluation method, it took 9 days to test the cockpit module of one car according to the direction of the vibration and temperature. Since the excitation forces of the lateral and fore-after were relatively small compared to vertical vibration, the evaluation time was long, but the BSR detection power was low and not efficient. To make up for this, we added a link to the table of existing excitation machine. And we have studied how to implement both vertical, fore-after and lateral, pitch and roll motion using two excitation machine.

title: Multi-materials CFRP/foam 적용 Side Body Structure 측면 충돌 해석
keyword: CFRP(탄소복합소재),Foam(폼),Side Body Structure(측면구조),Side Impact(측면충돌),Analysis(해석)
abstract: This study is developed for CFRP / foam application side body structure. The key technology is to develop lightweight and stable parts using side body structure CFRP integral body with reinforcing materials such as SMC, BMC, Foam etc. The purpose of CFRP / Foam reinforcement system is to improve cost competitiveness, reduce the weight by 35% and reduce the number of parts by 65%, thus simplifying the process.

title: 차량 탑승 인원에 기반한 2차경로 모델링 방법
keyword: Active Noise Control(능동소음제어),Secondary Path(2차경로),Filtered-X LMS(FxLMS 알고리즘),Numberof Occupants(차량 탑승 인원)
abstract: In this paper, we present a secondary path modeling method based on the number of occupants in the vehicle when we construct an active noise control system. In most ANC systems, a system that is not optimized for the number of occupants is designed and constructed when modeling the secondary path. The disadvantages of these systems are that the convergence performance of active noise control will decrease as the number of occupants changes and the risk of a loud bang noise may also be increased. To avoid these problems, we propose a method to change the number of occupants to measure the correct secondary path and activate active noise control with a system optimized for the number of occupants. We can confirm that an improved active noise control system configuration is possible through modeling and simulation experiments using the proposed method.

title: 경형 표준 전석 시트 프레임 개발
keyword: developing country(개발도상국),light (가벼운),weight(중량),enough(충분한),strength(강도)
abstract: The demand of car increases steadily in developing country(India, China, Brazil). Hyundai Motor Company makes every possible effort, for example adjusting upward the number of Car Manufacture for gaining share sales in developing country. For gaining cost competitiveness improvement, seat frame of previous version is applied in the automobile which is exported to developing country. But it doesn’t have enough weight competitiveness than rival car’s seat. Because of this reason, we must develop seat frame of new version which has light weight and enough strength.

title: 능수동 통합 보행자 능동 보호 시스템 개발
keyword: ADAS,Pedestrian,Active Hood,Euroncap,Kncap,safety,Active,Passive,Integrating,Protection
abstract: In this paper, introduce of Integrated Active & Passive Pedestrian Protection System. We try to provide our customers with a competitive pedestrian protection system that has been upgraded one stage by integrating active safety technology developed and existing manual safety technology existing. Secured competitiveness by utilizing information that predicts by ADAS pedestrian collision in cooperation with these new system

title: ADAS Fail-Safe를 위한 센서 검출 오류 발생시 전방 차량 트랙 관리 시스템에 관한 연구
keyword: Sensor Fusion system(센서 융합 시스템),Track Management System(트랙 관리 시스템),Sensor Fault(센서고장),Kalman Filter(칼만 필터),ADAS(첨단 운전자 보조 시스템),Fault Tolerant Control(고장허용제어)
abstract: Adavanced Driver Assistance System(ADAS) use a variety of sensors as their functions become more complex. Errors from each sensor cause fatal malfunctions in the entire system. Therefore a multi-sensor Fail-Safe algorithm for Advanced Driver Assistance System(ADAS) has been considered in this paper. We proposed a sensor track management system which diagnoses failure time of either Radar or Camera that lead to a fatal malfunction under the ADAS application performing. The system operates multi-sensor fusion with forward radars and a monocular camera under the supervision of Track Management System. The main purpose in this research lies in the field of track loss from vehicle detection fault. We have tested several simulation tests for analysis on the vehicle detection fault of time for ADAS Fail-Safe and three important tests of the results demonstrated that perception module among the entire ADAS system has an important role and should keep on diagnosing the sensor fail to hand it over to the next decision and control.

title: 대류난방 시 가습난방 모드에 의한 피부 습윤도 및 쾌적성능 변화
keyword: Convection Heating(대류난방),Humidification(가습),Dryness(건조),Thermal comfort(온열쾌적),Skin measurement(피부 측정)
abstract: Hot and dry air of heaters used in winter time causes dryness and discomfort to the occupants. Heating in cars also causes passengers discomfort due to its dryness, and there is a need for more comfortable heating mode. Therefore, the humidification heating mode applied with humid and heated air flow is tested to verify the performance of the heating air flow. The subject test showed that the decrease of relative humidity was not big when the temperature increased compared to conventional heating mode, and that the skin measurement showed higher stratum corneum hydration(SCH) and lower transepidermal water loss(TEWL) in humidification heating mode. This result showed the effect of humidification heating modes in winter, and later studies will require an evaluation in real car environment.

title: 브레이크 패드의 모재강도에 대한 형상 및 제조공정의 영향 연구
keyword: Brake Pad(브레이크 패드),Friction Material(마찰재),Strength(강도),Shape(형상),Scorching(스코칭),Finite element analysis(유한요소해석)
abstract: The physical properties of brake friction materials vary by shape or manufacturing condition. Futhermore, the shape of the lining is tuned to reduce braking noise. The strength of the friction materials is an important characteristic to prevent breakage and is directly related to braking performance. In this study, a method to check the strength of the friction materials and the effectiveness of each control factor on it is proposed through the evaluation of some cases. Also the results were reverified through finite element analysis. Through this study, it was found that the shape and contact area of friction materials greatly affects the strength of it.

title: 마모 타이어의 성능 변화 연구
keyword: Worn tire(마모타이어)
abstract:
In this study, we investigated the method to improve the noise component of tire when the tire is cornering. Since the noise is deteriorated due to the change of footprint on the cornering, it is necessary to find the cause of the NVH of deterioration through the tire characteristic test analysis for the cornering state.
In advance, tires running at a certain distance in the general market were collected, anechoic is tested in chambers and vehicle NVH tests. In addition, we proposed a method to improve the noise degradation on the cornering, and predicted the improvement effect of wear by simulation analysis and compared the noise improvement effect by applying the improvement method.
Therefore, this study presents the possibility of applying the improvement method to the tire pattern in the future by suggesting the tire characteristic analysis method, the pattern noise simulation method and the cause of the deterioration of the road noise and the improvement method for analyzing the cause of the deterioration of the cornering tire.
As the tire is cornering, the pattern noise and the road noise component of the high frequency component was deteriorated in the actual car and the room anechoic NVH chamber due to the leading edge of footprint. Analysis of pattern noise simulation and static characteristics showed that noise reduction was caused by block stiffness enhancement due to decrease of residual percent of kerf.
Through this study, it was possible to understand the cause of tire noise degradation on the cornering, and it is considered that deterioration NVH phenomenon can be improved by increasing the kerf ratio. Further progress is needed to suggest a detailed design guide.

title: K&C Test data를 활용한 조향축 지오메트리 계산
keyword: Steering Axis Geometry(조향축 지오메트리),Screw Axis Theory(스크류 축이론),K&amp,C(Kinematic &amp, Compliance)
abstract: Steering axis geometry is important thing in the vehicle handling and steering performances. And that information is necessary to make vehicle simulation model. Unfortunately in order to secure the steering axis geometry information, we need to suspension hardpoint data. In addition to, in case of multilink suspension, even if we have hardpoint data we can’t calculate steering axis geometry directly. This paper calculates steering axis geometry by using screw axis theory and K&C data. And verify by comparison with the ADAMS/Car simulation result and apply to K&C Test data which created by MTS K&C test system.

title: 후륜 현가계 커브형 스프링 적용을 통한 조종안정성 예측에 관한 연구
keyword: Handling Stability(조종안정성),Curved spring(커브형스프링),Vehicle Dynamic Analysis(차량동역학 해석),Wheel rate(휠레이트)
abstract: If consumers in the past demanded the powertrain performance of the vehicle, the recent trend is for consumers to favor vehicles with excellent handling and ride quality. Recently, vehicle makers are focusing on developing an active suspension that actively controlled between the handling performance of a sports car and the ride quality of a luxury car. In these days, in Korea, active air suspension system that can actively adjust ride comfort and steering stability by using pneumatic pressure is commercialized, but it has volume, weight and complex structure. This reserch propose a spring type active suspension module designed to overcome the disadvantages of the currently commercialized active air suspension. And to predict the steering stability through the analytical approach. In order to evaluate the stability of the vehicle through the analysis, the actual SUV vehicle was measured to construct the Adams Car model, and a model with more than 80% reliability was developed. Simulation of double lane change (DLC) and J-turn was carried out by applying spring active suspension module to the developed analytical model. The change of steering stability according to the mounting angle of the curved spring was confirmed. The validity of the steering stability according to the change of the wheel rate of the relevant system was judged..

title: 77GHz 레이더 센서 신호 처리 보드의 전원 무결성 시뮬레이션을 통한 공진 분석
keyword: Automatic Incident(돌발상황검지),Vehicle Detection(차량검지시스템),Incident Detection(도로 감시),Radio Detection and Ranging(레이더),Power Integrity(전원 무결성),Resonance Analysis(공진 분석)
abstract: As the development of technologies for collect and provide traffic information becomes more active, electromagnetic interference generated by the system are causing problems of malfunctions and noise. It was developed by applying to 77GHz radar electronic signal processing system for collecting and providing traffic information using power integrity analysis that minimizes resonance frequency, one of the sources of EMI. This will reduce the development time and cost of PCB designs and improve the reliability of electromagnetic waves in the 77GHz radar electronic signal processing system.

title: ADAS의 환경요인별 영향도 분석
keyword: ADAS(첨단운전자지원시스템),Test Condition(시험조건),Environmental factor(환경요인),Influence(영향도),FCW(전방추돌경보),TTC(충돌소요시간),RTK GPS(실시간 위치보정 위성항법시스템)
abstract: In this paper, the contents and the results of the tests performed to analyze the influence of environmental factors on ADAS are shown. RTK GPS is installed on the subject vehicle and target vehicles to calculate the position, speed, and TTC between the two vehicles. Environmental factors include general road conditions, rain, high temperature, gravel night and fog conditions. In the test, CCRs and CCRm test conditions for the Car-to-Car FCW are defined and performed so that the ADAS function can focus on the environmental influence. The influence analysis target is the TTC and distance calculated from the RTK GPS when the FCW function is activated.

title: 슬림 에어벤트 풍향성 확보 구조 연구
keyword: Cockpit Module(칵핏모듈),Air Vent(에어벤트),Crash Pad(크래시패드),Air Direction(풍향)
abstract:
본 논문에서는 상하 토출구 폭이 슬림화 되고 있는 차량용 에어벤트의 풍향성능을 확보하기 위한 신규 작동 구조에 대해 논하고자 한다. 신규 작동 구조 검토에 앞에서 현재 양산 중인 차량에서 보편적으로 적용되고 있는 에어벤트의 작동구조를 분석하고 토출구가 슬림화 될 때 발생할 수 있는 제약조건을 검토하였다. 이렇게 얻어진 제약 조건을 근거로 이를 개선/회피 하기 위한 신규 구조를 도출, 슬림화된 토출구 조건 내에서 풍향 성능 확보가 가능한 신규 에어벤트 모델을 설계하였다.
  풍향성 검증은 공조 해석 및 평가를 통해 진행하였다. 설계 데이터를 바탕으로 진행 된 공조 해석을 통해 신규 에어벤트 모델의 풍향성 경향을 우선적으로 확인하였으며, 3D 프린터를 이용하여 제작한 에어벤트 제품 및 Fog 시험장비를 통하여 신규 에어벤트 모델의 공조 성능을 검증하였다.
  이와 같은 검증 과정을 통해 슬림화된 디자인 제약을 갖는 에어벤트의 풍향 성능을 만족할 수 있는 에어벤트 작동 구조를 제안하고자 한다.

title: 전동 글로브 박스 액츄에이터 소음 저감 특성 연구
keyword: Glove Box (글로브 박스),Electronic Glove Box(전동 글로브 박스),Actuator (액츄에이터) Actuator Noise(액츄에이터 작동 소음)
abstract: 본 연구에서는 전동으로 작동하는 차량용 글로브 박스 액츄에이터의 동작 소음 특성에 대해 논하고자 한다. 글로브 박스 동작 중 액츄에이터에서 발생하는 소음의 원인 및 특성을 비교하기 위해 액츄에이터 내에서 가장 고속으로 동작하는 웜기어의 가공 정밀도에 대해 제품 제작, 평가, 분석을 진행하였으며 모터 진동에 의해 야기되는 소음의 특성 비교를 위해 진동 차폐구조의 재질 정도에 의한 영향도 분석을 진행하였다. 본 연구를 통해 고출력 통해 고출력 차량용 실내 액츄에이터의 소음 저감을 위한 설계, 품질 육성의 기준을 제안하고자 한다.

title: 단면 모멘트를 이용한 사출형 백빔 해석 최적화 연구
keyword: CFT(연속 유리 섬유 강화 열가소성 복합재료),TPO(사출형 플라스틱),CAE(컴퓨터 응용 엔지니어링),Gradient(구배),Section moment(단면 모멘트)
abstract: One of the most interesting areas in the automotive industry is lightweight. Among the many lightweight components, the back beam, which was originally made of steel, was developed as an injection type composite back beam using CFT and TPO. In order to develop the model, the collision analysis and the actual collision test were performed using CAE. Comparing the two results showed similarity of the data and the CAE model needs to be supplemented. The section moment was used to set the thickness with the same moment as the cross section containing the gradient. The results of the collision analysis again with the newly set section are similar to those of the test. It is confirmed that the method using the moment of the section reduces the actual test and error.

title: 상용차 디스크 브레이크의 변형량 예측에 관한 연구
keyword: Structural Analysis(구조해석),Lightweight Wheel Hub Module(경량휠허브모듈),Commercial Vehicle(상용차),Thermal Deformation(열변형)
abstract:
Recently, interest in fuel economy has been focused, and development of lightweight parts for improving fuel efficiency has been actively under way. In the case of buses or commercial vehicles that have a longer travel distance than cars and frequent loading and boarding, it is necessary to apply technology to reduce fuel consumption. Since the effect of lightweight on the vehicle is greater lower parts than upper parts, lightweight techniques of lower parts such as axles and brakes are being developed. However, the brake is the most important system that is responsible for the safety of the vehicle. So Structural stability should be ensured even if material and structure change occur for lightweight of brake system.
  In this paper, we tried to evaluate the structural stability of lightweight wheel hub module by braking. The lightweight wheel hub module consist of two part, flange part(aluminium) and disc hub(FCD material). The heat transfer characteristics and deformation of the disc by braking were predicted and the accuracy of the analytical model was improved by comparing the temperature of disc for analysis and test using dynamometer.

title: 결선법과 고장 모드에 따른 BLDC 모터의 비가역 감자 특성 연구
keyword: BLDC(브러시리스직류모터),Irreversible Demagnetization(비가역 감자),Winding Connection(결선),Delta Connection(델타결선),Y Connection(와이결선),Failure Mode(고장 모드)
abstract: The winding connection type for driving the BLDC motor includes a Y connection and a Delta connection, and selects the winding connection type considering the advantages and disadvantages of each type and the application of the BLDC motor. Generally, we compare and consider the impact on the design structure, torque ripple, noise, consumption current, and control characteristics. However, in the case of motors used in automotive system, various failure modes are occurred, and thereby safety and failure characteristics should be considered and reflected to the design of the motor. In this paper, a new standard for selecting the connection type is proposed by performing research on irreversible demagnetization characteristics by the winding connection type and the circuit failure mode. For this purpose, design parameters by the winding connection type are compared, and basic performance in a normal condition and characteristics of irreversible demagnetization are compared. In addition, irreversible demagnetization characteristics according to failure modes such as Short and Open of the circuit are compared, and confirm the impact of the winding connection type. The research is conducted on a BLDC motor for automotive system and the validation is carried out through FEA (Finite Element Analysis) electromagnetic field analysis tool.

title: 전기차 사용자의 충전소 이용에 영향을 주는 지리 환경적, 사회 경제적 요인에 대한 연구
keyword: Electric vehicles(전기차),charging stations(충전소),geoenvironmental factors(지리환경적 요인),socioeconomic factors(사회경제적 요인),multiple regression analysis(다중 회귀 분석),optimal location(최적 위치)
abstract: Since 2010, the spread of electric vehicles has increased rapidly around the world, but the limitation of travelable distance and the long charging time are constraints on the use of electric vehicles. So far, there has been a research on the placement strategy of charging stations but there are relatively less researches on the deployment strategy of individual charging stations from the perspective of private operators. In this study, the effects of geographical environmental and socioeconomic factors collected through information disclosure and public data portals on the use of charging stations are analyzed by multiple regression analysis. The results showed that there was a significant correlation between the use of the charging station and the geoenvironmental and socioeconomic factors, and there were the interaction effect between geoenvironmental factors and the socioeconomic factors. Therefore, this study suggests differentiation of charging station deployment strategy at the private sector and government level.

title: 캘리퍼 바디 적용 소재인 A357에 대한 기초물성 테스트에 관한 연구
keyword: Tensile Strength(인장강도),Elongation(연신율),Vickers Hardness(비커스경도),Tensile Test(인장강도),Caliper Body(캘리퍼바디)
abstract: Brakes are a key part of vehicle safety. In addition to core functions such as braking power and reliability, brakes are also required to improve fuel economy, reduce weight for carbon dioxide reduction, improve ride comfort, improve appearance, and improve the structure. To this end, the existing brake caliper body is made of main steel, and a light weight caliper body using aluminum is required in accordance with the global trend of improvement of fuel efficiency and environmental regulation. In this study, basic property test of caliper body using A357 material is performed The results were analyzed.

title: 친환경 차량 구동 모터의 초기각 자동추정에 관한 연구
keyword: Rotor Position Angle(회전자 초기각),IPMSM(매입형 영구자석 동기전동기),Traction Motor(구동모터),xEV(친환경차량)
abstract: In this paper, It proposes an algorithm that automatically estimates the initial angle of the rotor of a interior permanent magnet synchronous motor. The conventional passive method for estimating the initial angle takes a long time and its accuracy depends on the operator’s skill. The method of automatically estimating by applying the voltage vector is dependent on the cogging torque characteristics of the motor and the accuracy of the initial angle is reduced. Therefore, we proposed an imbalance algorithm to estimate the optimal initial angle information. The proposed method is applicable to all PMSM motors and useful to initialize to control the motor and verified through actual experiments.

title: MTPA제어를 통한 친환경 차량 구동용 모터의 손실분리에 관한 연구
keyword: MTPA(Maximum Torque Per Ampere),Loss(손실),IPMSM(매입형 영구자석 동기전동기),Traction Motor(구동모터),xEV(친환경차량)
abstract: In this paper, it propose the loss separation method for PMSM using MTPA control. It has been defined the loss separation method for induction and AC synchronous motors in IEC60034-2-1. However, for the PMSM (permanent magnet synchronous motor), there is no standards defined for the loss separation method. Therefore, the proposed method is applied to the IPMSM as described in IEC60034-2-1 for induction and AC synchronous motors usingMTPA control method and verified.

title: 고도 및 교통정보를 활용한 예측 등가 소비 최소 전략 도출
keyword: Hybrid Electric Vehicle (하이브리드 전기 차량),Energy management strategy(에너지 관리 방법),Instantaneous optimization control(순간 최적 제어),Equivalent Consumption Minimization Strategy(등가 소비 최소 전략),SOC(State of Charge : 배터리 충전 상태)
abstract: An optimal energy management strategy is necessary to improve fuel economy of Hybrid Electric Vehicles (HEV). Although horizon optimization strategy (e.g. Dynamic programming) guarantees global optimal solution, the strategy requires priori information about the entire optimization horizon and thus the strategy cannot be implemented in a real-time situation. Therefore, this paper proposed instantaneous optimization based Predictive Equivalent Consumption Minimization Strategy(P-ECMS) by utilizing traffic and road slope information. Battery state of charge (SOC) reference is predicted over distance. This SOC reference is adopted to supplement the limitation of ECMS, which is selection of the most suitable value of Equivalent Factor to guarantee optimality and charge sustainability for any driving conditions. As a result, the proposed PECMS achieves similar fuel economy with other instantaneous optimal control strategies like ECMS while still guaranteeing the real-time implementability.

title: Combined solution of V2G vehicle control system application for mass production EV
keyword: V2G,DER,Bi-directional,Communication Combined Unit,V2G code
abstract: In this paper, we describe specifications and design method of V2G bi-directional charging system on the mass production EV. It is archived with specific designed high - speed communication controller and bi-directional charging module with control. V2G main purpose is grid communication between EV and infrastructure. Also, EV can be used for DER. V2G EV is required bi-directional charging system management and dynamic charging control. Our proposed idea provides combined solution for heterogeneous or different electric architecture integration and make V2G bi-directional charging EV. Finally, Designed V2G code protocol is applied to the communication method and vehicle charging system management. It is evaluated various charging and vehicle performance.

title: 구동모터의 순환 전류 제어기를 이용한 친 환경차 등판 성능 개선
keyword: Hill Climbing Performance (등판 성능 개선),Traction Motor (구동모터),Current Circulation (순환전류),Equivalent torque (등 토크),Eco-friendly Vehicle (친 환경차)
abstract: This paper proposes a hill climbing performance improvement logic for traction motor of electric vehicle, through newly developed current circulation logic and a extended equivalent torque line current map. By changing the biggest current flowing switching element to the other switching element, the biggest heat generating switching element can be changed to the other switching element. Based on extended torque line current reference map instead of the usual MTPA current reference map this paper suggest the current circulation logic. With, proposed control scheme the actual output time of constant toque is increased more than 30% of conventional one and we can achieve high driving performance without additional hardware.

title: 플라스틱 재질 산포 구축 통한 도어트림 공차 분석 신뢰도 증진 연구
keyword: Standard Deviation (표준편차),GD&amp,T(Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing),3DCS(DCS社 공차분석 프로그램),Tolerance Analysis(공차 분석),Plastic resin(플라스틱 수지)
abstract: This study is on the enhancement of the reliability of tolerance analysis in manufacturing door trims of door interior components for motor vehicle boarding consisting of plastic. The analysis program used is based on a Monte-Carlo simulation that enters dimensions and tolerances (GD&T) in the drawing and analyzes the cumulative tolerance based on probability after defining movement between parts. The spread of resin, seasonal and dimensional changes used in door trim is obtained and applied to the tolerance analysis to increase reliability.

title: 센서기술을 이용한 금형이관 프로세스 구축 및 사출품질 표준DB화 기술
keyword: pressure in mold (금형내압),cycle time,monitoring system,clamp force,performance analysis,weld line,sink mark,flash
abstract: Recently, the Fourth Industrial Revolution is underway in all industries, among which Smart Factory plays an important role. According to these trends, the importance of securing standardized data and indicators that are the basis of process automation and data-based processes is emerging. In particular, the injection molding fields are still dependent on the know-how, so it is necessary to secure data-based indicators. In this study, the quality was matched with the pressure profile by using the in-mold sensor and data-based quality improvement methodology was established. In addition, the standardization of injection conditions for molds which are transferred to mass production centers to minimizing unnecessary loss contributing stabilization of early quality of product.

title: 차량 현가장치 볼조인트의 스웨이징 포밍에 대한 유한요소해석
keyword: Ball joint(볼조인트),Swaging forming(스웨이징 포밍),Abaqus(아바쿠스),Finite element model(유한요소모델),Pull out load(이탈하중),Caulking(코킹)
abstract: This study is to develop an analytical methodology for this ball joint swaging process to get the swaging forming load and the deformation shape of the case at the design stage. The analysis method of the case"s swaging foaming was performed with three finite element models and the analysis results by each interpretation method were compared. The three finite element models are two-dimensional axis symmetry caulking model, three-dimensional solid caulking model, threedimensional solid swaging model. It was investigated case deformed shape, case forming load, and ball stud pull out load by three analysis models. In addition, In order to verify the analysis results, The prototype was made and tested to validate the analysis results.

title: 초저비중 바디실러 개발
keyword: Body sealer(바디 실러),Low Density(저비중),Glass Bubble(글래스 버블),Watertight(수밀),Weight reduction(경량화)
abstract: For watertight and anti-corrosion, body sealer is applied to the panel overlapping region of car body. Depending on the need for lightweight of a car, the specific gravity of body sealer was reduced through application of lightweight fillers. However, when lightweight fillers are applied, there is a problem that the physical properties and workability of the sealer are lowered. In this study, we developed a body sealer with the same properties and workability as the existing ones by changing the PVC resin and controlling the contents, and contributed to the weight reduction of the vehicle.

title: 충돌 에너지 흡수량 증가를 위한 크래쉬 박스 설계 변수 영향도 분석
keyword: Crash box(크래쉬 박스),Absorbing energy(에너지 흡수량),Shape parameter(형상 변수),Buckling(좌굴),Impact(충돌)
abstract: 차량 전면에 장착되어 있는 범퍼와 크래쉬 박스는 차량 충돌 시 충돌 에너지를 흡수하여 탑승자의 사고 위험을 감소시키는 중요한 부품들이며, 본 연구는 차량의 저속 충돌 시 탑승자의 안전성을 높이기 위한 크래쉬 박스의 형상 변수들을 분석하였다. 크래쉬 박스의 에너지 흡수량을 증가시키기 위해 제어된 형상 변수들은 부품의 좌굴 현상에 영향을 줄 수 있는 단면 형태와 구멍의 크기, 개수이며, 각 분류에 따라 저속 충돌 시 작용하는 하중에 의한 Al6061-T6 재질 크래쉬 박스의 대변형을 유한요소 해석으로 진행하였다. 좌굴 현상, 충돌 하중 곡선을 결과값으로 도출하여 실제 Al6061-T6 크래쉬 박스의 거동과 비교/검증하였으며, 최종적으로 크래쉬 박스의 충돌 에너지 흡수량에 대한 단면 형태와 구멍의 크기, 개수에 대한 변수의 영향력을 비교하였다. 본 연구 결과는 크래쉬 박스의 단면 형태와 구멍 크기, 개수의 상호관계를 고려한 성능 개선 모델 설계 및 연구에 활용하고자 한다.

title: 북미 신경사 대응 PAB Door 설계 영향인자 연구
keyword: NHTSA(미국도로교통안전국),New oblique impact mode(신경사 충돌 모드),Instrument panel(계기판넬),PAB Door(동승석에어백 도어),Deployment(전개),DOE(실험계획법),FEA(유한요소해석)
abstract: Recently, the NHTSA is considering introducing a new oblique impact mode that reflects the slope collision condition, which is not reflected in the existing test methods, among many types of accidents caused by actual casualties. Unlike typical PAB, PAB that have to cope with a new oblique impact mode give more pressure to the PAB door when opening the PAB door. Therefore, the robustness of the PAB door structure was required, and the need for study of the PAB door influential factors that might affect the robustness was raised. In this study, we analyzed the behavior of PAB door and the influence of each factors on the development performance after selecting influence factors.

title: 온도 변화가 공압 기밀 검사 결과에 미치는 영향 분석
keyword: Pressure decay (감압 측정법),Air leaking test (기밀 시험)
abstract: This paper is about an analysis of the effects of the temperature which afftecs on pressure decay while air leaking test is performed. Usually, a method called "Pressure decay mesurement is used when air leaking test is needed. However, this method has a limitation because the volume of air changes due to the ambient temperature. Therefore, the theoretical analysis of the correlation between the air temperature change and the change of volume should be performed. To confirm the validity of theoretical analysis, we perform present experimental results obtained from a prototype. This paper shows that not only the pressure of the air, but also the temperature should be considered for better accurate air leaking test.

title: 차량용 엔코더씰에 대한 성형성 및 실험적 연구
keyword: Encoder - Seal(엔코더씰),Magnetic fiux density(자속밀도),3D Measurement(3차원 측정),Tensile Strength(인장시험),Test Evaluation(시험평가)
abstract: The encoder seal corresponds to the speed sensor in the wheel bearing and is assembled between the hub and the knuckle to transmit the rotation and steering of the hub. In addition, it is mounted on the car wheel drive bearing and detects the change of the output signal when the rotation and stop between each wheel is detected. It is an important part to drive the ABS and it operates according to the magnetic N / S output signal. , A high-power encoder seal with a MAG flux density of 1.3mT or more, a single pitch error of within ± 1.8%, and a total pitch error of 3.0% or less at an air gap of 3.0 mm is required. In this paper, the quality and test evaluation of encoder seal using ferrite compounding and spinning process optimization method were performed. First, the error measurement of the encoder seal was verified by comparing the 3D modeling with the SCAN DATA. The mechanical properties of the rubber compound were evaluated and it was verified that the corrosion and distortion of the seal occurred. Evaluation was performed to confirm the physical properties.

title: 리튬 이온 전지의 온도 변화에 대한 안정화 시간
keyword: OCV(개방전압),SOC(충전상태),SOH(노후화),Relaxation Time(휴지기),Steady State(정상상태),IR(내부저항),BMS(배터리제어시스템)
abstract: Recently, lithium batteries have been used everywhere. Lithium batteries have the problem of explosion or ignition as opposed to the rechargeable advantage. Therefore, a protection circuit is used for the safety of the battery. One of the typical functions of this BMS(Battery Management System) is capacity and life measurement. The most basic way to measure of the battery is to use the OCV-SOC table. Initially, the only information we can find is temperature and voltage, so we can use the voltage and temperature to predict the state of charge of the battery. However, this prediction only holds when the voltage red from battery is OCV(Open Circuit Voltage). In the case of BMS, since the voltage is not recorded in the OFF state, the calculation is performed assuming that a hour break time is stabilized using the RTC(Real Time Clock). This is an experience gained through several charge and discharge experiments. However, the authors of this paper do not know about the influence of temperature on the change. It is intended to observe the stabilization time by temperature change.

title: 에어 서스펜션 부품 개발을 위한 Al6061 소재의 후방 충격압출 일체 성형공정 설계인자에 관한 연구
keyword: Backward impact extrusion(후방충격압출),Gas bulge forming(가스벌지성형),Unfulfilled zone(미충진영역),FEA(유한요소분석법),Rigid-Plastic(강-소성),Effective-Stress(유효응력),Effective-Strain(유효변형률)
abstract: This study has conducted a forming analysis to establish design factors optimized for process of backward impact extrusion one-piece molding process. backward impact extrusion and gas bulging were performed, Finite element analysis was carried out assuming rigid-plastic and isotropic materials. In the backward impact extrusion analysis, The effective-stress distribution was higher than the tension test results. However, The materials fluidity was shown by the somewhat low critical damage value. It is expected that the shape completeness will increase if the thickness of the backward impact extrusion product decrease over the high temperature, high pressure and retention time in the gas bulging molding analysis.

title: 비반복 커플링 방식의 연동시뮬레이션을 위한 수치해석법
keyword: Co-Simulation (연동시뮬레이션),Causality Conflict (인과성충돌),Inter-loop (내부루프),Non-Iterative Coupling (비반복커플링),Extrapolation(외삽),Coupling Error (커플링오차)
abstract: Interloop between various subsystems of various automotive domains is critical issue during the co-simulation of virtual vehicle prototype because it affects the simulation results seriously. One practical way to resolve the interloop problem is to use the non-iterative coupling process with which coupling signals of the subsystems are interpolated consequently during the co-simulation. In this way, coupling errors are accumulated by consecutive interpolations so appropriated coupling methods should be selected according to subsystem characteristics. In this paper, various numerical techniques which are applicable to the non-iterative coupling processes are investigated, and their simulation results are compared with a dynamometer system model which is used in an E-Drive testbed.

title: 회전체 열화 평가 및 고장진단
keyword: Degradation assessment,Fault diagnosis,Feature extraction,Bearing
abstract:
The life expectancy of the rotating unit used in various places in the vehicle is difficult to observe and predict the state of life due to the change of the vibration pattern according to the cause of various defects. The pattern of vibration depends on the degree of degradation of the bearing, and even if you try to record and judge it, the capacity of the measured data increases rapidly with time, making it difficult to store and utilize it. Therefore, various methods for predicting the lifespan of a rotating unit, especially a bearing, have been studied, and it is necessary to accurately grasp the state information of the rotating unit.
In this paper, a signal processing and clustering system for vibration information proposed by using an experimental data set with an attached radial sensor attached to the bearing test rig to understand the state information of the rotating unit. The clustered state information was proposed to enable faster and more efficient analysis of signal processed vibration information. This method shows that it is possible to classify the same fault information that occurred in different test sets, so it is expandable that can be classified even if new vibration information of a rotating unit is input. Also, it is an economical classification method because it does not need to deal with a large amount of accumulated data when building a monitoring system with a relatively simple clustering method.

title: 비파괴 검사를 응용한 현가 시스템의 디스크 평가방법 개발
keyword: SAM(초음파 현미경),Suspension(현가 장치),Transducer(초음파 변환 장치),Resolution(해상도),Wave form(파형 그래프)
abstract: The reliability test is conducted in-house to analyze the differences due to fatigue of good and high quality products using scan acoustic microscope. In this paper, the scan acoustic technology was applied to analyze the metal disc material that used a shock absorber piston valve inside front strut system of automobile suspension system. First, the fatigue level was evaluated through the image transmitted from the SAM, and the second was that figure out the evaluation method using a formula with wave form. The measurements implemented images of positive and negative, and color image mapping was indicated the degradation of disc samples. Therefore, we analyzed the difference of density and structure of disc using SAM, and it was confirmed that the degree of fatigue is different depending on the position of the disc.

title: 이중 사출을 통한 이색 스티치 구조 연구
keyword: stitch (스티치),Garnish (가니쉬),Crash Pad (크래쉬패드),Double Injection (이중사출)
abstract:
본 연구에서는 차량 내장재의 데코레이션 요소중 하나인 스티치 구조에 대해 논의하고자 한다.
내장재 가식을 위한 스티치를 구현 함에 있어서는 다양한 공법들이 적용되고 있는데 각 공법의 원가적인 측면이나 감성적인 측면 등이 고려되어 차량 인테리어의 중요한 요소 중 하나로 적용되고 있는 상황이다.
일반적으로 최고급 차종에는 실제 실을 박음질하여 다소 비싼 생산 원가임에도 불구하고 고급감을 극대화 하기위한 포인트중 하나로 적용되고 있으며 중저가 차종에서는 생산원가 적인 측면을 고려하여 스티치 형상이 금형내 가공된 인몰드 공법이 적용되고 있다.
본 연구에서는 기본적으로 금형내 스티치 형상을 가공하여 원가를 최적화 하는 공법을 적용하되 스킨과의 이색 스티치를 구현함으로써 기존 인몰드 스티치 공법이지만 실제 실을 박음질을 한 것과 같은 효과를 구현하는 연구를 진행하였다.
연구 진행 과정 중에 실 형상 특성에 기인한 구조적인 취약점으로 인해 다양한 외관 품질 문제가 발생하였다.
본 눈문에서는 이러한 품질 문제에 대한 원인과 개선 방향에 대해 논의하고자 한다.

title: 칵핏 글로브박스 에어댐퍼 댐핑력에 따른 오픈속도 작동성 연구
keyword: Glove Box(글로브박스),Air Damper(에어댐퍼),Opening Time(열림시간),Operation Sensitivity(작동감성),Damping Force(댐핑력),Optimization(최적화)
abstract: The cockpit Glove Box is a functional component that stores personal items and operated by the user. The operation of the Glove Box involves the user opening to store the item and an open operation occurs at a constant speed. The air damper, the component that makes up the Glove Box is a damping device that controls the opening time. From the user"s perspective, the opening time should not be too fast or too slow. In addition, certain characteristics should be maintained in different environments (high/low temperatures).

title: 모델 기반 시험을 이용한 고위험 안전 검증 기술
keyword: UUT(Unit Under Test),HILS(Hardware in the Loop Simulation),Real-time platform,Functional Testing,ECU Calibration,BSR(Buzz Squeak and Rattle),ISO26262
abstract:
To accelerate system testing at early development stage of the product development process, model-based system testing capabilities are developed. Urgent needs to enhance efficiency, reduce costs and protect the vehicle test drivers from hazardous incidents were among its original intentions. Most of the steering related bench performance tests were confined to basic measurements of mechanical or electrical characteristics of the steering system in the past. But the advent of digital era has made the bench test go beyond the rigs to simulate the realistic behavior of UUT under vehicle environment. Actuators can now be individually controlled with precision to generate realistic forces and positions in real-time to produce vehicle dynamics which are calculated by vehicle model. By using this kind of methods most of the steering maneuvers could be realistically reproduced with no hazard to the driver and steering characteristics could be investigated in a more quantified manner.
  For High-risk steering maneuvering, the entire spectrum of the vehicle tests were listed and screened to choose the most-hardto-quantify and risky tests and tests were conducted by using HILS platform on a correlated and automated basis. Beside this, reinforced performance testing conditions were developed for validation of steering dynamics and BSR related testing. And by doing that prepared for the autonomous driving test base onwards. The methods proposed here allowed to keep the model based test as references for steering performances, thus, increasing the effectiveness of the validation by reducing the number of vehicle test at an early stage of development.

title: 원가 경쟁력 확보를 위한 무도장 스위치 베젤 개발
keyword: Switch Bezel,Paint,Appearance Quality,Cost-reduction,Injection Molding,Material
abstract:
As competition among car-makers grows, the cost and the interior luxury are becoming important factors. However, both the cost and the interior luxury are incompatible elements and can’t be satisfied. So It is necessary to optimize between the cost and the interior luxury. Door trim in Hyundai apply wrapping, garnish, lighting and paint for the interior luxury. While wrapping, garnish and lighting can be highly appreciated by customers, paint tend to be inefficient compared to cost due to low recognition of customers. In particular, paint of a swich bezel on a door trim is applied to improve the simple appearance problem that is caused by injection part rather than customer’s needs. Thus,
We conduct to delete unnecessary luxury factor(Paint) for cost reduction and develop the paintless door switch bezel.
In this paper, we describe the various aspects of development in material, mold, design, appearance quality and cost-reduction related to the development of the paintless door switch bezel.

title: 지능형 트랙터 스티어링 너클 응고해석에 대한 연구
keyword: Solution strengthened ferritic castiron(고용강화페라이트주철),Steering knuckle(스티어링너클),Sand casting(사형주조),Solidification Analysis(응고해석),Filling Sequence(유동해석),Solidification Sequence(잔류용탕)
abstract: The product to be developed is a high-power intelligent agricultural machine steering knuckle of SSF cast iron for replacement of FCD500, a key component that supports the load and impact of the road surface on the agricultural machine axle while delivering the driving force and braking force of the wheel to the frame. As the demand for improved battery efficiency following the intelligentization of agricultural machinery and the development of electric drive-based tractors requires the compaction and high strength of current components, the application of SSF cast iron, which has improved properties than the existing FCD500 material, is necessary. In addition, research is being carried out globally for the commercialization of eco-friendly, high-efficiency tractors such as electric tractors and hybrid tractors, and these electric energy-based tractors have the advantage of securing high torque in a moment like electric vehicles, but this causes loads on the tractor"s steering axle system, requiring improved strength of parts materials. In order to improve these areas, the present study developed cast iron knuckle for agricultural machinery which shows superior mechanical properties compared to conventional cast iron steering knuckle and earlier verified the shrinkage of cast iron through fluid coagulation analysis of knuckle.

title: IC 기관 흡입공기내 연소 촉진제 혼합에 따른 배기가스와 연비 특성에 대한 실험적 연구
keyword: Brown Gas(브라운가스),Intake Manifold(흡기다기관),Exhaust Gases(배기가스),Fuel Efficiency(연비 ),Combustion Chamber(연소실),Combustion Accelerator(연소 촉진제)
abstract: When a small amount of Brown gas was mixed and burned through an intake manifold of a gasoline engine, the exhaust gases and fuel efficiency characteristics of the engine were analyzed. In the previous study, the characteristics of the engine performance according to Brown gas mixing were analyzed. Brown gas has different properties from hydrogen. It is a completely non-polluting gas made from electrolysis of water. It is a mixed gas with a hydrogen to oxygen ratio of 2:1, which is the same as that of water(H2O). In this study, an experimental device was constructed to supply a small amount of Brown gas into the air entering to the combustion chamber by connecting a Brown gas generator to the intake manifold of a gasoline engine. The characteristics of exhaust gas and fuel efficiency according to the addition of Brown gas as a combustion accelerator were analyzed.

title: EV감속기 디스커넥터 적용에 따른 효율 고찰
keyword: Dis-Connector(디스커넥터),Differential Gear(차동기어),Air Resistant(공기저항),Rolling Resistant(구름저항),Drag Torque(드래그 토크)
abstract: Recent Car Makers try to increase of electric vehicle efficient. Most of customers considering maximum range of vehicle when they choose model. In this Study, apply Dis-Connector on second motor+reduction gear, and measure reduce of drag torque with several speed and oil temperature. This result can be help you, why E-4WD electric vehicle need Dis-Connector.

title: 수소연료전기차 공기압축기용 초고속 영구자석 동기전동기의 AC 동손 해석
keyword: Hydrogen fuel cell electric vehicle(수소연료전기차),Ultra-high-speed motor(초고속전동기),Air compressor(공기압축기),Skin effect(표피 효과),Proximity effect(근접 효과),Copper loss(동손)
abstract: This paper deals with the analysis of AC copper loss in a high-speed permanent magnet synchronous motor used in an air compressor of a hydrogen fuel cell vehicle. In order to drive the motor at high speed, a high frequency input current is required, which causes large AC loss due to skin effect and proximity effect to the motor winding. For the analysis of AC copper loss, it is very time consuming to analyze 3D-FEM by modeling the number of turns and strands of the motor coil. Therefore, in this paper, we proposed a simple analysis method of AC copper loss prediction by dividing the active part winding loss and the end winding loss with the 2D-FEM. The effect of AC copper loss according to the number of strands was verified through the 2D-FEM and experiments by evaluating the actual motor applied to an air compressor.

title: 2층 HVAC 시스템의 오프 사이클 연비 효과 결정 방법에 대한 연구
keyword: 2-Layer HVAC(2층 HVAC),lumped capacitance method(집중용량법),CAFE(기업평균연비규제제도),5-Cycle(5-사이클 평가방법),Response Surface Design(반응표면법)
abstract: 이 연구는 히터코어의 환기 및 열 손실을 감소시키는 2층 HVAC 시스템의 오프 사이클 연비 효과를 결정하는 방법론을 제시하였다. 이 테스트는 2016 Lexus RX350(3.5L, 8단 자동 변속기) 차량으로 다양한 외기 온도 조건에서 EPA 주행 모드를 이용하여, 2층 HAVC 기술 유무에 대해 엔진 예열 변화에 따른 엔진 효율의 차이를 측정하기 위해 수행되었습니다. (2층 HVAC 기술 미적용 : 외기 모드) 이 실험 데이터들은 열에 대한 함수로 차량 효율을 예측하는 단순화된 반응 표면 및 집중 용량 차량 열 모델을 개발하는데 사용되었다. 이 차량 모델은 도로 주행 테스트에서 측정한 데이터 베이스로 통합되었고, 수십만 번의 주행 사이클 동안 계절별 열 부하 및 구동 조건에서 차량 효율을 시뮬레이션 하기 위해 미국의 기상 데이터와 결합하였다.

title: 건설기계 Product Support 기술 대응에 관한 고찰
keyword: Product Support(양산 대응),Technical Service(기술 서비스),Labor Time Guide(작업시간 가이드),Standard(표준),Check List(점검표),Construction Equipment(건설기계)
abstract: 건설기계 시장의 다변화로 고객 요구 수준은 나날이 높아지고 있으며 이에 상응하는 제품 서비스 제공을 위한 Product Support의 중요성은 더욱 커지고 있다. 특히 기술 대응에 있어서 고객 접점인 Product Support 부문과 품질 및 연구개발 부문의 협업은 그 어느 때보다 긴밀하게 진행되어야 하며 이를 통한 고객 만족은 우리 제품에 대한 신규 수요 창출과 더불어 기존 고객의 이탈을 방지하고 자연스레 재구매로 이어질 것이므로 우리 기술 개발 방향은 Product Support에 초점이 맞춰져야 한다.

title: 무인 굴착기 자율 제어 시스템 개발
keyword: Concept-X(컨셉트 엑스),Autonomous excavator(무인 굴착기),Unmanned excavation system(무인 굴착 시스템),Autonomous excavator control system(무인 굴착 제어 시스템),Intelligent excavation system(지능 굴착 시스템),ROS(로봇 오퍼레이팅 시스템)
abstract: The global construction industry is becoming smart as it moves away from the traditional labor-intensive. Doosan Infracore presented a business model that maximizes efficiency and productivity via Concept-x demonstration. This paper introduces the autonomous excavator control system, which was developed by Doosan Infracore Corporation to participate in the Concept-X Project. The unmanned excavator has perception, planning, and control system. In perception system, the unmanned excavator recognizes the surrounding environment and classify the obstacle using various sensors installed on the excavator. In planning system, the excavator estimates work sequence plans, operation trajectory and driving routes. In control system, the unmanned excavator performs work safely and accurately. The performance of the control system is verified with experimental data obtained from Concept-X demonstration scenario.

title: 회전자의 기계적 강성을 고려한 터보차저용 초고속 모터 설계
keyword: Electric turbo charger(전동식 터보차저),Mechanical stress(기계적 응력),Rotor design(회전자 설계),Stiffness(강성),Ultra-high-speed Motor(초고속 모터)
abstract: This paper presents design process of ultra-high-speed motor for electric turbo charger considering mechanical stiffness. As the rotational speed of the motor increases, the stress of the rotor increases proportionally to the square of the rotational speed. Therefore, the design is carried out in consideration of not only electrical characteristics but also the mechanical stiffness and of the motor. In this paper, we proceed with the design of the ring type SPMSM with can for electric turbo charger using the following method. First, stress equations based on the radius of the rotor is derived from the equilibrium equations. Then limitation of the outer diameter of a rotor in consideration of stiffness is determined. And then rest of design variables are determined considering electrical characteristics of the motor.

title: 버추얼 개발 환경을 활용한 MDPS 조타감 성능 예측
keyword: Virtual development(버추얼 개발),Steering feel performance(조타감),Performance prediction(성능 예측),HILS(Hardware-In-the-Loop Simulation),MDPS(모터 구동 파워 스티어링)
abstract: Recently, the automotive industry is facing a transition to the MECA(Mobility, Electrification, Connectivity and Autonomous driving) era. In order to transition to the MECA era, it is essential to shorten the vehicle development cycle, and it is necessary to convert the conventional physical development environment into a virtual development environment. In the virtual development environment, early performance development and sufficient verification are possible in the early stages of design, thereby ensuring efficient quality. In this paper, the design process for MDPS steering feel performance prediction and early performance development using HILS-based virtual development environment is proposed.

title: 스테빌라이저바 링크의 피로강도 평가를 위한 해석적 연구
keyword: Fatigue analysis(피로해석),Stabilizer bar link(스테빌라이저바 링크),Finite element method(유한요소법),Ball stud(볼스터드),Bending fatigue(굽힘피로),Fatigue cycle(피로수명)
abstract: In this study, the fatigue strength analysis method of stabilizer bar link was investigated using finite element method. In the vehicle fatigue test, the ball stud of stabilizer bar link was broken. To investigate the reason of ball stud fatigue fracture, material stress-fatigue cycle curve of ball stud was made about 3 load cases. The fatigue analysis results of ball stud was compared in case of ball stud bending fatigue and stabilizer bar link fatigue. The ball stud bending fatigue result was not reasonable to vehicle fatigue test result. but, stabilizer bar link fatigue analysis result was similar to vehicle test result. The effects of offset magnitude on the fatigue cycle of ball stud was investigated by finite element method.

title: 운전자 생리 신호 측정 기법을 이용한 Steer-by-Wire 시스템의 Controllability 평가 방법 연구
keyword: SbW(Steer-by-Wire, 전기신호식 지능형 조향 시스템),RWA(Road Wheel Actuator, 전동식 차륜 조향 장치),SFA(Steering Feedback Actuator, 전동식 조향 반력 장치),HR(Heart Rate, 심장 박동률),GSR(Galvanic Skin Response, 전기 피부 반응),Controllability (조종성),ECG(Electrocardiogram, 심전도)
abstract: In the ISO 26262 Functional Safety Study, only the subjective rating through the Jury Test was used to assess the controllability. This study presents an objective evaluation method by applying physiological signal analysis methods. The subjects will conduct a subjective rating of the controllability according to the instructed rating scale, for conditions in which there is no torque feedback by the SFA due to a failure during cornering. The subjective rating used in this study, obtained reliability through the analysis of physiological signals during the failure. For heart rate (HR), no significant tendency was found, but skin conductivity (GSR) was analyzed using grouping methods to confirm the tendency of controllability, which was also statistically significant. Therefore in rating comfort of Lv.5 autonomous driving, GSR can be used as objective parameters.

title: 분할코어를 적용한 EPS용 SPMSM의 설계변수에 따른 조립공차에 의한 코깅토크 분석
keyword: Cogging torque(코깅토크),Design Variable(설계변수),EPS(Electric power steering),Slot-opening(슬롯 오프닝)
abstract: The EPS system is a driving aid that can improve the steering performance of the vehicle and reduce the driver’s burden of steering. However, because the EPS system is driven by a motor, it must be affected by the cogging torque generated from the motor. Moreover, when the assembly tolerances occur, the magnitude of the cogging torque will directly affect the steering performance of the vehicle. Therefore, in order to improve the cogging torque, factors affecting the cogging torque should be identified. In this paper, according to assembly tolerance, a 12pole-18slot motor is selected to analyze the factors affecting the cogging torque. Firstly, select the design parameters around the air gap. Secondly, determine the range of Slot-opening, Tooth-tip and PM thick which are the design variable of the motor. Finally, determine the tendency of the magnitude of torque and harmonic order of torque to vary with the design variable.

title: 분할코어를 적용한 EPS용 SPMSM의 극, 슬롯 수에 따른 조립공차에 의한 코깅토크 분석
keyword: Cogging torque(코깅토크),EPS(Electric power steering),Segmented-core(분할코어),Assembly tolerance(조립공차)
abstract: As interest in the environment increase, the automobile parts market is increasingly trying to change from the mechanical system to the electrical system. In order to replace the mechanical system with the electrical system, many studies have been conducted to improve the performance of the electrical system because the electrical system must perform better than the mechanical system. However, there are few studies on tolerances that occur during actual production compared to studies on improving electrical performance. Due to the tolerances that occur during production, products with lower performance than actually expected can be produced. This paper intends to confirm the change in motor cogging torque due to the stator inner diameter tolerance applied to the segmented core, which is frequently applied to motors.

title: 종방향 속도 프로파일에 의한 정지 및 출발 시스템
keyword: Vehicle Longitudinal Control (차량 종방향 제어),Stop and Go (정지 및 출발),Velocity Profile (속도 프로파일),Ride Comfort (승차감),Autonomous Driving (자율주행)
abstract: In this paper, we propose a stop and go (SG) system with a velocity profile. To complete smooth velocity control and stop at the desired stop point, velocity profile of three phases is designed. In the first and second phases, we design the velocity profile within the pre-defined maximum acceleration and jerk until the vehicle reaches a near point before the stop point. Once the vehicle passes the near point, the vehicle is controlled by a position to make an exact stop at the stop point. The velocity profile is considered with the maximum jerk, the maximum acceleration, time gap for any situation, and distance to go, etc. The proposed SG system is compared with conventional adaptive cruise control with CarSim and MATLAB/Simulink.

title: 노브러쉬 세차기용 3-way 노즐에 대한 거시적 분무특성 연구
keyword: Car wash system(세차시스템),No brush(노브러쉬),Self car wash(셀프세차),Nozzle(노즐),Contact Type(접촉식),Non contact type (비 접촉식),Injection volume(분사량),Spray angle(분사각)
abstract: The car wash system is classified into an automatic car wash, a self car wash, a door type car wash, and a tunnel type car wash according to the operation method. The contact type is equipped with a brush, and the non-contact type is a device that cleans only with high-pressure water and detergent while being a knob-rush. Contact-type car washes that are currently on sale are structured to clean the vehicle surface with a brush when the vehicle enters, so there is a high possibility of scratching, and when the brush replacement period exceeds the exchange cycle for 3 years, keratin is formed on the surface of the brush and the tip is There is a disadvantage that it is cracked and leaves more scratches on the vehicle, resulting in poor washing power. To compensate for this, we intend to develop a multi-directional high-pressure rotating nozzle module with strong cleaning efficiency in a non-contact type car wash and a sponge roller care that adsorbs along the vehicle surface as it is, and in this paper, macroscopic pressure is applied through a basic nozzle injection test. Performance evaluation was conducted for the injection angle and the injection amount according to.

title: 초소형 전기차용 중공형 P-EPS에 관한 연구
keyword: Hollow shaft type motor(중공형 모터),P-EPS(피니언 타입 전동식 조향 시스템),High voltage ECU (고전압 제어장치),Micro Electric Vehicle(초소형 전기 차량),Planetary gear(유성 기어)
abstract: This study on a hollow type pinion electric power steering system using a high voltage of a Micro Electric Vehicle. A study was conducted on the design of applying a high voltage source of an electric vehicle to the circuit as it was, and developed a steering control logic for the Micro Electric Vehicle. This study is the result of verifying the applied data of high voltage source and the Micro Electric Vehicle electric power steering system different from the existing electric power steering system using the simulator.

title: 국내 도로 환경에서의 자율주행을 위한 객체 검출 알고리즘 평가 및 검증 플랫폼 개발
keyword: Autonomous Vehicle(자율주행),Object detection evaluation(객체 검출 평가),Dataset(데이터세트),TTC(충돌소요시간),Autonomous driving scenario(자율주행 시나리오)
abstract: 최근 자율주행을 위하여 인지 센서를 이용한 객체 검출 연구가 활발히 진행되는 반면에 이를 검증할 수 있는 플랫폼이 부족하다. 국외의 공개 데이터세트(KITTI, CityScapes 등)를 이용하여 인지 알고리즘을 평가할 수 있지만, 국내의 도로 상황과 다른 부분이 있어 국내 도로환경에서 자율주행을 검증하는데 한계가 있다. 따라서 본 논문에서는 국내 도로 환경에서의 자율주행을 위한 객체 검출 알고리즘 평가 및 검증 플랫폼을 제안한다. 데이터 취득은 자율주행 차량과 동일한 센서 구성을 한 차량으로 취득하였고 다양한 use-case에 대한 데이터를 취득하였다. 평가는 2D time-to-collision(TTC)와 mean Average Precision(mAP)를 이용하여 평가한다.

title: 아연도금 방청 강판 용접속도에 따른 기공 품질 영향도 연구
keyword: Welding Bead(용접 비드),Suspension(서스펜션),Weld Strength(용접 강도),Weld Durability(용접 내구력),Welding Speed(용접 속도)
abstract: This paper introduce how welding speed affects the blowhole quality of galvanized steel weld bead. Welding is a functional part that connects each metal panels and endure stimulus from the tire wheel. Weld Strength & Durability is the most important performance for the stability of the suspension vehicle and blowhole effects on Weld Strength & Durability critically. In this paper, blowhole quality is compared according to the weld speed and based on the results, we proposed the optimal weld speed.

title: 러버와 유체 시스템을 분리한 역상형 엔진마운트 개발
keyword: Reverse Engine Mount,Separation,P/Train,Hydraulic Mount,insulation
abstract:
The main role of the engine mountings is to hold the P/Train in the vehicle and insulate the vibration. Therefore, the main material of the engine mount consists of rubber with excellent vibration insulation. However, the behaviour of the P/train needs to be controlled in accordance with the demand for high speed driving and continuous vibration performance improvement, so the fluid system was applied. A fluid system consisting of orifice tubes will have damping performance at specific frequencies, controlling the behaviour of P/Train. However, the application of fluid mounts has the disadvantage of having high frequency dynamic characteristics disadvantage due to fluid, a non-compressive material inside rubber. As the high frequency dynamic characteristics increase, the mass damper lamp of more than 1 kg is continuously applied at each stage of development of the vehicle due to the deterioration of the combustion sound and acceleration transmission sound of the diesel engine. Mass dampers play a role of improving vibration sensitivity, but are very unfavorable structures in terms of cost and weight.
