Thus, in this paper, the reverse-phase mount structure, which can improve high frequency dynamic properties while maintaining fluid mounts, has been applied. It was also proposed to remove volume-stiffness (resistance to fluid non-compression) by physically separating the rubber and fluid systems.

title: 엔진 쿨링팬의 후류 분석을 통한 쉬라우드 스테이터 설계
keyword: Engine Cooling Fan(엔진 쿨링 팬),Axial Fan(축류팬),Brushless Motor(BLDC 모터),Shroud Stator(슈라우드 스테이터),Vortex(와류),Vorticity(와도),Unsteady CFD(비정상 유동해석),Stagger Angle(설치 각),Detached Angle(유출각)
abstract: In this study, the performance of an Engine Cooling Fan (ECF) is investigated by unsteady CFD analysis and the flow characteristic around a stator, which connects a motor fixed region and a shroud body, was observed. A velocity vector after a fan blade is variously distributed from the fan hub to the tip and generates large vortex around the stator that was designed at a fixed stagger angle according to the radius direction. These large generated vortex reduces the cooling performance and the system efficiency of the ECF, besides causes increasing an aero-acoustic noise. A cooling fan is a main part in an engine cooling system, but a method was considered that could be increased the cooling performance by the only improvement the stator. A detach angle after the fan blade by unsteady CFD analysis was extracted in the range from the hub to the tip and applied to design as the stagger angle of the stator. A designed stator model by these method was predicted by unsteady CFD analysis and its result was compared with the result of the initial model. According to the results of the initial and improved models, the vortex around the improved model stator was significantly reduced as against the initial model stator’s and the air flow rate with the same cooling fan was increased about 3% through the test.

title: System Engineering 방법론을 통한 기능 요구 사항 기반 시스템 최적화
keyword: EPS(Electric Power Steering, 전동식 파워 스티어링),System Engineering(체계 공학),Functional Requirement(기능 요구사항),Duty Cycle(열용량 기능 요구 사항),Design to Function(기능 요구 사항 기반 설계),System Optimization(시스템 최적화)
abstract: The steering system is becoming more complicated by the diversification and the development of high performance of electrical components. This trends have created tremendous requirements. Mando Steering R&D Center adopted System Engineering & MBSE (Model Based System Engineering) methodology to systematically manages and to develop the functional/functional safety requirements for the steering system. In this paper, the C-EPS durability test specifications were improved based on ’’Design to Function” which is an important methodology of system engineering. The test duration was dramatically shortened by optimizing the durability test specifications. As a result, the system was optimized. The weight and size of worm-wheel which is a reduction gear of C-EPS was reduced based on the improved durability test specifications.

title: FWD BEV 차량의 급가속 시 쏠림 강건화 개발 연구
keyword: Torque steer,Acceleration drift,Drive shaft angle,Drift while accelerating,MDPS drift compensation logic
abstract: Due to the inherent characteristics of the electric vehicle with battery that generates high motor torque and maximum torque at the moment of acceleration, driving safety problem has been a big issue like drift while accelerating that was not shown in the internal combustion engine. In this study, It was found how drift while accelerating is occurred by measuring 3 axial forces and moments of tires. And reducing methods about drift while accelerating were proposed based on vehicle improvement cases.

title: 도심 도로 자율 협력 주행을 위한 능동 조향 및 속도 제어기 설계
keyword: Active Front Steering(능동 전륜 조향),3-DOF Vehicle Model (3-자유도 차량 모델),Roll Dynamics (롤 역학),Speed Control (속도 제어),Roll over (전복)
abstract: In this paper, we present the integrated Active Front Steering (AFS) control system using roll dynamics of vehicle. Many previous studies have integrated AFS with ESC to improve vehicle cornering stability. However, deceleration due to the sudden braking caused unnecessary moments, which required many control variables. In this study, we developed the integrated AFS control by minimizing the variables during cornering. It is composed of steering and speed control considering roll dynamics of vehicle. In the conclusion we found that this control system prevented roll over and improved cornering stabiltiy.

title: 디퍼렌셜 베벨 기어 피막 유형별 차동 내구 시험 결과 고찰
keyword: Differential assembly(디퍼렌셜 어셈블리),Seizure test(차동 내구 시험),Crystalline texture(결정립),Grain size(입자 크기),Uniformity(균일성),Adhesive property(접착성)
abstract: A study on seizure test results with several types of phosphating on differential bevel gear proposes to control the specification of factors for phosphating which are the color, the crystalline texture, the grain size, the thickness, the uniformity, the pickling mark and the adhesive property, especially the crystalline texture, the grain size and the uniformity are the high priority. As a result of the study on seizure test results with several type of phosphating, this paper clarifies the specification of factor for phosphating on differential bevel gear.

title: Step Skew type PMSM의 코깅토크 분석
keyword: EPS(Electric Power Steering, 전동식 파워 스티어링),Cogging Torque(코깅 토크),PMSM(Permanent Magnet Synchronous Motor, 영구자석형 동기전동기),Step Skew(스텝 스큐)
abstract: EPS (Electric Power Steering) having merits of fuel efficiency, driver’s convenience, environmental friendly and good maintenance has continuously evolved for high power, low friction, noise and ripple. Motor embedded in EPS accounts for major portion of the required characteristics. Hence, many researches on the motor have been made and still going on. This paper establishes the formula for cogging torque and torque ratio of step skew type motors compared to non-skew and introduces the cogging torque simulator for the sake of time saving and parametric influence studies. The results of calculation formula and numerical approach by the developed simulator were validated with 2D FEA analysis. Then the optimal skew angle was compensated in accordance with 3D FEA analysis and experimental results. In result, one can make a good and efficient cogging torque design and set up own strategies to reduce it.

title: 수소 운송 트럭의 암롤 시스템의 구조 해석
keyword: Arm-roll system(암롤시스템),Loading/unloading system(Loading/unloading 시스템),Tube trailer (튜브트레일러),Structural analysis(구조해석),Hydrogen energy(수소에너지)
abstract:
Internationally environmental regulations have been tightened due to fossil fuel depletion and environmental pollution, and this has increased interest in hydrogen energy as an alternative energy source. Hydrogen energy can be used in various fields such as general households, construction, and vehicles, but since storage and transportation are expensive, there is a need for technology that can store and transport large amounts of hydrogen energy. Hydrogen transport operates in the form of pipelines and tube trailers. Tube trailer-type transportation methods are mostly used, which are less expensive than pipelines. In order to reduce transportation costs, the development of composite containers and trailers for large capacity transportation is actively underway.
  In this paper, a tube trailer model with a loading / unloading system in the form of an arm is proposed. The hydrogen supply pressure was designed based on a cartridge containing a type4 large capacity composite hydrogen container with a level of about 350 bar. And we are made to predict the structural stability of the Arm-roll system in the process of loading a vehicle with a cartridge containing a charged hydrogen container using ABAQUS.

title: 러기지 보드 힌지 일체형 중간고정 메커니즘 개발
keyword: Luggage board trim(러기지 보드 트림),Intermediate fixing mechanism (중간 고정구조),Integration hinge (통합형 힌지),Analytical design verification(해석적 설계 검증),Durability evaluation method(내구 평가법)
abstract: In general, a sport utility vehicle (SUV) vehicle has a luggage room for loading various loads behind a two-row seat of a hatchback vehicle. The luggage room aims to secure maximum space to accommodate more and larger luggage. In some vehicles, partitions and the like are used to increase usability in order to efficiently use the open space. Many vehicles have separate storage spaces, such as trays, at the bottom of the luggage room in accordance with the driver"s usability and in order to facilitate the utilization and convenience of the storage space. The purpose of this study is to develop a new mechanism that provides the intermediate stop function that can be fixed in the hinge without the need for a separate fixed part when the luggage is rotated. Accordingly, it was specified through concept development and analytical design verification, and an evaluation method was developed to verify its usefulness.

title: Frenet Frame에서 가변하는 최대속도를 고려한 속도 프로파일 생성
keyword: Velocity Profile(속도 프로파일),Velocity Generation(속도 생성),Smooth Path Generation(완만한 경로 생성),Autonomous Vehicle(자율주행차),Maximum Velocity(최대 속도),Frenet Frame(프레넷 프래임)
abstract: In the paper, a smooth velocity profile considering varing maximum velocity which is generated in Global path planner is generated using the Frenet Frame method. It is assumed that the maximum velocity in each waypoint is given where it is generated considering path’s curvature. A distance pattern s(t) is formulated as a 5th order polynomial function and each path cost is calculated varing preview time T and target velocity in the specific s(t) which is determined considering a ego vehicle’s current velocity. An experiment shows that the proposed method generates a smooth path which considers not only curvature but also jerk, acceleration and velocity.

title: 생성적 적대 신경망 기반의 CCU 자동화 평가 강화 방법
keyword: Central communication unit(차량 통신 제어기),Generative adversarial network(생성적 적대 신경망),Abnormality detection (이상감지),Test automation(평가 자동화),Gateway(게이트웨이)
abstract: The number of controllers fitted continues to increase as the functional requirements of the vehicle become more advanced. Controller area network (CAN), CAN with flexible data rate and Ethernet are used to exchange information between controllers. Central communication unit (CCU) was developed to manage the entire network and the information transmission between hybrid networks. CCU is capable of connecting the vehicle"s internal and external networks using modems as well as the internal network. Therefore, vehicle to everything (V2X), over the air (OTA) and vehicle remote control functions can also be fused. The difficulty of system evaluation also increases because the functions of CCU become more complex. CCU is connected to all communication networks in the vehicle and receives hundreds of inputs via communication. If only certain signal values are monitored, it is easy to know whether they are normal or not. However, it is difficult to intuitively check whether the output values are normal when the entire input changes at the same time. In this paper, we propose a CCU automation assessment reinforcement method based on generative adversarial neural network (GAN) to overcome the limitations of rulebased system evaluations. The proposed system uses time series GAN to generate input signals similar to the actual vehicle. In addition, abnormality detection method is used to determine probability of abnormalities in CCU. To verify the proposed method, by using signals acquired from actual vehicles, an experiment is conducted to determine if there are any new problems by regenerating the input signal of CCU. It improves CCU system evaluation reliability since it increases test coverage a lot.

title: 그라데이션 히든라이트 개발
keyword: Half mirror(하프미러),magic mirror(매직미러),Hidden light(히든라이트),gradation(그라데이션),lamp(램프),sonata(쏘나타)
abstract: "Gradient Hidden Light" applied to the new Sonata DN8, which was reborn as the 8th generation in 2019, surprised the market with a new concept lamp that was not tried in the existing automobile lamp. This paper describes the process of developing a gradient hidden light that combines the world"s first half mirror and gradient lighting. The development of the world"s first ‘gradient hidden light’ gave Hyundai the opportunity to secure our unique lamp identity and prove our advanced R & D capabilities.

title: FMCW 레이더의 램프 선형성과 성능의 상관관계 분석
keyword: FMCW radar (주파수 변조 연속파 레이더),ramp (램프),linearity (선형성),periodic noise (주기적인 잡읍),random noise (비주기적인 잡음)
abstract: In FMCW radar, linearity of the ramping signal highly affects to the measured range accuracy of the system. Hence the linearity of the ramping signal is quite important for the total radar system performance, and needs to be considered for the system designers properly. The general correlation between the ramp non-linearity and radar performance is a well-known factor, however, analysis of quantitative relationship is not sufficiently progressed. In this paper, the ramp non-linearity is modeled with separated noise sources, periodic noise and random noise, and the relation between the amounts of each noise source and radar performance analysis is performed.

title: SBW 위치 검출을 위한 보정 알고리즘 적용
keyword: Interpolation Algorithm(보정 알고리즘),SBW(전자식 기어 변속 레버),Magnet Sensor(자석 센서),Lagrangian interpolation (라그랑주 보간법),Angle Detection(각도 검출),Gear Shift(기어 변속)
abstract: Among the shifting systems of the vehicle, a shift-by-wire (SBW) type is applied so that the shifting lever and the transmission determine themselves by communication so that the shifting lever cannot be shifted under certain circumstances and prevent accidents. Due to durability issues, this SBW uses a non-contact sensor when detecting gear position, and errors in assembly, parts, and noise are inevitable in the angle of rotation and the angle measured by the sensor. Considering the characteristics of SBW with a limited range of rotation angles, it is recommended to apply a calibration algorithm that can minimize this angle error. The Lagrange interpolation method can be said to be suitable because it obtains an equation for a curve that passes all specified points. Therefore, we will present the results of experiments on how accurate the value corrected by this algorithm is and which is advantageous for gear position detection.

title: 자율주행레벨 발전에 따른 차량내부 인터페이스 발전방향에 관한 고찰
keyword: 자율주행기술(autonomous driving technology),차량내부 인터페이스(vehicle"s internal interface),자율주행(autonomous driving),자율주행차(autonomous driving vehicle),사용자인터페이스(User-interface, UI),사용자경험(User-experience, UX)
abstract:
In the future, it will be a confirmed future that everyone is expecting that a higher level of autonomous driving technology will be applied to vehicles that are easily accessible by the general public. However, as autonomous driving technology is spread to general vehicles, opinions remain divided and uncertainty is difficult to predict as to how devices installed in existing vehicles will develop. Obviously, the application of a higher level of autonomous driving technology to a general vehicle is not simply a concept of adding new functions that were not found in existing vehicles. Some functions were present in existing vehicle systems but may be deleted, repurposed, repositioned, or integrated into other modules.

In this paper, as the level of autonomous driving technology applied to a vehicle gradually develops, the contents of the vehicle"s internal interface will be discussed. In more detail, this issue will be analyzed from two viewpoints, "interface change according to driving intervention level of the autonomous driving system" and "expected issues and solutions in the application of the autonomous driving system". And in the conclusion section, we will propose the virtual vehicle interior interface by reflecting the insights obtained through the analysis.

In order to unambiguously study this study and to study it more densely, I would like to conclude by defining the limited research scope as follows. First of all, the main subject interested in this study is the driver. Therefore, the vehicle interface to be studied is limited to devices in a region of interest to the driver. Next, autonomous driving technology of level 4 or higher that does not require driver intervention was not considered. Accordingly, the driver must intervene in the driving of the vehicle frequently or intermittently. Lastly, factors such as the driver"s recognition ability, driving ability, and operational proficiency of the driver were limited to those skilled in the degree of being able to use the vehicle"s infotainment system intermittently while driving.

title: 가상 끌기 전략을 이용한 클로소이드 경로 생성 기반 자동 주차 제어
keyword: Autonomous parking(자동 주차),Path planning(경로 생성),Vehicle control(차량 제어),Clothoid path(클로소이드 경로),Virtual towing(가상 끌기)
abstract: This paper proposes a clothoid path planning based autonomous parking control using a virtual towing strategy. Path planning is one of the core components in the autonomous parking system. However, the algorithms such as circle-circle and circle-line-circle have a limitation of the discontinuous curvature while previous clothoid path planning methods require a lot of computational time. To revolve these problems, we present a simple but effective clothoid path planning based decentralized control algorithm using the virtual towing. It is advantageous to converge to the origin of the parking coordinates as well as to make continuous path satisfying clothoid constraints. The presented algorithm results that the vehicle converges smoothly to the parking spot through the real-car test.

title: RSS 안전 모델과 SCC 실차 실험에 대한 실효성 연구
keyword: RSS(책임민감안전),AEB(자동긴급제동장치),Actual Vehicle Experiments(실차 실험),Delaytime(지연시간),SCC (스마트 크루즈 컨트롤)
abstract: 본 논문은 자율주행차량 사고 과실 여부 판단을 위한 RSS 안전 모델과 SAE 2단계에 해당되는 SCC 기능에 대해 실차실험 결과를 기반으로 안전거리에 대한 수학적 모델로부터 현 기술단계에서 실효성이 있는지 알아본다. RSS 안전 모델에서 명시한 변수들에 대해서는 실차 평가시에 계측한 데이터 값들을 적용하고, 차량내부 시스템인 반응시간에 대해서는 실차평가를 통해 계측한 지연시간과 센싱을 통한 시스템임을 감안한 반응시간을 추가하였으며, 이를 통해 실차에서의 SCC 시스템이 RSS 안전 모델에 실효성을 가지는지 확인한다.

title: Convolutional Neural Network를 이용한 주차 차량 자세 추정
keyword: Autonomous parking(자동 주차),Convolutional Neural Network(합성곱 신경망),Vehicle pose estimation(자세 추정),Deep learning(딥러닝),Image processing(영상 처리)
abstract: This paper proposes a technique based on Convolutional Neural Network(CNN) using rear view camera images to estimate the vehicle pose for the target point when parking. Identifying the vehicle’s pose for the target point in autonomous vehicles is a key technology in the automatic parking system. Generally, existing algorithm is used to recognize parking spaces with rear view camera images or rear view camera images and ultrasonic sensors to identify the vehicle’s poses for the target point. In this paper, we present feasibility of the network learned by CNN as AVM images to find out the pose of the vehicle simply. We show the performance that was observed when confirming the root mean squared error of the actual values and the predicted values.

title: 고속 자율 주행 차선유지시스템을 위한 DNN 기반 레이더를 이용한 차선 추정
keyword: Deep learning(딥 러닝),Deep Neural Network(DNN),Lane Keeping System(차선 유지 시스템),Autonomous Driving(자율 주행),Road Lane Model(도로 차선 모델),Radar(레이더)
abstract: In this paper, we propose a novel Deep Neural Network(DNN)-based lane estimation method with radar for lanekeeping system(LKS) without vision sensors. The vision sensor is widely utilized for detecting the road lane. However, it is well known that the vision sensor has weaknesses about environmental effects such as weather, contaminated lane, and so on. Thus, we exploit the radar sensor, which is robust against environmental effects, to estimate the road lane model for LKS. Scaled Conjugate Gradient(SCG) method is used for optimization of the neural network. We had a comparative study between the proposed system and the camera system which is conventionally used for LKS. The proposed system is expected to improve the performance of LKS by sensor fusion.

title: 강화 학습을 이용한 DC 모터 제어기 설계
keyword: DDPG(Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient),Reinforcement Learning(강화학습),MATLAB(매트랩),Simulink(시뮬링크),Feedback Control(피드백제어),Controller(제어기)
abstract: 본 논문에서는 강화학습 알고리듬인 DDPG(Deep Deterministic Policy Gradient)를 이용하여 DC 모터를 제어기 설계 방법을 제안한다. 매트랩의 시뮬링크를 이용하여 전달 함수 블록과 Reinforcement Learning 블록으로 피드백 루프를 구성하였다. DDPG 알고리즘에 Actor와 Critic의 네트워크는 매트랩 코드 환경에서 생성하였고, 시뮬링크와 연동하여 학습을 진행하였다. 시뮬레이션에서 단위계단함수를 입력으로 설정하였으며, 시뮬레이션 시간은 1초로 진행하였다. 진행한 결과 Peak Time: 7.898ms, Rise Time: 7.186ms, Settling Time: 8.274ms, Overshoot: 1.4% 로 측정되었다. 정상상태 오차의 경우에는 ±1% 이내로 수렴하는 것을 확인하였다.

title: 차량용 영상기록시스템 충격 감지성능 확보를 위한 감지 로직 최적화 연구
keyword: DVRS(영상기록시스템),DFSS(Design for sigma six 강건설계),P-Diagram(파라미터 다이어그램),Control Factor(제어 인자),Noise Factor(노이즈 인자),Orthogonal Array(직교표),SNR(신호잡음비)
abstract: Vehicle DVRS(Drive Video Record System) has become an important device as a role of securing accident evidence. At the same time, because of the customer’s need, vehicle DVRS market has grown largely, and functions of DVR have been developed and expanded to include ADAS(Advanced Driver Assistance Systems) function. One of the functions, called impact detection, activates recording when vehicle is shocked by external object. Since the sensitiveness level of impact detection varies depending on DVR manufacturers, the performance of detection varies as well. To optimize the performance, we’ve considered relative factors affecting which by using DFSS(Design For Six Sigma) method and determined the optimum level of the factors. As a result, the DVR system filters out ignorable impact, and becomes robust to environmental noises when detecting external impact. This approach is applied to optimize the impact detection system logic in DVRS.

title: 제동 조건이 브레이크 패드의 미세먼지 발생에 미치는 영향에 대한 분석
keyword: Brake Pad(브레이크 패드),Particulate Matter(미세먼지),Braking Condition(제동조건),Influence Parameter(영향인자),Accumulated Braking Power(누적일률)
abstract: The purpose of this study is to analyze the particulate matter characteristics of brake pad dust generated during braking through the braking test. The test was carried out with a brake dynamometer and a dust collector developed in-house. For the design of the test conditions, three factors including the braking deceleration, the brake temperature and the braking speed were selected. The test and analysis were carried out under the designed test conditions, and the results of the particulate matter generation rate according to the braking conditions were obtained. As a result, the rate of particulate matter decreases as braking deceleration increases, and the rate of particulate matter increases as brake temperature and braking speed increase. However, the brake pads may be worn differently depending on the braking conditions, which may affect the total amount of particulate matter.

title: SUV 차량의 비선형성을 갖는 스테빌라이져바 시스템의 동특성 예측
keyword: Handling performance(조종 안정성),Semi-active stabilizer bar(반능동 스테빌라이져바),Vehicle Dynamic Analysis(차량동역학해석),Semi-active roll control(반능동롤제어)
abstract:
Recently, Consumers" demands for handling and ride comfort are increasing, but handling and rride comfort are performance factors that have opposite characteristics. To meet the needs of these consumers, carmakers are actively developing active suspension technology to satisfy two different performance features at the same time. The active suspension system consists mainly of elements such as K&C performance, spring, stabilizer bar and damper, and is being commercialized and developed as a system that allows the overall roll control of the vehicle to enhance handling and ride comfort performance. These systems, however, must be equipped with hydraulic pressure or motors, and are designed to regulate the overall roll stiffness of the vehicle through a separate controller. so they are mainly installed in high-end vehicles due to their complex structure and high price.
  In this paper, It is purposed a semi-active stabilizer bar model with nonlinear stiffness. This made it possible to improve not only the handling stability but also the ride comfort through nonlinear stiffness curves. It was intended to predict the dynamic performance of a semi-active stabilizer bar through the dynamic analysis. The handling stability was evaluated through J-turn and Double lane change, and the ride comfort was evaluated using ISO8608 road surface provided by ADAMS.

title: 엑츄에이터 시스템의 모터와 기어에 대한 소음 영향성에 관한 연구
keyword: Actuator Noise(엑츄에이터 소음),Reduction Gear(감속기),Electronic Parking Brake(전자식 파킹 브레이크),DC Motor Noise(DC모터 소음),Gear Meshing Frequency(기어 맞물림 주파수),Harmonics frequency(고조파 주파수),Noise Frequency Analysis(소음 주파수 분석)
abstract: This paper proposes the analysis method for noise level of the actuator system, composed of motor and gears. The actuator system, one of the components of the automobile, has still some reliability problems due to operational performance, noise level, leakage. Among these issues, the noise level has been especially focused for customers to ensure a more comfortable in driving the car. For actuator system, in order to reduce the negative effects such as noise and vibrations, the influence of not only the motor noise but also gear noise should be considered. In this paper, we propose the method for analyzing the frequency level step by step from the motor to the end of the gear. In order for this achievement, structure of the designed actuator system was described and the frequency was theoretically analyzed. And the experimental equipment was configured to measure the noise level and noise factors of the actuator.

title: Steer by Wire 시스템의 Road feedback 조타감 개선 연구
keyword: Steer by Wire(SbW),STEERITE(만도 Steer by Wire),Road feedback(로드 피드백),Steering feel(조타감),Electric Power Steering(EPS)
abstract: Steer by wire (SbW) is an electric steering system where the mechanical linkage between the steering wheel and front wheels is eliminated. The advantages of this system are easy to use, elimination of noise-vibration-harshness of steering system caused by road forces. But steering feel, especially road feedback can’t be transferred overall information from road condition compared to conventional electric steering system. We tried to improve the performance of road feedback by adjusting control logic and steering tuning with STEERITE. In addition, the road feedback performance was compared and verified through subjective and measurement evaluation during actual vehicle operation before and after improvement.

title: 시트 안티핀치 제어 로직 개발
keyword: Power Seat (파워시트),Anti-Pinch System(끼임 방지 시스템),Hall Sensor(홀센서),Current Sensing (전류 센싱),Multiple Moving Average(다중 이동 평균법)
abstract: Anti-pinch means a function that protects passenger from injury when a moving object gets stuck. Recently the power seat adopts the memory function to improve convenience and seat is designed for passenger safety as top priority. Therefore seat system needs anti-finch technology as an essential part of safety. For anti-pinch detection, it senses the seat motor current. The motor torque and current increases proportionally if getting stuck during seat movement. In order to find the threshold, multiple moving average method is applied to the current value. In this paper a practical pinch torque detector based on a multiple moving average is proposed for low-cost anti-pinch seat control system.

title: 전역 경로의 곡선 예측 기반 자율주행차 횡방향 실차제어
keyword: Waypoint(경유점),GPS(위성항법장치),Least square method(최소제곱법),Gobal path(전역경로),Local path(지역경로),Lateral control(횡방향제어),Look ahead distance(전방주시거리)
abstract: Generally autonomous driving vehicle use a lateral controller to track created global path based on GPS sensor. Lateral controller approximate the Waypoint as a cubic function to track global path. But lateral controller with constant gain and constant Waypoint in large curve path hard to track the global path. Therefore this paper experimented a method in a real vehicle that diversify the number of Waypoint by predicting the curve path and diversify lateral control gain value by curvature.

title: 자율주행 차량의 Fail-Safe 통합 로직 개발
keyword: Fail-Safe System(고장안전시스템),Fuzzy Logic(퍼지논리),MRM(최소위험전략),Stop in Path(경로내정차),Safe Distance(안전거리),Collision Prevention(충돌회피),Get off Path(차로이탈),Park vehicle(갓길에 정차)
abstract: This paper states that when an autonomous vehicle detects a sudden sensor failure or malfunction while driving normally. For the purpose of safety of the driver, a fail-safe system is presented for accident prevention. In the event of an accident, the driver"s risk is also reduced by minimizing the vehicle speed. This study focused on how to deal with faults detected by existing algorithms, not how to detect failures in self-driving systems.

title: 차량 CAN 데이터를 이용한 딥러닝 기반 실시간 운전자 성향 분류 기법
keyword: Deep Learning (심층 학습),Characterizing Driving Style (운전 성향 분류),CAN Analysis (CAN 신호 분석)
abstract: In this paper, we propose a deep learning-based driver’s style classification method using the CAN data. We collected the 7 hours of CAN data for 100 drivers with different driving style in suburb area in Kwangju province. We categorized the driving style into “sport” versus “comfort” based on the surveys from both driver and passenger. We use the 1D Convolutional Neural Network(1D-CNN) model to extract the feature from 25.6 seconds of the CAN data and train the model to classify between the sport and comfort styles from the feature. Our evaluation shows that the proposed method achieves the accuracy of 80.94% for the test dataset and exhibits reasonable rea-time classification performance when deployed in a test vehicle.

title: 검출 성능 향상 및 불확실성 추정을 위한 다목적 객체 검출 알고리즘
keyword: Deep Learning (딥러닝),Object Detection (객체 검출),Auxiliary Loss (보조 손실 값),Knowledge Distillation (지식 증류),Uncertainty Estimation (불확실성 예측),Multi-Task DNN (다목적 딥뉴럴넷)
abstract: In autonomous driving systems, it is important to understand its surrounding environment while managing uncertainty. Accordingly, the recent object detector used in automotive application has been greatly improved with the growth of DNN (Deep Neural Network). In this paper, we propose Multi-Task object detector to improve performance and estimate uncertainty of the detector. 1) We develop Center Estimation Module that contains Center Estimation Branch and Center Feature Extractor. This can help the model assign a proper anchor on objects as positive by fusing RPN (Region Proposal Network) feature with a center feature. 2) We show Baseline with lower performance can also be used as a teacher model for knowledge distillation with feature imitation. This not only takes an advantage in early learning, but also improve the final performance. 3) We propose the method to visualize an uncertainty of the prediction in the image at pixel level by combining BBox (Bounding Box) and center disk estimation result. Finally, our proposed model has improved performance of +1.4% AP (Average Precision) on the MS-COCO dataset and we show it is possible to visualize the risk we may encounter while driving with the model.

title: 유사부하를 이용한 PCB 릴레이 가속수명평가법 개발
keyword: Relay(릴레이),FPCM(연료펌프제어모듈),Equivalent electric load(등가 부하),Contact material transfer(접점 소재 전이),Reliability(신뢰성)
abstract: In this paper, an accelerated evaluation method for contact material transfer using an equivalent electric load is introduced, which is widely applicable to automotive relays having a current profile of high inrush current. Material Transfer between contacts under arc conditions when two contacts are closing and/or opening eventually leads to non-opening-type contact failures in electromagnetic relays. In most relay evaluation processes, a programmable electronic load including a controller have been commonly used in the past to avoid real loads (motor, actuator, lamp, and etc.) which is cumbersome and bulky; however, the programmable load cannot exactly trace a capacitive inrush current, where its rise time is less than few micro seconds, due to the controller and sensor speed. Hence, an accurate evaluating method to use an equivalent load which mimics a pump motor having large input filter capacitor is proposed and experimentally verified with automotive PCB relay having AgSnO₂ electrodes.

title: On-Chip Debug를 이용한 Windows 환경의 Time-critical S/W Fault Injection Test
keyword: AUTOSAR,ISO 26262,A-SPICE,Fault Injection Test,On-Chip Debug,Time-Critical,Windows
abstract: Automobile’s convenient services and functions are increased recently. That cause increase of Software(S/W) size and S/W complexity. To keep safety and reliability from S/W fault, Fault Injection(FI) is used in S/W testing. Fault Injection Test(FIT) is performed with defect-caused conditions. However, in Automotive systems, Fault injection test is difficult to keep injection continuously and set fault conditions on intended timing. In this paper, Firstly, we address fault injection test method environment for AUTomotive Open System Architecture(AUTOSAR) platform. To keep fault injection, we proposed On-Chip Debug(OCD) in updating or overwriting fault values. Then, we address time-critical test methods and compare timing difference and accuracy between C/C++ time-measurement functions in Windows environment.

title: 버스의 특성을 고려한 경로 계획 및 횡방향 제어 시스템 개발
keyword: Trajectory Planning(경로 계획),Lateral Control System(횡방향 제어 시스템),Autonomous Driving Technology(자율주행 기술),Autonomous Bus(자율주행 버스),Decision making(의사 결정)
abstract: Recent requirements for safety and convenience have resulted in the application of many ADAS technologies, including Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC), Lane Keeping System (LKS), etc. These technologies are expanding beyond passenger cars to commercial cars. Commercial vehicles have different behavior characteristics from passenger cars due to their long overall width, overall length and overhang (distance between axle and edge of the car). These factors should be considered in the self-driving technology of large buses. In this paper, a method proposed to plan safe trajectory considering the characteristics of the bus and a lateral control system following the planned trajectory. The lane information and the safe distance from the surrounding vehicle or obstacle are set as constraints considering both the front and rear overhang of the bus. The optimal trajectory is planned by considering the safety and the constraints. Based on the behavior model of the bus, the controller is designed to meet the constraints and follow the planned trajectory. The proposed trajectory planning and lateral control algorithm is verified by simulation using commercial software, TruckMaker and MATLAB/Simulink.

title: LFG 희박 연소 엔진에서 NOx 저감 연구를 위한 단기통 엔진 개발
keyword: Land Fill Gas(LFG)(매립지가스),Lean burn(희박연소),Single cylinder engine(단기통),Water Injection(물분사),Intake air condition(흡기조건),NOx emission(질소산화물배출)
abstract: Recovery of energy from engine powered electric generation using exothermic energy of Landfill gas(LFG), which is composed mainly of methane and carbon dioxide, is very advantageous environmentally than deteriorating environmental pollution and global warming due to its emitting into air and flare combustion. In order to carry out a study to reduce NOx emissions including water injection in a generator engine using LFG as a fuel, a single cylinder engine system with a displacement of 2.7 liters and an output of 40 kW class was designed and developed. It is also important in this study to generate high ignition energy for stable ignition of LFG mixtures under both lean and supercharged conditions.

title: 마찰 토크 제어가 가능한 다판 클러치의 전장화 설계
keyword: Oil(유),Rotational speed(회전수),Friction torque(마찰 토크),Motor(모터),Multi-plate clutch(다판 클러치)
abstract:
It is generally known that wet clutch is being used in many parts of the automotive fuel economy, such as transmissions, limited slip differential, and 4-wheel drive. Owing to oil, the structure is complicated when designing due to oil, and there is a limit to reducing the weight. Also, the use of fabrication oil slows down the reaction and does not provide efficient power transmission. There is a need for a new way to respond to the situation instantly and make to lightweight.
  In this study, we developed an experimental system to control the rotational speed according to the friction torque using a motor to make the multi-plate clutch electrically. And we try to implement clutch drive by new method through steady state experiment and transient state experiment.

title: MOC 장착에 따른 CNG-디젤 혼소엔진의 배출가스 영향
keyword: 천연가스(Natural gas),경유(Diesel),MOC(Methane oxidation catalyst ),Exhaust gas(배출가스),혼소엔진(Dual-fuel engine)
abstract: Methane emission from natural gas engine is difficult to remove from typical three-way and diesel oxidation catalyst after combustion. Therefore, recently trends of aftertreatment with natural gas engines have add methane oxidation catalyst to meet the strengthen of emission regulation. This paper is on the methane emission characteristic of natural gas-diesel dual fuel engine, which are new paradigm fo diesel engine. In this study, the 6.7liters EURO-VI diesel engine was converted to implement the natural gas-diesel dual fuel engine. Also the MOC under development was add to installed meet the strengthened emission regulation. The test conditions compared the diesel operation and the CNG-diesel operation and analyzed the emission characteristics of DOC up stream, DOC down stream and AOC down stream under each condition. Also, MOC was installed in front of DOC to compared the characteristics of emissions that according to the MOC installation. As a result In the CNG-diesel dual fuel operation condition, PM, NOx, and CO2 were reduced compared to diesel operating condition, but CO and THC were increased. Also In the CNG-diesel dual fuel operation condition more than 99% of the THC emission was methane. Meanwhile Even though there has been about 76% of THC reduction due to MOC integration, it still were not meet EURO-6(WHSC) emission standards. Thus a strategy to improve performance and efficiency of MOC catalyst and CNG fuel management system control will be established.

title: PI 관측기를 이용한 MDPS 시스템의 모델 기준 제어
keyword: Motor driven power steering(전동식 동력 조향),PI observer(PI 관측기),State feedback control(상태 궤환 제어),State estimator(상태 추정기)
abstract: Various control performances such as assist torque generation, vibration suppression, providing road surface information, returnability, and damping are required in MDPS (Motor Driven Power Steering) system. For this reason, many kinds of control methods are being studied. This paper proposes a PI (Proportional Integral) observer based controller. The proposed controller consists of PI observer, MDPS reference model, and integral state feedback control including reaction force compensation. The PI observer is designed to estimate the state of the system, the driver’s torque, and the rack reaction force, and then, the reference model is designed to have the desired steering feel. The estimated driver torque is used for the reference model to generate the position command. The motor torque to actuate the MDPS system consists of rack reaction force compensation and position control. This paper shows the simulation results to describe the performance of the proposed control method.

title: 차량 제어 기준모델에 대한 타이어 특성 인자에 관한 연구
keyword: Tire Characteristic(타이어 특성),Vehicle Model(차량모델),ESC(Electric Stability Control),Statistic Analysis (통계적 분석),Regression Model(회귀 모델)
abstract: ESC(Electric Stability Control) that is one of Chassis Control System is recently popularized function of vehicle safety system to control vehicle motion by brake and engine torque. One of major factors on ESC system is vehicle reference model that is reflected vehicle motion on stable situation. Vehicle control system’s performance depends greatly on the vehicle reference model. Vehicle reference model is related by variable factor such as suspension, mass, dimension, steering, tire and etc. As the vehicle reference model, it sometimes cause over-control or unintended intervention issues. In this paper, the research focused on relationship between tire characteristic and vehicle reference model via statistic analysis. Tire width, aspect ratio, diameter, lateral force, aligning moment and rolling resistence moment are selected by Tire characteristic factors and they are measured by 17 different tires. Vehicle reference model is evaluated by vehicle characteristic speed. The present work suggests the regression model for estimating vehicle characteristic speed to estimate vehicle reference model using tire factors. Finally it expects to estimate efficiency of ESC performance by tire changing.

title: 차량의 승차감 및 핸들링 성능 개발을 위한 전륜 로어 콘트롤암 부싱의 신뢰성 기반 최적화
keyword: Ride(승차감),Handling(핸들링),Lower Control Arm(로어 콘트롤암),Bushing(부싱),Compliance(컴플라이언스),Response Surface Model(응답 표면 모델),Optimization(최적화)
abstract: This paper describes front LCA bushing optimization for R&H performance development considering reliability. The front lower control arm bushing is one of the most important components which transfer forces and moments to vehicle body structure. Especially, these are key factors to determine R&H performance such as steering feel, understeer and impact hardness. Therefore, LCA bushing should be optimized for well-balanced vehicle R&H performance. In this study, stiffness and damping characteristic of rubber bushing mainly were considered as design variable. For R&H simulations, vehicle model based on multi body dynamics, the TNO Swift tire and flexibility component were used. Also sensitivity analysis was performed with respect to design variables using DOE based on Latin hypercube and orthogonal array method. Optimization work was conducted using sequential quadratic programming and response surface model to predict performance of CAE model. To take manufacturing tolerance of bushing into consideration, optimization based on reliability was proceeded.

title: 토르크 컨버터의 블레이드 표면 개선（DIMPLE형상 추가）에 의한 유체 성능 향상
keyword: Automatic transmission(자동변속기),Torque converter(토르크 컨버터),Torus(토러스),Fluid performance(유체성능),Minimization(소형화),Dimple(딤플),Surface improvement（표면 개선）
abstract:
Recently, the automobile development trend is increasingly demanded for the miniaturization of vehicle components, and the downsizing of torque converter is also needed for increase the fuel efficiency.
  In addition, the torque converter is required to secure more space due to the additional parts with various functions for improving performance. But fluid performance also must be ensured because miniaturized torus causes in performance degradation at the same time.
  In this study, new blade’s shape was suggested to improve fluid performance.
  First, effect of surface improvement was confirmed by CFD analysis of flow path’s simplicity model and the actual effect of torque converter was verified by experiment. As a result, it was confirmed that the performance of the blade surface improvement can be improved even in the miniaturized torus.

title: 자기 강화 메커니즘을 이용한 볼-램프 듀얼 클러치 시스템의 설계, 모델링 및 검증
keyword: Self-Energizing Mechanism(자기 강화 메커니즘),DCT(듀얼 클러치 트랜스미션),Ball-Ramp(볼-램프),Slip Control(슬립 제어)
abstract: DCT is transmission technology that has been actively studied. DCT has several advantages that address disadvantages of AT which is inefficient due to torque converter and MT which requires the driver to step on the clutch pedal continuously and consumes more time when gear to gear transmission. However, because of the use of two clutches, there are disadvantages that they are expensive and large in size. To address these disadvantages, researches have been actively conducted to implement a self-energizing mechanism using a rack-pinion mechanism. But backlash and gear friction from the rack-pinion mechanism reduce energy efficiency. Therefore, this paper proposed ball-ramp clutch actuator system which achieves small size, removes backlash and gear friction to achieve better performance of slip control. Furthermore, this system can perform slip control by adjusting ramp angle with self-energizing gain effect. The system dynamics is verified by conducting experiments using scale model.

title: 차량내 전자 조향시스템의 치타음에 대한 연구
keyword: Rattle Noise(치타음),Red-X(통계학적 문제해결 기법),Tooth mesh area(치면적),Swap test(교환 시험),Component analysis(구성요소 분석),Steering system(조향 장치),Friction(마찰력),Return Material Analysis(물적분석)
abstract: The purpose of this thesis is to define the main root cause of rattle noise from on the steering system in vehicle and it was analyzed to propose solution. Accurate identification of parts that generate rattle noise is needed. So, the study used a Red-X tool. It has statistical technique. The Red-X tool has a more specific and objective method, making it possible to present a clear root cause of the noise. Component analysis method was used to identify the occurrence parts of noise, and further experiments were conducted such as Tooth Mesh test and Swap test in RMA bench. This study attempted to identify the cause of rattle noise happened from the inside of steering system and in this study, a subjective test was conducted to determine the impact of the friction level on the performance of the steering system. Based on the sensitivity analysis, tooth mesh test and subjective test, it was intended to make an optimal level of steering performance while eliminating rattle noise.

title: 샤시계 체결법에 따른 볼트 축력 산포 비교 연구
keyword: Bolt(볼트),Torque Control Tightening(토크 제어 체결법),Angle Control Tightening(각도 제어 체결법),Elastic Range(탄성역),Ultrasonic Bolt Tension(초음파 볼트 축력)
abstract:
Torque control and angle control are used as automotive chassis parts tightening method. In general, torque controlled tightening method is used in elastic range and angle controlled tightening method is used in plastic range of bolts.
  This paper describe experimental analysis of bolt axial force scatter by ultrasonic bolt tension measurement about torque control and angle control in elastic range of bolts.

title: 동일 모델의 차량 간 HSA Noise 편차에 대한 원인 분석
keyword: HSA(Hill Start Assist),ESC(Electronic Stability Control),VAF(Value Added Function),HSA noise(HSA 노이즈),Brake System(브레이크 시스템),EBCM(Electronic Brake Control Module)
abstract:
Recently, the existence of vehicle controls functions which are helpful for the vehicle safety and convenience requirement of driving is becoming the main factor of consumer’s vehicle choice. Therefore, many automobile manufacturers are trying to satisfy the vehicle safety and convenience requirements of consumers by assuring the performance of driving and braking by applying various VAF (Value Added Function) to their vehicles. Thus, VAF is closely connected with the consumer’s vehicle use so it is important not only to implement the function but also to ensure the reliability and stability in the function operation.
  HSA(Hill Start Assist) is a kind of VAF, which means that if the driver has to release the brake pedal to prepare for departure on a sloping hill, the vehicle will necessarily be pushed to a lower slope. In this situation, the undesired movement of the vehicle gives the driver a psychological and physical risk situation. While the driver is preparing to launch the vehicle, HAS controls the brake system to stop the vehicle for a certain period of time so the function helps driver to launch the vehicle easily. When HSA is activated, ESC(Electronic Stability Control) system maintains the brake pressure on each wheel for a certain period of time through the inner valve control in HCU(Hydraulic Control Unit) and the vehicle can be stopped without being pushed from the hill even when the driver releases the brake pedal.
  As mentioned above, HSA controls the brake system directly so performance and noise occurrence of the function are determined according to the configuration of the brake system. In this paper, HSA noise is focused when HSA is activated and we analyze the cause that there is the deviation of noise level despite two vehicles of same model use same HSA algorithm and the brake system then we suggest the solution for reducing the noise level deviation. A brief description of the test method is as follows. First, selecting two brake systems of same model vehicles which the noise deviation of HSA is largest and we identify which hardware components of the brake system are biggest contributors to the noise deviation by swapping each subcomponent and measuring HSA noise. Then, we analyze which the physical differences of the components are the most representative cause of HSA noise deviation between same model vehicles and we prove that controlling the physical differences to the minimum is effective to reduce the noise deviation of HSA by actual vehicle tests.

title: 실차 시뮬레이션 시험에서 브레이킹 컴퍼넌트의 로드 투 랩 코릴레이션 향상을 위한 연구
keyword: Full Vehicle Road Simulation Test (Lab. 실차내구시험),vRLDA (Virtual Road Load Data Acquisition,가상주행 하중 측정),VPG (Virtual Proving Ground),WFT (Wheel Force Transducer),pRLDA (Physical Road Load Data Acquisition,실차 주행 하중 측정),Correlation(상관관계),DFD (Drive File Development,장비구동 파일 생성),Pseudo Damage Analysis (가상 데미지 분석),Braking Event (브레이킹 도로 - Pitching Motion Road),Local Strain (국부 변형량)
abstract: These days, the road simulators in the laboratory have become a common tool within the automotive industry for evaluation and validation of vehicle durability performance. Also, all industries are rapidly changed according to the customer needs and try to do their best to apply the customer needs. So, the key of automotive industry is the reduction of the development period to adapt to the speedy change of their needs. To do this, many automotive companies try to develop RLM (Road to Lab to Math) process method. It results in extending the role of CAE (Computer Aided Engineering) and CAT (Computer Aided Testing). These works are focused on rapid test results and good correlation with actual test. In this paper, RLM project are correlated between the Proving Ground Vehicle model to Lab. Vehicle model Vehicle model, regenerated by the Braking Event Road ? Pitching Motion and compared the pseudo damage between desired file and rig response file at wheel force Fx, wheel moment My, knuckle and brake caliper local strain.

title: 차량용 액추에이터의 저소음 기어 설계인자 도출을 통한 최적설계 연구
keyword: Gear Train(기어열),Tooth Form(치형),Noise(소음),Transmission error(치합전달 오차),Motor Driven Actuator(모터구동 액추에이터)
abstract: Because of customer’s demands for comfortable and silent vehicle, a large number of studies about the noise level reduction at the first step of vehicle design have been accomplished. Each component attached on the engine has to be needed the effort to improve the noise characteristic, but it is also important to solve that problems by means of systematic approach under the component assembly conditions. When Motor actuator is operating by ECU control signal, the noise source is generated at gear-train. This paper presents the modification of gear tooth form optimized for reducing the noise level by optimal design.

title: 입자상 물질 저감장치의 압력강하를 예측하기 위한 1D 시뮬레이션 모델링 방법론 연구
keyword: Wall Permeability(벽면 투과율),Soot Cake Permeability(PM 층 내부 투과성),Thermal Expansion Coefficient(열팽창계수),Wall Flow Monolith(벽 유동형 모노리스),SiC Filter(탄화규소 필터),Soot Packing Density(PM 채우기 밀도)
abstract:
The drawback of Gasoline and Diesel Direct Injection (GDI, DI Diesel) engines are increased particle number (PN) emissions compared to conventional Port Fuel Injection (PFI) engines. But in case of GDI, the key technology is to reduce CO2 emission and PM without sacrificing torque and power output. Therefore, Gasoline and Diesel Particulate Filter (GPF, DPF) systems are required as an established emission control technology to reduce particulate maters for several years.
  The pressure drop caused by GPF and DPF is a big problem to be overcome because it results in higher CO2 emissions. In addition, sufficient filtration efficiency for particles is needed to meet the PM and PN emission regulation. Thereby 1-D CFD simulation for predicting pressure drop in the GPF and DPF is a subject of special interest for the design of particulate filters to decrease the pressure drop in terms of system optimization with consideration of diesel and gasoline engines. In order for the pressure drop modeling, special emphasis is given on the wall, soot permeability, filter inlet and outlet flow properties and its dependence on temperature and pressure. We performed various parametric studies by using optimization program, AVL Design Explorer<SUP>®</SUP> to establish pressure drop modeling procedure and analytic expression which is experimentally validated.
  This study establishes the pressure drop modeling procedure and examines various of the pressure drop parameters for the analytical expression are determined based on experimental data of diesel.

title: 닫힘고착 방지를 위한 퍼지 제어 솔레노이드 밸브에 관한 연구
keyword: PCSV(퍼지 제어 솔레노이드 밸브),Closed Stuck(닫힘고착),ELT(Extreme Low Temperature) Type FKM(극저온 FKM),Anti-Sticking(점착방지),Rubber Coating(고무 코팅)
abstract: The Purge Control Solenoid Valve (PCSV) is a solenoid valve type actuator that regulates the flow rate of hydrocarbon (HC) gas through the operation of an valve. Generally, when the power is applied to the PCSV, the valve is opened since the valve magnetic force is larger than the engine vacuum pressure and spring force. However, if the number of valve operating counts progressively increases or the total resistance force is larger than the magnetic force due to the additional reaction force such as sticky forces environmentally generated , the valve may not be operated normally even when the power is applied, so that the closed stuck can be caused. Therefore, the PCSV requires careful consideration of the possibility of valve closed stuck and a robust design for the closed stuck. In this study, we discuss how to improve the valve closed stuck, which can be caused by external environment or repetitive valve operation.

title: 지역별 주행환경을 고려한 흡기호스 내열수명 예측에 관한 연구
keyword: Thermal Life(내열수명),Air Intake System(흡기계),Air Intake Hose(흡기호스),Air Duct(흡기덕트),Thermal Damage(열화도),Arrhenius Equation(아레니우스 수명식)
abstract: Recently, regulations on the environment and fuel efficiency of automobiles have been tightened. The global automotive industry is trying to reduce the weight while expanding the turbocharger engine in response to this regulation. The turbocharger is inevitably hot because it uses exhaust gases to pump the air required for engine combustion. Therefore, for hoses fitted to the turbocharger inlet and outlet, the heat resistance performance of air intake hose is paramount. This paper predicted the thermal life of the air intake hose fitted to the turbocharger inlet based on Arrhenius equation, warranty and regional environment.

title: 위상 최적화를 이용한 C-EPS용 메인 하우징의 경량화 설계
keyword: Steering System(조향 장치),MDPS (모터 구동 식 조향장치),EPS (모터 구동 식 조향장치 ),Topology Optimization(위상 최적화),NVH,Housing
abstract:
The C-EPS is an electric steering system in which the actuator that supports the driver"s steering force is located on the column. The main components are motor, ECU, sensor, reducer, main housing. Among them, the main housing plays an important role in determining the assembling position of the main parts such as the reducer, in addition to the function of simply protecting the internal parts. As a result, the rigidity and machining accuracy of the main housing affect system performance. In particular, the C-EPS with the low-rigidity main housing may degrade the NVH performance and system efficiency because the main housing is slightly deformed due to the reducer component generated when the motor operates at the maximum output. Thus, the main housings that are currently in production are heavily weighted to increase rigidity.
  In recent years, however, the automobile industry has been actively researching the weight reduction of automobile parts in order to improve fuel efficiency, and the need for lightweight design of C-EPS is also emerging. In order to lighten the main housing for C-EPS, researches on structural optimization have been carried out.

title: 통풍시트의 유량 성능에 영향을 미치는 설계요소에 대한 실험적 연구
keyword: Ventilated Seat(통풍시트),Air flow(유량),Design factors(설계 요소),Pad(패드),Blower(블로워),Covering(커버링)
abstract:
Today’s cars are emphasized not only as a means of transportation, but also as a daily space. Among them, improving comfort is closely linked to comfortable living conditions in cars, and car seats are also evolving to meet these trends. Ventilated automotive seats play a big role in providing comfort conditions for drivers and passengers, so vehicles with ventilated seats are on the rise. This increases the experience of customers’ ventilated seats and increases the performance they demand.
  In this research project, ventilated seats were divided into three system; blower system, pad system and covering system. Air flow performance was measured by changing major design factors. Based on this, design factors that effect on air flow performance the most are derived and presented in the design guide for strengthening air flow performance.

title: 벤죠엔슬 픽업트럭의 록업 부밍개선 연구
keyword: Lock-up Booming noise(록음부밍음),Rear alxe pitch mode(리어엑슬 피치 모드),Frame bending mode(프레임 굽힘 모드),Leaf spring(리프스프링),Banjo axle(벤죠엑슬),Inertia(이너샤)
abstract: A pickup truck with rear banjo type axle has a problem of lock-up booming noise and vibration which is caused by rear axle pitch mode and frame bending mode at low rpm. This paper classifies the problem and suggests for countermeasure in view of source, transfer path and response.

title: 수학적 모델링을 활용한 Shock Absorber의 설계 변수에 따른 성능 분석
keyword: Shock Absorber(충격흡수기),Damping Force(감쇠력),Piston Valve(피스톤밸브),Base Valve(베이스밸브),Relief Valve(릴리프밸브)
abstract: Recently, suspension is being actively developed to improve performance and safety of the vehicle. The function of suspension is to damp the vibration transmitted from the road surface to vehicle body. In this study, 1-D code program using mathematical model was developed for investigating damping characteristic according to design parameters. As design variables, the disc thickness and the number of orifice holes were selected, and the effect of each parameters on the damping force was examined by 1-D code.

title: CAE를 이용한 샤시 성능 선행단계 개념모델 개발
keyword: Concept Model (개념모델),Pre-design Stage (선행단계),CAD (컴퓨터 응용 설계),CAE (컴퓨터 응용 해석),Design Template (설계 템플릿)
abstract: In H/KMC chassis design process, chassis product is designed by approved drawing which is satisfied with the engineering specification H/KMC require. This means the vendor in charge of chassis parts designs the product under the H/KMC engineering specification. This process has negative effect to chassis design engineer of vehicle company. The (vehicle company) engineer concentrate or depend on only engineering specification without structural concept & thinking. So, it is essential having a concept model for research & development in vehicle company chassis design department. In this paper, some concept models (front/rear lower control arm & CTBA) will be introduced. This concept model is kind of template model on CAD program (CATIA) base which could be changed easily by some design variables. The finite element model for CAE is also made automatically. These models are useful for chassis structural concept design at pre-design stage with CAE verification.

title: 상용차용 하이브리드 파워스티어링 조향시스템 개발
keyword: EHPS (전동유압식 조향시스템),HPS (유압식 조향시스템),EPS (전동식 조향시스템)
abstract:
Future technology trends of commercial vehicle steering components can be divided into three types. Environmentfriendly technologies for environment-related regulations such as reducing emissions and improving fuel efficiency, and technology for driving convenience using electric steering control systems, and safety technology to protect drivers, passengers, nearby vehicles and pedestrians. Large commercial vehicles require a high-power steering system that used engine-driven hydraulic pump systems (genally used min 120bar, 17Liter/min) compared to passenger cars. In recent technical trend, In order to improve fuel efficiency and realize autonomous driving technology, we designed EHPS and Motor driven electric control actuator with the same structure as C-EPS.
  Unlike the HPS system, the power used in the EHPS system is the motor, which rotates the gear pump to generate flow and pressure, and the steering oil is delivered to the ball nut gearbox to operate the power steering system through the pitman arm. The advantage of EHPS is that it does not use the engine drive torque, so it improves fuel efficiency by about 1%, and when the pump is connected in parallel, it can secure the flow rate to the main steering. In this process, it is difficult to realize the active autonomous driving technology of the vehicle itself through the steering angle control separately from the driver"s steering intention. Therefore, the motor control device directly connected to the steering wheel is essential, and we can design the actuator system by selecting the package and the required output according to the use conditions. The required steering torque as a general auxiliary steering was about 20 Nm, and the C-EPS type actuator using a worm reducer was manufactured and the performance evaluation was carried out.
  In this paper, we describe the construction process of the power steering system for commercial vehicles and the design process of the components.

title: MDPS 토션바 강성 증대에 따른 시스템 영향성 분석 및 성능 향상
keyword: Electric Power Steering,Torsion bar stiffness,System Identification,System frequency response,Sampling time,Phase margin,Blackman-Harris Window,Software delay,Task scheduling
abstract:
This paper describes the effect of the system on the torsion bar stiffness of the Electric Power Steering.
  The MDPS system mainly functions to assist the driver"s torque in the vehicle. Its components can be roughly classified into torsion bar, torque sensor, motor sensor, ECU, and motor.
  When the driver steers, the torsion bar is twisted and the torque sensor measures the torsion angle of the torsion bar. Therefore the motor is finally driven according to the steering torque magnitude of the driver.
  Recently, the stiffness of the torsion bar has been increased to improve the response of the MDPS. In this paper, the system frequency response was measured and analyzed to determine the influence of the system on the stiffness increase of the torsion bar. In conclusion, this study was designed to increase the sampling frequency in order to increase the system phase and analyze the gain-phase of the logic to verify its effect.

title: 아우터 타이 로드 경량화를 위한 근사 모델 기반 최적 설계
keyword: Outer tie rod (아우터 타이 로드),Buckling load (좌굴 하중),Approximation model (근사 모델),Evolutionary algorithm (진화 알고리즘),Design optimization (최적 설계)
abstract: Recently in the various industries including automotive department are using CAE (computer aided engineering) method to reduce the development costs such as time and material cost. In this paper, we simplified the outer tie rod from finite element (FE) model to beam element model, approximation model. And we formulated a design problem to minimize the weight of outer tie rod while satisfying the design constraints, buckling load. Design optimization results reveals that the weight is reduced by 10.3% using evolutionary algorithm.

title: 레이더 모듈을 이용한 호흡 모니터링 연구
keyword: Radar(레이더),Radar detection(레이더 검지),Monitoring(분석장비),Signal detection(신호 검출기),Breath Rate(호흡 측정),Heartbeat(심장 박동 측정)
abstract: This Paper Infineon"s radar RF chip to study breathing and heart rate measurements over a short distance wirelessly using a small 24GHz radar sensor and using respiration and heart rate signals In this paper, we introduce a program that can derive the result of the intermediate step of the algorithm for analysis, and compare the result of operation with the electrocardiogram analyzer to conduct a respiration monitoring study using a radar module. Compared to the ECG measurement system, the response was measured by collecting data about 15 ~ 20 seconds, and compared the measured respiration signal results with the respiration measurement information of the ECG. The respiration monitoring result was within ± 2 of respiratory error and less than ± 10 of heart rate error and has been promoting the commercialization for the application in wireless breathing monitoring applications.

title: 시뮬레이션을 활용한 전력변환제어기 신소재 하우징 개발에 관한 연구
keyword: Dual Power Control Unit(전력변환제어기),Thermal-Electric Analysis(열-전기 연성해석),Heat Dissipation(방열),Dual Power Supply System(이중전원시스템),FEM(유한요소법)
abstract: This paper describes the development of Dual Power Control Unit (DPCU) housings applied new material. In this study, thermal analysis of DPCU is performed and the heat dissipation performance of the housing using with the new material is predicted. PCB temperature rise test and analysis of DPCU are performed, and the analytical properties are obtained by comparing the test and analysis results. The error of the test and analysis results is ±3℃. The thermal analysis of aluminum and new material housing is carried out using the property of PCB and the results are compared. As a result of the analysis, we have developed a new material housing that is 45percent less in weight than aluminum, but at the same level of performance.

title: SW 자동화 시스템 설계
keyword: Software(소프트웨어),Automation(자동화),Rule(규칙),Architecture(아키텍처),Human Error(휴먼에러),Quality(품질)
abstract:
As the importance of automotive electronic systems grows, we are faced with the need to reduce software development resources and improve quality.
  To accomplish this purpose, we aim to achieve the goal of quality improvement by automating information export, analysis of design information, and production process based on formal requirements. As a result of applying these automation systems, we have found that resources are reduced and quality is improved. We expect this automation system to have a positive effect on the automotive industry.

title: 저속 주행 중 Surround View Monitoring System 자동공차 보정에 관한 연구
keyword: Surround View Monitoring system (서라운드 뷰 모니터링 시스템),Camera Calibration(카메라 보정),Feature tracking(특징점 추적),KLT tracking(KLT 트래킹),Camera Pose Estimation(카메라 자세각 추정)
abstract: Nowadays, many consumers prefer Surround View Monitoring (SVM) system for parking convenience. SVM is a system that helps drivers to park the car conveniently by supplying top-down view with multiple SVM Cameras installed on Vehicle. To get a well-matched synthesized image, it is necessary to find out the mounting angle between the ground and each camera and synthesize them. As SVM calibration method, it is often used to manually calibrate the position of the vehicle with a correction plate after parking the vehicle. However, this is only possible in limited areas and there is a restriction that the driver must correctly position the vehicle for calibration. In this paper, we propose a method to calibrate cameras automatically using acquired SVM images during driving.

title: Unscented Kalman Filter 를 이용한 차량의 롤 각 추정기 설계
keyword: Bicycle Model(자전거 모델),Roll Angle(롤 각),Extended Kalman Filter(확장 칼만필터),Unscented Kalman Filter(무향 칼만필터),Cornering Stability(선회 안정성),Lateral Acceleration(횡가속도)
abstract: In order to improve the cornering stability of the vehicle, the information about the vertical tire force and roll angle is required. So many researches have been conducted using a roll angle estimator based on Extended Kalman Filter (EKF). However, its performance drops sharply in various driving and road environments, because of the nonlinearity of bicycle model. Thus, we propose more robust roll angle estimator based on Unscented Kalman Filter (UKF) algorithm for the lateral acceleration nonlinearity change of vehicle

title: 운전자 조향감과 토크센서 상관관계에 대한 연구
keyword: Torque Sensor,Steering Feeling,ECU (Electronic Control Unit),EPS (Electronic Power Steering)
abstract: The steering feeling is associated with emotional quality and should be designed so that no feeling of weight steering feeling, lightness steering feeling, or strange steering feeling is generated. In this paper, we investigated the correlation between steering feeling and torque sensor that is closely related to the steering feeling.

title: AUTOSAR 플랫폼 기반 ECU에서의 CAN 메시지 처리 S/W 구조 최적화 연구
keyword: AUTOSAR(오토사),CAN(캔),Interrupt(인터럽트),Polling(폴링),ECU(전자 제어 장치)
abstract: Recently, the development of automotive field SW is being carried out based on the AUTOSAR platform. The AUTOSAR platform provides two methods for receiving CAN messages. Those are Interrupt method and Polling method. Interrupt method is vulnerable to CAN DoS attacks. And in case of Polling method, it does not satisfy specification about processing unexpected N_PDU Signal defined in ISO 15765-2. In this paper, we demonstrated the disadvantages of two types of CAN receiving methods basically provided by AUTOSAR through experiments. In addition, we proposed a CAN receiving method that compensates for the disadvantages. And we confirmed that the existing disadvantages are solved by using the proposed method. The method proposed in this paper is considered to be applicable to all ECUs receiving CAN signals, not air suspension ECUs. However, period of polling and method about processing the event message will need to be modified a little in accordance with the system..

title: EPS 전동기의 기계적 응답성 향상 설계
keyword: Electric performance(전기적성능),Electric power steering(전동식조향보조장치),Equation of motion(운동방정식),Mechanical response(기계적응답성),Voltage equation(전압방정식)
abstract: Since the motor for EPS(Electric Power Steering) is an automobile part involved in wheel operation, it is necessary to consider the mechanical response as well as the electrical performance in design stage. Electrical and mechanical performance can be estimated by using both analytical method and finite element method. However, finite element method has the disadvantage such as hard preprocessing and long analysis time. Therefore, in this paper, it is aimed to estimate the electromechanical parameters through mathematical modeling and to improve the mechanical response efficiently by using the voltage equation and the motion equation with the simulink block model. In addition, the speed controller is designed to improve mechanical response. Finally, the mechanical response results of the base model and the improved model are compared through finite element method.

title: 데이터 기반 주행구간 분리 및 주행패턴 추출
keyword: Drive Pattern(주행패턴),Data Segmentation(데이터구간분리),Distance Learning(거리기반학습),Pattern Extraction(패턴추출)
abstract: In this IOT era, various industries research a method of defining the pattern of the Big data. However, mixed types and characteristics of data make the analysis too hard. In this paper, a new method of extracting the pattern from driving big data is proposed. Time-series segmentation is implemented by not just time, but the original meaning of the data. After extracting the pattern of the data, it can be used to define the relation between driving pattern and the status of battery. Furthermore, it will be helped to find the genuine cause of what makes the battery claim.

title: 일반 쇽업소버의 차체 움직임 제어에 대한 연구
keyword: RTD(Real Time Damping),passive damper(일반 쇽업소버),body motion control(차체 움직임 제어),Ride &amp, Handling(승차감 및 조종안정성)
abstract: According to high technical development about electronic suspension system, these day automobile company is willing to have electronic active shock absorber like RTD for high performance vehicles because it gives good ride quality on various road input to control damping force separately by real time but it is required complex function for validation and tuning work also it is costly so far. As a result conventional passive damper is still major suspension part for all kinds of vehicles and it will be used consistently in the future. Passive damper tuning is always one of big challenge for Ride and Handling engineer to have comfortable and solid ride. Because vehicle’s ride quality is affected a lot by passive damper tuning and it is important thing for the customer who is having their own car with satisfaction. Ride & Handling engineer need to consider damper tuning differently by vehicle’s engineering characteristics like mass, stiffness and suspension travel also the vehicle’s purposes (off road, sports, family sedan etc.) to use. This paper describes the way how to achieve effective body motion control with passive damper to take account of vehicle’s engineering characteristics and purpose.

title: 스티어링기어의 치형 역설계 연구
keyword: Reverse engineering (역설계),Inverse design (역설계),Rack &amp, pinion gear (랙&amp,피니언 기어),gear box(스티어링기어),Target parameter (목표인자),Design parameter (설계인자),measurable parameter (계측인자)
abstract: As a key part of the steering system, the rack & pinion gear of the gear box functions to convert the rotational motion of the steering column into linear motion. Each automobile manufacturer records its own design method and key factors used to accumulate its own design skills and know-how. On the other hand, the reverse engineering refers to a method of deducing design information, manufacturing process, and test evaluation method from existing products. There are many studies to derive a description of gear design or mathematical relation, but there are few studies suggesting gear design standard or specification by applying reverse design. Therefore, in this study, a method is proposed to derive factors and design criteria to be used in gear design using reverse engineering on the rack & pinion gear. First, the definition and purpose of the rack and pinion gear were considered, and then the target parameters, the design parameters, and the measurable parameters were determined. Also, methods were determined to derive the target parameters. In addition, considerations for measurement and analysis are taken into consideration, and examples and verification of applying the reverse design methodology to actual gears were conducted. As a result, in this study, the analytical method is proposed to reverse the design of the gear used for the gear box and understand the structure of the gear used for the gear box, and the effectiveness of the method can be verified through evaluation and verification.

title: 횡하중 입력 시 허브베어링의 전달하중 계측에 관한 연구
keyword: Distributed load cell(분력 로드셀),Impect force transmission(충격전달하중),IDA,Integrated Drive Axle(기능통합형엑슬)
abstract: This Paper presents study of force sensor for measuring distributed load of Integrated Drive Axle wheel bearing. General load cell have some of problem. So, in this proposed a sensor of new type using 16 Individual load cells. The sensor of new type is applied to measure the force of module impact test and lateral force test. So we can present the stiffness design criteria of wheel bearing..

title: SILS를 이용한 엔진 제어기 Driving Cycle 자동 주행 제어 기능 개발
keyword: ECU(엔진 제어기),Application SW(어플리케이션 소프트웨어),SILS(소프트웨어로 구성된 시뮬레이션 환경)
abstract: This paper is the investigation on the effect of vehicle speed control to match driving trace automatically using application SW of ECU through simulation. For emission driving test, it needs numerous tests to get reliable result because of driver’s deviation even if driver is same person. In case of automatic control by application SW of ECU, it is easy and simple. Also it reduces time to get more effective result on complicated driving trace. To apply automatic control system, it designs PID system to control acceleration and deceleration by application SW and CAN communication. These methods are operated and confirmed by simulation of SILS. As a result of SILS, the virtual vehicle speed is matched entered WLTC driving cycle in ECU. And the vehicle speed deviation is satisfied with standard of permission.

title: RISF 기반의 Robust Fault Diagnosis 알고리즘
keyword: Fault Detection and Isolation(FDI,고장진단),Sensor Fault(센서고장),RISF(Reliability Indexed Sensor Fusion),Kalman Filter(칼만필터),Bank Observer(다중 관측기),GOS(Generalized Observer Scheme)
abstract: With the growth of Advanced Driver Assistance System(ADAS), the automobile has been changed from traditional mechanical systems to electric/electronic control systems. For accurate control, it is essential to estimate of the vehicle states correctly. If the sensed value is incorrect, it can be a great safety hazard. The most important part to consider in Fault Detection and Isolation(FDI) Algorithm design is the false alarm rate. To reduce the false alarm rate, it could be a good way to design an algorithm more robust. Especially vehicle has high non-linearity due to tire slip or lock, body slip or cornering stiffness. These factors make it hard to estimate correct longitudinal and lateral velocity. In this paper, Reliability Indexed Sensor Fusion is applied to make a more robust fault diagnosis algorithm. In addition, Generalized Observer Scheme is also applied to detect and isolate the vehicle sensor fault.

title: 실차 내구 BSR 문제 재현을 위한 가속 내구 시험모드 개발 및 BSR 시험을 통한 내구 모드 검증
keyword: BSR(Buzz,Squeak and Rattle),Road Load Data Acquisition (주행 진동 데이터 측정),Shock Response Spectrum (충격 응답 스펙트럼),Fatigue Damage Spectrum (피로 데미지 스펙트럼)
abstract:
As automotive technology developed, engine noise was greatly reduced. At the same time, however, the influence of BSR (Buzz, Squeak, Rattle) noise in the interior of vehicle has increased. Especially, the seat which is the closest to part to the passenger of the vehicle parts has become the main issue of the field claim regarding the BSR problem.
  However, the research for improvement of BSR problem (VDS) cause by endurance is still insufficient. Because it is difficult to apply to all developing vehicles because of taking a lot of time and expense to carry out the evaluation of actual vehicle driving for several months in order to evaluate BSR after durability.
  In order to improve these blind points, we need the evaluation method which can reduce the actual vehicle driving test time for durability and simulating in the LAB.

title: 엔진 구동계 저널 베어링 최적화 및 자동화 해석 프로세스 개발
keyword: Multi-body Dynamics(다물체 동역학),Crank Train(구동계),Journal Bearing(저널 베어링),Optimization(최적화),Process Automation(프로세스 자동화)
abstract: 엔진 배기규제에 대응하기 위한 연소성능 최적화 방법 중 하나로 실린더 내 연소압 증대를 고려할 수 있으며, 이는 특히 구동계 저널 베어링 유막거동에 큰 영향을 미친다. 본 연구에서는 엔진 구동계 전체의 동적 거동을 고려한 저널 베어링 유막거동 해석을 수행하는데 있어서 매우 다양한 영향 인자들에 대해 해석 연산의 반복적인 수동작업 없이 최적의 설계변수 조합을 효과적으로 도출할 수 있는 최적화 및 자동화 해석 프로세스를 구축하였다. 특히 공학용 전산해석 프로그램에 능숙하지 않은 설계 엔지니어도 복잡한 CAE 지식없이 EXCEL 기반의 간편한 사용자 입출력을 통하여 자동적으로 손쉽게 엔진 구동계 저널 베어링 유막거동 최적화 해석을 수행하고 결과를 분석할 수 있도록 구현하였다. 개발된 최적화 및 자동화 프로세스를 이용하여 당사 개발 중인 엔진의 구동계 저널 베어링 유막거동에 대한 현 설계수준을 검토하고, 검토한 결과를 바탕으로 설계적인 개선점을 도출하였다.

title: 유량 측정법을 이용한 전기차용 금속 박판 배터리 케이스의 기밀 불량 검출 기술 개발
keyword: Pressure test (내압 시험),Pressure decay (감압 측정법),Mass flow(유량 측정법),Leaking test (기밀 시험),Vehicle battery case (차량용 배터리 케이스),Battery case (배터리 케이스)
abstract: We propose a development of leaking test metal sheet battery case using mass flow measurement for Electronic vehicle. Conventional leaking test using pressure decay measurement is not accurate because the volume of the battery case changes due to pressure, whereas proposed leaking test using mass flow measurement is more accurate because it directly measures the flow rate. Moreover, the proposed leaking test is much simpler test structure than conventional leaking test. Therefore, the proposed leaking test has desirable advantages, such as accuracy and time saving. To confirm the validity of the proposed leaking test, we perform a theoretical analysis and present experimental results obtained from a prototype that is applicable to a battery case for Electronic vehicle.

title: 인휠 유성 감속기 베어링 지지구조 변경에 따른 진동 저감에 관한 연구
keyword: In Wheel(인휠),Planetary Gear(유성기어),Transmission Error(전달오차)
