abstract: In this paper, supporting structure of the planetary carrier in in-wheel system is changed to reduce vibration. As vibration is related to gearbox transmission error, enhanced carrier supporting structure proved by RomaxDESIGNER which is geartrain design and analysis program is suggested. New structure has lower gearbox transmission error than before. It is also proved by simulator composed of dynamo motor, power supply, in wheel motor controller for evaluating NVH inwheel module. As a result of comparing before and after, vibration which is from improvement structure is decreased in planetary gear system

title: 인휠 시스템 너클 최적화 설계
keyword: In-wheel(인휠),Optimization(최적화),Knuckle(너클),Topology Optimization(위상최적화),Lightweight(경량화)
abstract: The knuckle of the in-wheel system functions as a knuckle of the conventional vehicle and a housing for supporting the reducer and the motor. In-wheel knuckle should maintain rigidity against deformation by the motor and reducer during inwheel operation in order to ensure NVH performance, also in order to secure the vehicle R&H performance, it should be designed to support load from wheel, secure stiffness and reduce the unsprung mass. In this thesis, we performed the lightweight of knuckle in in-wheel system with motor and reducer by using topology optimization. After the optimization, we verified the static strength and stiffness analysis through finite element analysis and compared the transmission error through the gear analysis program and then we could check the effectiveness of the lightweight design. As a result of comparison between before and after, we confirmed stiffness securement and weight reduction.

title: ESC 시스템 센서의 고장 진단 및 재구성에 대한 연구
keyword: 고장판단(Fault detection),고장분리(Fault isolation),고장진단(Fault diagnosis),제어기 재구성(Controller reconfiguration),ESC(Electronic Stability Control),고장분리표(Incident matrix),민감도 분석(Sensitivity analysis)
abstract:
Recently, mechatronics systems are frequently being applied to automobiles. Among these mechatronics systems, ESC (Electronic Stability Control) system is applied to improve the stability of the vehicle and develop driving performance.
  Major functions of ESC is anti-block system, traction control system and yaw rate control. These feedback control systems are integrated yaw rate sensor, lateral acceleration sensor, steering wheel angle sensor. The application of this system is increasing the importance of fault diagnosis of these systems in order to ensure the stability of the intended vehicle driving. In this paper, we propose a model-based fault detection and isolation algorithm based on parity equation and incident matrix method.

title: 무선제어가 가능한 콘센트
keyword: slow charger(완속충전기),Wireless control(무선 제어),Portable charger(이동형 충전기),soket(콘센트)
abstract: Recently, the use of portable chargers is increasing due to the spread of electric vehicles. The current portable charger is connected to the 220V outlet of the building and uses up to 3.3kW of power. The proportion of electric vehicles is smaller than the total number of vehicles, so charging with an outlet does not cause problems in the electric facility. However, if the number of electric cars increases and the charge increases, it can cause problems with the contracted electric power or electric facilities. To solve this problem, this paper proposes a wireless controllable outlet, which allows a control center in a building to control charging using the outlet.

title: 운행 경유자동차 매연 검사 방법의 개선방안에 관한 연구
keyword: Snap-acceleration test(무부하급가속모드),Diesel vehicle(경유자동차),In-used vehicle(운행자동차),Opacity meter(광투과식매연측정기),Emission inspection(배출가스검사),Periodic technical inspection(정기검사)
abstract: Korea regulates the emissions of new-vehicles and used-vehicles through the clean air conservation act. Used-vehicles are subject to period technical inspection and comprehensive technical inspection. It is inspection method is divided into vehicle registration dates. And inspection methods and standards are different. Period technical inspection apply to the snap-acceleration mode. Comprehensive technical inspection apply to KD-147 mode, Lug-down3 mode and snap-acceleration mode. Snap-acceleration mode is the mode in which the engine reaches its maximum speed in idling and then returns the idling. The time is less than four seconds. Although rapid acceleration is made within 4 seconds, emissions of exhaust gas an error rate of up to 40 percent. This study compared the level of exhaust emissions according th the time of reaching engine RPM. The vehicle used in the experiment is a diesel vehicle with no DPF installed. As a result, the shorter the time to reach the target engine RPM, the higher the emission level of smoke. By utilizing the research results, the error rate of the smoke test results of the used-vehicles can be minimized, and it will be used the develop methods and inspection modes for nitrogen oxides.

title: 외기온도 환경변화에 따른 전기자동차의 에너지효율 특성 연구
keyword: Electric Vehicle(전기자동차),Energy Efficiency(에너지효율),Range(1회충전주행거리),MCT(복합사이클시험),5-cycle Test Method(5가지모드시험방법),Ambient Temperature(외기온도)
abstract: Energy efficiency and range of electric vehicles are particularly important for consumers and policy makers. The critical factors like cold temperature, more aggressive driving and the use of air conditioning in the real-world impact fuel economy. Therefore, the labeled fuel economy is calculated by adjusted equations based on 5-cycle test method. However, the electric vehicles use the adjusted coefficient 0.7 to reflect the real world conditions because of complexity and cost-effective. In this paper, two electric vehicles were tested in the cold temperature condition, and test results were compared to the labeled fuel economy of registered vehicles in 2019. The results show that the use of the coefficient 0.7 for electric vehicles are still reasonable, and the experimental data partially represent validity.

title: [응용논문] 배터리 모듈을 이용한 전기자동차 일충전 주행거리 평가
keyword: Battery module(배터리 모듈),Electric vehicle(전기자동차),HILS(Hardware-In the Loop Simulation,하드웨어 인더 루프 시뮬레이션),Charging mileage(충전 주행거리),Dynamometer test(차대동력계 시험)
abstract: One of the greatest challenges faced by the automotive industry in terms of market expansion of electric vehicles is finding ways to expand the extent to which these vehicles can travel on a single charge. Both the manufacturers of batteries and electric vehicles are developing battery cells and modules by combining various techniques in order to increase the driving range on a single charge. The development of battery packs requires further processes and technologies to be installed on the target electric vehicles after the development of the battery cell and module. However, the development period takes a lot of time. The existing electric vehicle charge mileage assessment was possible only in the presence of an electric vehicle or battery pack. This study proposes a method to evaluate the driving distance on a single charge by the target electric vehicle only through the battery module that was developed before either the specification of the battery pack or the electric vehicle was determined. In order to validate the proposed method, one electric vehicle was selected. The driving distance of the selected vehicle on a single charge was compared with that of the battery module of the selected vehicle.

title: 하이브리드 에너지 저장장치를 고려한 연료전지 전기자동차의 모델링 및 연료전지 출력 패턴 예측
keyword: Drive cycle(주행사이클),Fuel cell electric vehicle(FCEV, 연료전지전기자동차),Hybrid energy storage system(HESS, 하이브리드에너지저장장치),Lithium iron phosphate battery(LFP, 리튬철인산염배터리),Polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cell(PEMFC, 고분자전해질연료전지),Vehicle modeling(차량모델링)
abstract: Recently, the fuel cell electric vehicle (FCEV) is getting attention because of not only environmental friendly aspects but also fine dust reduction policy. Commercialization of FCEV has begun, and now the FCEV development is confronted with the goal of improving the energy efficiency of the vehicle system which can extend the driving range. To achieve the mileage improvement, the main operating region of traction motor, battery, and fuel cell should be grasped. This paper deals with the modeling of the FCEV considering hybrid energy storage system (HESS). The traction motor was reflected as the efficiency map from the finite element analysis (FEA) considering the control strategy. For the HESS which consisted of battery and fuel cell, the second order RC equivalent circuit and Dicks-Larminie model was adopted respectively. In addition, a simplified rule-based control logic was introduced and adopted in vehicle simulation. Finally, from the vehicle simulation, the output power pattern of the fuel cell was estimated.

title: 2018 KSAE 대회를 위한 자작전기자동차의 설계와 제작
keyword: KSAE Electric Vehicle(자작자동차대회 전기자동차),Magnesium Frame(프레임),Knuckle(너클),Vehicle Dynamics Simulation(차량동역학해석),Structural Analysis(구조해석)
abstract: We designed a electric vehicle for 2018 KSAE competition. To reduce the weight of our vehicles, we used a magnesium extruded material AZ61 which is developed by POSCO, and also adopted a cross-shaped reinforcement inside the frame to compensate for the lack of strength and rigidity compared to steel. We designed 3D model of our electric vehicle, and implement structural analysis and vehicle dynamic analysis of parts that can be affected by load, with checking safety factor and the stability as well. We could not complete the race due to unexpected problems as a result of participating in the contest without test driving. We will expect good result with sufficient vehicle inspections and test driving for the next competition.

title: 한국형 자동차사고 심층조사 자료의 필요성 및 활용방안 = The Importance and Utilization Plan of Database Based on Actual Accident Investigation System in Korea
keyword: Motor Vehicle Crashes(교통사고),Actual Accident Investigation System(실사고 조사체계),Korean In-Depth Accidnet Study(한국형 자동차사고 심층조사,KIDAS),Database(데이터베이스)
abstract:
Developed countries are operating an in-depth database in motor vehicle crashes nationwide. They do not rely solely on the police investigation reports that are responsible for motor vehicle crashes in each country but are developing into a useful database by expanding the categories of data through more indicators addition.
In Korea, after implementing comprehensive measures to reduce traffic accident deaths in 2013, the medical centers participated in establishing the actual accident investigation system, which was called as the Korean In-Depth Accident Study (hereinafter KIDAS). This KIDAS database included more in-depth indicators as the types of accidents, types of vehicles, the injury severity, adequacy of safety devices, seating position of passengers. Although there are difficulties in establishing an actual accident investigation system including data collection due to various restrictions, if the system can cooperate with each other such as medical centers, insurance companies, police, fire and rescue services, towing companies, and car repair shops in the future, It would be expected to contribute to the development of safer vehicle, treatment system and traffic safety policy that lower the injury severity of occupant in the event of a motor vehicle crashes.

title: 차량용 메쉬 타입 에어벤트 특성 연구
keyword: Mesh(메쉬),Crash Pad(크래시패드)
abstract:
본 논문에서는 메쉬 타입의 토출구 형태를 가지는 차량용 에어벤트의 공조 성능 특성에 대해 논하고자 한다. 메쉬 타입 에어벤트의 공조 성능 특성을 검증하기 위하여 메쉬홀 형상에 대한 임의의 설계 인자를 선정하였고, 이를 바탕으로 각 설계인자별 덕트 모델을 설계/제작하였다.
  성능 검증 항목은 통기저항 및 응축수 영향도로 선정하였고, 각각의 검증항목에 대하여 시험평가는 통하여 검증을 진행하였다. 이를 통하여 메쉬 형상에 대한 설계 인자별 공조 특성 영향도를 확인하고, 메쉬 벤트 적용을 위한 설계 기준을 제안하고자 한다.

title: 롤 포밍 공법을 적용한 도어 임팩트 빔 단면 최적화 개발
keyword: Roll-Forming(롤 포밍),Door Impact Beam(도어 임팩트 빔),Section Optimization(단면 최적화),Energy Absorb(에너지 흡수)
abstract: Recently, as variety of automobile design has been come out, the impact member is taking hold instead of impact beam cause of its high degree of design freedom. But research has shown that press-formed member has some problems such as money cost and restriction of forming. This paper introduces ‘Roll Forming method’ to make up for the previous weak points. With the Roll Forming method, we propose optimal designed impact member considering energy absorption analysis, cost, weight and production efficiency.

title: 차량 전방 충돌 시 승객 거동 해석을 이용한 안전벨트 시스템의 승객 안전성 확보
keyword: Sled FEA(승객거동해석),Seatbelt(안전벨트),Pre-tensioner(프리텐셔너),Dummy(더미),Shoulder Load(어깨하중),Webbing Pull-in(웨빙인입량)
abstract: This study compares the results of the servo sled test and finite element analysis(FEA) of the automotive seatbelt system and verifies the reliability by reducing the error rate of the FEA results. This study is to analyze the effect of pressure variable using pre-tensioner pressure which plays an important role in seat belt system in frontal collision of vehicle.

title: 모달 해석을 활용한 안전벨트 시스템 리트랙터의 음압 및 주파수응답 특성 분석에 관한 연구
keyword: Modal Analysis(모달해석),Eigen frequency(고유진동수),Acoustic Pressure(음압),Retractor(리트랙터),F·R·F(주파수응답특성)
abstract: This study was carried out on the retractor in automobile parts, and the structure of air was created and the structureacoustic was approached by frequency-based method using modal analysis. The modal analysis was used to compare changes in natural frequencies and the effect of the changed natural vibration mode on the acoustic pressure. In addition, the frequency range can be selected when the FRF characteristics are grasped on the basis of the natural vibration mode, and it is discussed by reviewing all the FE analysis results comprehensively.

title: 코안다 효과를 이용한 팝업형 에어벤트 구조 개발
keyword: A/Vent (에어벤트),Coanda effect(코안다 효과)
abstract: 본 논문에서는 에어벤트 풍향 직진성에 대한 인자별 영향도를 확인하고, 케이스별 최적화를 통해 코안다효과를 이용한 에어벤트 설계에 대한 효과성을 논하고자 한다. 먼저 팝업형 에어벤트를 개발하기에 앞서 코안다효과에 대해 정리해보았다. “기체나 유체가 흐르다가 물체를 만났을 때 전기적으로 들러붙는 현상”를 우리는 코안다 효과라고 한다. 차량 에어벤트 구조중 코안다 효과에 직접 영향을 주는 인자로 에어벤트 WING 끝단 R값, Vane 경사각, Wing ? Vane 간격, Wing-Duct 간격으로 가정하였고, 설정된 영향인자를 바탕으로 인자별 3단계수준으로 나눠 해석 및 가시화 평가를 실시하였다. 이를 통해 인자별 풍향 직진성 및 토출각에 대한 영향도를 검증하고, 풍향 직진성에 최적화된 조건을 도출하였다. 이 같은 시험 기법을 통해 코안다 효과를 이용한 팝업형 에어벤트 구조 개발에 대한 설계인자별 영향도를 검증하고, 팝업형 에어벤트 개발을 위한 설계 기준을 알아보고자 한다.

title: SEA와 FEM 기법을 이용한 제진재의 위치 최적화에 대한 연구
keyword: Statistical Energy Analysis(통계적 에너지 해석),Finite Element Method(유한 요소 해석),Deadener(제진재),Air-borne noise(공기기인소음),Structure-borne noise(구조기인소음)
abstract: In the process of the vehicle development, the damping material, especially sound deadener application is mandatory in modern vehicles for vehicle noise and vibration performance. But it should be balanced considering cost and mass. This study focuses on optimal positioning of sound deadener for the reduction of vehicle interior noise at most in the limited mass considering target performances. For the optimal positioning of sound deadener, we have performed the location optimization of sound deadener for reducing interior noise based on energy contribution analysis and topology optimization using SEA as well as FEM. Through the analysis and optimization, we have obtained the optimal location of the sound deadender for the application, and finally verified the noise reduction by performing the road noise analysis.

title: 6축 로드셀 센서를 이용한 컬럼 수축하중 분석
keyword: S/Column Collapse(컬럼수축),6-axis Load Cell(6축 로드셀),Sled Test(슬레드 시험),Test Procedure(시험절차),Seatbelt Load Limiter(시트벨트 로드리미터)
abstract:
Not only airbag and seatbelt but also s/column collapse and load are very important for reducing driver injuries in frontal impact. Unlike the sensing of column collapse by using potentiometer, dynamic sensing of collapse load is very difficult because of complexity. So many engineers normally use static test data for analysis of column collapse load.
  This paper suggests the attachment method of 6-axis load cell in s/column by using unique jig and analyzes the relation etween dynamic s/column collapse load and dummy injuries by sled tests of various conditions.

title: 차체 성능분석 및 최적화를 위한 Deep Neural Network 구축에 관한 연구
keyword: AI(Artificial Intelligence,인공지능),Deep Neural Network(심층인공신경망),Deep Learning(심층학습),Hyperparameter(초변수),Performance optimization(성능 최적화)
abstract: The Deep Neural Network is a mathematically approximating method of the human brain which consists of neurons network. For this reason, Deep Learning can conduct high complex works such as prediction, classification and making decisions by training data like human. The object of this study is to apply Deep Learning to vehicle body performances analysis and optimization. In Deep Learning method, the most important thing is to define a proper Hyperparameter combination according to each performance characteristic. And it’s not easy to find the best Hyperparameter combination if just depending on engineer’s experience. Therefore, the Hyperparameter optimization procedure using Gradient based optimization method is proposed in this study. On the basis of this method, the best Deep Neural Network prediction model can be built very efficiently with high accuracy and low-cost. This research will be used for large scale optimization cases which were hard to be handled in the past.

title: 북미 목상해(IIHS) 및 IQS 인자 분석을 통한 상관관계 분석
keyword: IIHS(Insurance Institute Highway Safety),IQS(Initial Quality Study),백셋(Backset),높이(Height),FMVSS202a,목상해(Whiplash Injury),안락감(Comfort),HRCT(Headrest Contact Time)
abstract:
Analysis of IQS scores in 2017 ranked first among complaints regarding car seat use/position of head restraint. In particular, despite the fact that Hyundai/Kia"s IQS scores have been improving each year, complaints about the head restraint seem to exceed the industry average. The head restraint is an important part that protects the neck injury of passengers during a rear-end collision and in order to improve performance, it is advantageous to bring the passenger"s head and head restraint closer together. However, this has caused more inconvenience to passengers" head restraints.
  In this study, we are going to analyze the correlation between factors affecting neck injury and comfort and to produce actual improvements to verify the validity of the improvement plan through verification through tests and comfort evaluations.

title: 측면충돌시 인체모형의 상해에 대한 벨트 프리텐셔너의 영향성 고찰
keyword: LATIN NCAP(라틴 신차안전도 평가),EuroSID-2 (라틴신차안전도 평가용 인체모형),Lateral impact(측면충돌),Back-plate(인체모형 등판),Lap Belt (하부 좌석안전띠,골반띠),Shoulder belt (상부 좌석안전띠,어깨띠)
abstract: The ATD EuroSID-2 (ES-2) used for lateral impact test mode in EuroNCAP, which is responsible for the new car safety assessment until 2014. And then the ATD was changed to World SID since 2015. But EuroSID-2 is still used at lateral impact test in some NCAP in the current. The EuroSID-2 back-plate is one of the load paths that can impact a risk of injury to the dummy chest with rib deflection in the lateral impact test. The EuroSID-2 back-plate load cell in lateral impact test is determined the modifier by measuring the load of the lateral direction for the NCAP assessment. The high load can be measured in the back-plate, even if the rib deflection is reduced. Reducing back-plate load as well as rib deflection is a way to reduce thoracic injury. This results show that back-plate injuries of ATD EuroSID-2 are influenced by the deployment of lap belt and shoulder belt pretensioner in the lateral impact.

title: Closure slam loadcase에서 노치효과를 고려한 피로해석에 대한 연구
keyword: fatigue life(피로수명),notch effect(노치효과),Hood slam(후드 슬램),Lift gate slam(리프트 게이트 슬램),Seeger-heuler(시져-호일러)
abstract: There are lots of validations through CAE and test in the development of vehicle to satisfy customer needs in the automotive industry. Closure slam is one of these validation which is the situation when customer close the closure like as hood, side door and lift gate. In this paper, hood slam and lift gate slam are considered where the structure has notch at the impacted area. Generally, commercial CAE tool can calculate notch effect automatically considering geometric characteristic, but in some cases, this is not enough to predict correct fatigue life through analysis due to under estimated stress near notch area. Seegerheuler method was used for calculation of correct stress and strain at notch area, and this approach had showed very good correlation with physical test. Additionally, this correlated data can show us optimized design update through accurate fatigue life prediction.

title: 공기 분사를 이용한 차량의 항력저감에 관한 수치적 연구
keyword: DrivAer(근사차량모델),Aerodynamic drag (공력 저항),OpenFOAM (오픈폼),air jet (공기분사),computational fluid dynamics(전산유체역학)
abstract:
In this paper, a numerical study about aerodynamic drag reduction of a vehicle by steady air blowing was performed using computational fluid dynamics (CFD) technique based on OpenFOAM. For the analysis of three dimensional incompressible turbulent flow around a vehicle, SimpleFOAM solver was used in corporate with k-w SST turbulence model.
  Steady blowing was applied to the estate model of DrivAer at the end of roof and C-pillar in a tangential direction. The drag characteristics of air jet were investigated according to the injection speed and position. The injection speed is 0.2, 0.4, 0.6 and 1.0 times the vehicle driving speed. As the injection speed increases more energy is transferred to the rear wake, therefore minimum aerodynamic drag is achieved when the injection speed is same as the vehicle driving speed. In case of blowing position, the flow analysis was performed at roof and C-pillar blowing and it was shown that C-pillar blowing is more efficient than roof blowing. The maximum performance improvement was obtained when the air injection position was C-pillar and the injection speed is equal to the vehicle driving speed.

title: 카티아 키네메틱 모듈을 이용한 파워슬라이딩도어 간섭에 관한 연구
keyword: IPS(Industrial Path Solution),Cableveyor (케이블베어),Power Sliding Door(파워 슬라이딩 도어),Mechanism(메커니즘)
abstract: In this study, we used the wire flow properties of the Catia kinematic module and the IPS tool to predict the body interference of a power sliding door of an automobile. In the first stage, the validity was checked by checking the error between the simulator and the simulation. In the second stage, simulation was performed to confirm the difference between the simulator and the simulation. As a result, the design parameters for the optimal sliding sliding door are presented.

title: E-clutch system에서 변속 의지 판단 알고리즘에 대한 연구
keyword: E-clutch(이 클러치),Clutch by wire(클러치 바이 와이어),Semi-automatic clutch(반자동 클러치),Clutch(클러치),Shift Intent (변속 의지)
abstract: The 2 pedal E-clutch system is based on a manual clutch system that eliminates the clutch pedal and automatically engages and disengages the clutch upon gear change. The advantage of this system is that even the driver who is inexperienced can easily shift gears only by operating the gear lever and automatically releases the clutch when the coasting conditions are satisfied, thereby contributing to fuel efficiency improvement. In addition, without worrying about turning off the engine, the system can smoothly start the vehicle without hitting the clutch pedal, even during hill climbing or traffic congestion. In this study, we developed a software to shift intend algorithm based on the driver"s gear lever motion in a 2-pedal E-clutch system and verified in Demo-car.

title: 유동해석을 활용한 스풀밸브 형상 최적설계
keyword: CFD(전산유체역학),Spool valve(스풀밸브),Sleeve(스풀밸브 상대부),Turbulence(난류유동),ATM(대기압),Groove(홈)
abstract:
The spool valve is composed of a spool and a sleeve, and it is widely equipped with automobile injectors, an operating lever of a tractor. However, the spool valve that performs linear reciprocating motion is problematic in fluid locking. Several methods have been proposed to solve this problem, and the most representative method is a plurality of grooves are processed in the spool land.
  Currently, spool valves are widely used in various industrial fields, but theoretical studies of groove processing in spool valve are inadequate, mostly dependent on the experience of the processor. In this thesis, through grasping the flow characteristics along the groove shape of the spool valve, we were trying to select the optimum design specification. We compared and verified by analysis using CFD program and actual test.

title: 다구찌 기법을 적용한 자동변속기 Calibration에 관한 연구
keyword: Automatic Transmission,Shift Quality,Taguchi Method,D.O.E
abstract: In this paper, we have developed a method to prepare for the production error by applying the Daguchi"s Method, which is a type of experiment design (D.O.E, Design of experiment). Especially, in the development of shift-quality of the automatic transmission, we proposed a method of optimizing the matching that can improve shift-quality by introducing the S / N ratio quality loss function.

title: 판교 자율주행 인식기술 지원을 위한 KODAS 활용
keyword: Zero-City(제로 시티),Zero-Shuttle(제로 셔틀),Autonomous Driving(자율 주행),Object Recognition Algorithm(객체인식 알고리즘),KODAS(KOrea Dataser Acquisition System)
abstract: Technology development related to autonomous driving is rapidly progressing. Among them, the development of algorithms related to is very important because it is directly related to safety. At present, the various environment-perception sensors installed in the autonomous driving platform are at an expensive price, it is not easy to have autonomous driving platform to utilize it. KODAS recognizes this reality, it started from the point of view of securing autonomous driving technology competition from a wide viewpoint. The purpose of this research is to provide a variety of experiences to Korean researchers by providing database and research on dataset. In this paper, we present an example of utilizing the KODAS DB based on Zero City which is an actual operating environment and Zero Shuttle which is an autonomous driving platform. It is expected that more research results will be generated in relation to autonomous driving perception and the competitiveness of autonomous driving technology development will be improved.

title: 변속감 영향 인자 분석 및 인자별 수치화 모델 연구
keyword: Automatic transmission(자동변속기),shift quality(변속감),machine learning(머신러닝),regression(회귀분석)
abstract: This paper shows a new point of view in learning process for shift quality of automatic transmission is proposed by machine learning(regression). The effective factors of shift quality were selected and analyzed and applied to the solenoid of the shift mode. In the paper, a numerical model was created about 35R clutch of Automatic transmission. As a result of the application of this method, to compensate the hydraulic characteristics deviation of each solenoids which is resulted from massive manufacturing, by using enhanced learning procedure for learning logic..

title: 가솔린TGDI 엔진의 펌핑손실 개선에 따른 연비특성 연구
keyword: FC(Fuel consumption),PMEP(Pumping Mean Effective Pressure),EWGA(Electric Waste Gate Actuator),IMEP(Indicated Mean Effective Pressure),BSFC(Brake Specific Fuel Consumption),MBF(Mass Fraction Burn),BMEP(Brake Mean Effective Pressure),FMEP(Friction Mean Effective Pressure)
abstract: The more and more severe emission regulations and the worldwide demand for fuel efficiency impose continuous improvements of engine efficiency. Recently, china government prepares new energy vehicle policy for fuel efficiency by the end of this year. This study focused on improvement fuel consumption by the reduce Pumping loess with Friction of the Turbo-GDI Engine.

title: 자동변속기가 장착된 궤도차량의 구동계 시스템 파라미터 추정
keyword: Automatic transmission(자동 변속기),Driveline modeling(구동계 모델링),Tracked vehicle(궤도 차량),System parameter estimation(시스템 파라미터 추정),Wet clutch(습식 클러치),Least square estimation(최소 자승법)
abstract: 본 연구는 군용 궤도차량에 장착된 자동변속기(Automatic Transmission)의 구동계 모델링에 관한 연구이다. 변속기 관련 연구의 최종 목표는 변속 성능 향상이다. 하지만 변속 성능 향상을 위해서는 변속기를 포함한 궤도차량의 구동계 모델링이 가장 먼저 선행되어야 한다. 모델링 시뮬레이션 결과가 실험 데이터와 비슷할수록 모델링이 잘 된 것이며, 이후 변속 제어를 하는데 있어 정교한 제어를 할 수 있게 된다. 본 논문에서는 먼저 자동변속기가 장착된 구동계 모델링에 대해 언급하고, 이 후 실험 데이터를 바탕으로 주요 시스템 파라미터를 추정하는 방법을 제시하였다. 추정하는 시스템 파라미터로는 inertia, output shaft의 stiffness, 클러치의 마찰계수가 있다. 제안된 방법을 통해 얻어진 시스템 파라미터들이 실제 실험 데이터와 일치하는지를 보기 위해, simdriveline을 이용해 만든 자동변속기 모델에서의 시뮬레이션을 통해 성능을 검증하였다.

title: 건설기계 Fast Warm-up 시스템용 HF 히터의 열유동 해석
keyword: HF heater(작동유 가열기),Fast warm-up system(급속 웜업 시스템),Construction equipment(건설기계),Heat recovery(회수열량),Pressure drop(압력손실)
abstract: Construction equipment has a lot of work at low temperature operation, thus it consumes more fuel than automobile and emits a large amount of CO2. The oils used in construction equipment have high viscosities at low temperature and therefore lead to a large frictional loss due to viscosity. The fast warm-up system for construction equipment reduces friction losses by increasing the operating temperature of the HF(Hydraulic fluid) by rapidly warming up the HF, and ensures sufficient fluidity to improve low-temperature fuel economy. In this study, thermal flow analysis of HF heater was performed to develop EGRC HF heater in the fast warm-up system. HF heater consists of a stacked plate structure with built-in offset fins and made of aluminum material. Various models were presented and compared by changing the design parameters such as fin pitch, offset length, and so on. For the selected model, the thermal flow analysis was performed under various fluid conditions. As a result of the model analysis of the HF heater, when the fin pitch is the same, the pressure drop tends to decrease as the offset length becomes shorter.

title: 자율주행 인식기술 개발을 위한 한국형 데이터셋 구축 시스템
keyword: 한국형 데이터셋(KODAS),데이터 획득 시스템(Data Acquisition System),자율주행 데이터(Autonomous Driving Data),객체인식기술(Object Recognition Technology),기준데이터 생성(Ground Truth dataAnnotation)
abstract: This paper presents Korea dataset for autonomous solution that we named KODAS. This dataset aims to support for a development of autonomous navigation technology under the Korean traffic environment. For this, we newly built a data acquisition system that also be delivered in this paper. Our DAQ system has 3 types of 14 environmental perception sensors and 3 types of 6 positioning sensors. The DAQ system records whole sensor data simultaneously. The sensors are highly calibrated and the parameters are given as XML file. We also developed an data annotation software to produce labeled ground truth data and it is included in KODAS. Three APIs written in C++, Python and Matlab are available to read each sensor data.

title: 무단변속기 소음 개발에 관한 연구
keyword: CVT(무단변속기,Continuously Variable Transmission),Planetary gear noise(유성기어소음),Chain-belt noise(체인 소음),FRF(Frequency Response Function,주파수 응답 함수),Oil Pump noise(오일펌프 소음)
abstract: This paper shows a whole noise developing procedure and items for the new developed Mid-CVT. Through the case FRF test, the robust design of the CVT was investigated. To reduce the planetary gear noise, the gear tooth-contact pattern test was performed. Through the gear tooth-contact pattern test, the new specification was developed. And all gear grinding methods are also used. Due to demands for reducing the serious abnormal chain-belt noise some special test method are developed and applied. Though the control of guiderail length and chain pitch length, chain-belt noise could be handled and reduced effectively. The whole developing process and results will offer good guides to the engineers who develop the new CVT.

title: SiO₂가 모터구동 액추에이터에 미치는 영향성에 대한 실험적 연구
keyword: SiO₂(이산화규소),Conformal coating(컨포멀 코팅),Motor(모터),Actuator(액추에이터),Arc(아크),Oxidation film(산화막),Brush(브러쉬),Commutator(정류자),Contact resistance(접촉 저항),SEM(주사전자현미경),FTIR(푸리에변환적외선분광),GC-MS(기체크로마토그래피질량분광법)
abstract: The motor driven actuator in vehicle is demanded in ensuring the reliability of the motor, which is the main power source in the operating environment. Therefore, it is necessary to maintain a low and stable contact resistance of motor. In this paper, the effect of silicon oxide on the contact resistance between motor brush and commutator is analyzed, and a test mode that can detect it has been developed and validated.

title: 가변 흡기매니폴드용 플라스틱 부품의 피로강도에 관한 연구
keyword: Variable intake manifold (가변 흡기매니폴드),VIS Lever (VIS레버),Fatigue strength (피로강도),Cyclic load (반복하중)
abstract: Even though the era of electric vehicle has come, the needs for more economical and eco- friendly internal combustion engine have been higher. Various kinds of powertrain technologies have been applied to enhance the engine performance. Among the technologies, intake manifold is one of the key parts to influence the engine performance. This study will mainly review the development process and the result of intake manifold part focused on fatigue of the plastic part. CAE simulation and experiments were implemented to evaluate design validity. Fatigue strength of the plastic part, as well as conventional structural strength, should be taken into consideration when it comes to designing a part under repeated loads.

title: 시트 머리지지대 안락감향상 설계가이드에 대한 연구
keyword: Backset,Apex Zone,Cross Zone,Comfort Triangle Zone,ANOVA,Paired T-Test
abstract: The head restraints are safety devices to protect head-neck injuries from car crash accidents, especially in rear-end collisions. Manufacturers are reporting an increased number of complaints from consumers, who find that head restraints’ design is not comfortable, so the new design standard of head restraint and seat back is investigated in this paper. Our statistical analysis results show the new standard is effective for seat comfort.

title: 머신컨트롤을 활용한 관리프로세스 개선과 안전관리
keyword: Automated Machine Guidance,Machine Control System,Proximity Alert &amp, Control System
abstract:
Most of the Earth works at Construction site rely on heavy equipment"s performance. And those heavy equipments using is proceeding in parallel with the surveying technicians. It is inevitable to basically work together with the manpower surveying such as the installation of finishing stake, real time construction surveying, and measurement surveying peg installation and maintenance.
  At most domestic sites, the above conditions are necessary to perform such Earth works operations quickly. First, Accurate and diligent measurements of the surveyor and clear work instructions are needed. Second, It requires the sensual ability and operator skills. The best technology in the past that reduces the number of repetitive measurements and confirmation of equipment work has been that sense and diligence. And we"ve believed that way makes the final results quickly. Of course there can be a risk of equipment stenosis-accident because mostly surveying task is performed next to large heavy equipments. To overcome this problem, Automation of construction equipment will be an alternative.

title: 굴삭기 부하량 측정 알고리즘 개발
keyword: Earthmoving machine,Load Weighing,Excavator
abstract:
Realtime load weighing systems are used since early ’70-s for mining and transport sector. Weighing system installed onto an Earthmoving machine, or a truck is very important for keeping maximum load in appropriate limits, avoiding over-load, avoiding from penalties also from high repair cost of transport vehicles, giving correct account between Partners.
  In this research, we proposed a load weighing algorithm and experimental method of multi-sensors calibration for excavator. As a result of the sensor calibration, it was found that the weighing error of several poses was less than 6% of total weight.

title: 강화학습을 활용한 터파기 경로 생성
keyword: Reinforcement Learning,Earth Moving,Excavator,Route Planning
abstract: Earthwork is the leading work of most construction projects and one of the most important tasks in construction process management. For the construction process management, there are some dierent approaches such as optimizing construction with either mathematical methodologies or heuristics with simulations. This paper proposed a simulated earthwork scenario and an optimal path planning for the simulation using a reinforcement learning. For reinforcement learning, excavator agent its behavior policy using Q-learning and deep reinforcement learning. The simulation result shows that learning with Q-learning and deep reinforcement learning can reach the optimal planning for a training simulated earthwork scenario. In addition, an earthwork planning path was created by applying the trained exca- vator agent to simulated environment that was not used for training. Excavator agent trained from deep reinforcement learning can reach near optimal planning. This planning could be a basis for an automatic construction management.

title: 공조 AUTO 사용성 개선을 위한 운전자 맞춤형 학습 제어기 개발
keyword: Climate Control (공조 제어),FATC (자동온도조절장치),Climate Preference (공조 선호도),Machine Learning (기계 학습),Frequency based machine learning (빈도 기반 기계 학습)
abstract: An ‘auto’ mode on conventional FATC system provides climate control automatically based on the map which is preset. The values preset on the map are setting temperature, ambient temperature, in-car temperature, sun-road, evaporator temperature, coolant temperature, and etc. Those various values are regarded as inputs to calculate Td; thermal index. Calculated Td determines output values for discharging air temperature, Mode selection, AC on/off, blower steps, or compressor capacity to control internal cabin climate environment. The output values; however, does not always guarantee to satisfy every passengers’ climate comfort in cabin. Therefore, customized or passenger climate preference reflection on FATC are needed to provide better climate comfort to passenger in cabin area. To reflect a user climate preference into FATC, machine learning algorithm has been incorporated into FATC logic. Its machine learning algorithm is based on frequency of climate operation setting and lasting time. It is suitable for vehicle climate control because of no need for high performance CPU and heavy memory compared with deep learning and others. This is demonstrated in a bench test and vehicle experiments.

title: 1D 해석을 통한 배터리 냉각 시스템 성능에 관한 연구
keyword: Battery Cooling(배터리 냉각),1D System Simulation(1차원 시스템 해석),Coolant(냉각수),Charge Rate(충전률),Fast Charging(급속충전),Cooling Load(냉각부하)
abstract: An investigation on battery cooling system has been conducted using 1D simulation. Commercial Software, KULI, is used for estimation of cooling performance with various battery conditions in this study. For investigation of the battery cooling system, some 1D modeling had been developed and various parametric studies had been conducted. Some specific current values according to driving condition were engaged in the simulation model to estimate cooling performance of this system. The simulations indicate that current cooling system meet the target (under 45℃) when driving conditions like US06, HW and the fastest speed mode and that environmental temperature is also can be critical design factor since an effect of natural convection was pretty critical when we consider natural convection.

title: 전기차 난방용 CNT 히터의 공기 측 전열 핀 설계
keyword: Electric vehicle(전기차),Carbon nanotube(탄소나노튜브),Cabin heater(난방히터),Range(주행거리),CFD(전산유체역학),Pressure drop(압력손실)
abstract: Cabin heating of electric vehicles is supplied electricity from limited electrical energy as there is no heat source unlike one of conventional internal combustion vehicles. In the winter season with use of electric heaters, the one-time charging range is reduced by 20 to 50 percent, which is a major factor in the delayed expansion of the electric vehicle market. General requirements for electric vehicles should be low energy consumption, rapid heat generation to implement defrosting function, light, compact, etc. In order to develop an innovative cabin heater for electric vehicle, the carbon materials is employed in this study. Carbon film heaters have a stable resistance, and can operate normally except in the area if part of it is open circuit. In this study, the design of the air side heat transfer fins has been carried out for the development of CNT heater. Models based on the fin pitch has been constructed to design the optimum geometry, and the pressure drop characteristics was predicted according to air flow rate.

title: 마찰 저감을 통한 D24 Stage 5 엔진 연비 개선
keyword: FMEP(마찰평균유효압력),BSFC(제동연료소비율),VDOP(가변오일펌프),Piston Ass’y(Piston + Piston ring + Con-rod + Con-rod Bearing),Crankshaft Ass’y(Crankshaft + Main Bearing + Crankshaft Oil Seal)
abstract:
Various studies have been made to improve the fuel efficiency and the exhaust emission regulations which are rapidly strengthened in the fields where the vehicle and the engine manufacturer are most interested.
  One of these methods is to measure the mechanical friction of the current level by the strip down method through the uncompressed motoring test and improve the fuel efficiency by improving the friction of the high friction engine parts.
  In this study, the D24 Stage5 engine, which is one of the DI engines, is to diagnose the friction of the Piston Ass’y, Crankshaft Ass’y, Valvetrain that have a great influence on the mechanical friction and develop and apply the improvement plan to achieve the fuel efficiency improvement target.
  In addition, FA-4 engine oil with the same viscosity and VDOP(Variable Displacement Oil Pump) were applied to improve friction and fuel economy.

title: 냉매 사이클의 CAT 응용성 연구
keyword: Refrigeration cycle(냉동 사이클),Thermal management(열관리),Electric vehicle(전기차),CAT(전산기반실험),Chiller(칠러),Cooling loop(냉각루프)
abstract: Computer aided testing environment is needed to enhance R&D productivity of new type vehicles. Refrigeration cycle is a key component for car thermal management, but dynamic simulation of the cycle is not easy due to complicated thermo-physical mechanism. In this study, the cycle is modeled by the moving boundary method. The modeling technique was developed for CAT. For the purpose, the development was intended to simulate real test performance only with twig of a couple of correction factors under the geometry information given by a manufacturer. Simulation of the refrigeration cycle shows good agreement with test data of a real vehicle. It concludes possible potential of the proposed cycle model for CAT applicability.

title: 48V Mild HEV용 양향 DC-DC 컨버터 설계
keyword: Bi-directional DC-DC converter(양방향 DC-DC 컨버터),Thermal resistance(열저항),MOSFET power loss(MOSFET 전력손실),Control Loop(제어루프),Back to Back Switch(양방향 스위치)
abstract: 48V Mild HEV consists of ISG(Integrated Starter & Generator), 48V Li-ion battery, 48V-12V bi-directional DC-DC Converter. This improve the vehicle’s fuel economy and reduce CO₂ emission by Stop/Start, Torque assist engine and regenerative brake. In the buck mode, the DC-DC converter supplies an electric power to 12V electrical load in the vehicle and charges the 12V battery. In the boost mode, it charge the 48V DC-link before 48V battery is connected, this can prevent the in-rush current from battery to DC-link. To optimize the size related with the number of phase in converter, the thermal analysis is necessary which consists with MOSFET power loss and thermal resistance. It is possible to approach the fast response and reduce the number of components by the bi-directional and multi-phase PWM IC. This also can reduce the size by replacing the electrolytic capacitor to MLCC(Multi-Layer Ceramic Capacitor). When the boost converter output is shorted because of any problems in 48V node, the bulk current flows from 12V battery to 48V node through the output diode. To protect this trouble in vehicle system, 48V node back to back protection switch is required. Those proposed design methods are verified through the calculation and the experiments.

title: Formula student 흡기 형상에 따른 실린더별 유량 분배
keyword: Student formula(학생포뮬러),Flux(유량),Flow analysis(유동해석),Restrictor(흡기 제한장치),Intake chamber(흡기 챔버),Turbulence(난류),3D Printing(3차원 프린팅),Lamination method(적층방식),Selective Laser sinter(선택적레이저결합체)
abstract: This article includes an intake flow analysis attempted with a student formula. Flow and vortex formation according to the shape of restrictor, chamber and funnel of inspiration are confirmed by analysis program. Design an improved intake geometry and confirm the results of the analysis to produce an intake with an increased flow rate. Explain the production process using 3D printing. The limitations of 3D printing of lamination method are confirmed and further improvement direction is suggested. Aims at engineering that recalls the engineering meaning and leaves evidence in design. In conclusion, explain the creation of evidence-based enhanced intake chamber and future goals.

title: 차세대 자율주행차 시트 디자인 개발
keyword: 자율주행차(Autonomous car),인테리어 공간확대(expanded car interior moving space),미래디자인 트랜드(Future design trend),주요용어),자율주행차 시트 모드(Autonomous seat moving mode),미래형 시트 디자인 제안(Future vehicle seat design proposal)
abstract:
Autonomous driving is a vehicle that can scan a road condition and drive itself without human conduction. Recently, Autonomous vehicle research and development studies are accelerating and companies are competing about direction of autonomous vehicle. Vehicle technologies are developed by vehicle manufacturer for decades. Unlike vehicle technologies, autonomous vehicle technologies are developed by IT companies in advance. For these reasons, we can refer that “smart” technologies, which can be called artificial intelligence, are another ways to approach core technology of vehicle. Autonomous vehicle commercialization requires lots of changes such as traffic rules, new environments, and sensor technologies. Most of all, connection with vehicles and humans are huge changes that requires. In addition, drivers will be free in vehicle interior space without conduction.
  In this article, we will set a keyword as “Moving Space Concept” for autonomous vehicle and study seats roles in the moving space. First of all, analyze future trend and discover customers’ needs base on the analysis. Second, propose autonomous vehicle seat layout for new concept. Unlike purchasing personal vehicle, customers might want ridesharing. However, in the article, studies will set limits to autonomous vehicle as a privately-owned car.

title: 자작 전기차 첫 출전을 통한 설계 및 제작 lessons learned 소개
keyword: Electric vehicle(전기차),Self production and design(자체 제작 및 설계),Frame(차체),BLDCmotor(BLDC 모터),Air cooling(공랭식)
abstract: In this paper, EV self production and design procedures are introduced for the EV debut match of Chosun University’s Automotive Research Group. During the short period, we can have many experiences in how to design the frame, steering apparatus, motor, inverter and battery and how to assemble the components. To satisfy the regulations, there were many limitations in optimization of components such as determination of gear ratio, frame material, and air cooling scheme.

title: 연료전지 차량용 냉각수 온도 제어 밸브의 유동 특성에 관한 해석적 연구
keyword: CFD(전산유체해석),Fuel cell(연료전지),Flow resistance(유동 저항),Multi-way valve(다유로 밸브),Temperature control(온도 제어)
abstract: The hydrogen fuel cell is a power source for supplying electric power of an electric vehicle battery. It is possible to solve the mileage problem of the electric vehicle. In the hydrogen fuel cell, the conductivity of electrons changes in accordance with the state of the electrolyte in the stack. Therefore, the thermal management system of hydrogen fuel cell is very important. The wax type thermostat attached to the existing radiator is difficult to sensitively control the temperature of the fuel cell system because of its low control accuracy with low responsiveness. It is necessary to develop a motor-driven valve that can replace wax type thermostat. In this research, we developed a valve which can actively control the temperature of coolant flowing in the stack. A 3-layer bell valve with a single drive shaft controls the flow rates to the components according to the power of the stack. Flow-rate distribution ratio characteristics and flow resistance in the fuel cell system were verified by porous media method applying the flow resistance experiment data of the componests.

title: 차량 구동용 액츄에이터 시스템의 유성기어 감속기 진동인자별 영향도 평가
keyword: Actuator system (액츄에이터 시스템),Planetary gear reducer (유성기어 감속기),Vibration factor (진동인자),Characteristics of vibration (진동특성)
abstract: Recently, actuator systems have been widely used in electronic control systems in automobiles. In eco-friendly automobiles, actuator systems are also being applied to major drive systems. Accordingly, the reducer used in the actuator system is also increasingly demanding for vibration, noise and performance. In this study, vibration factors of a planetary gear reducer in a vehicle drive system were selected and their influence was compared. Among various vibration factors, the possibility of application in the future mass production process was selected as an important point. First, we selected the gear grade. The gear class 1 and class 4 were compared. Second, the weight of the reducer was selected. The weight of the carrier among the reducer parts was made different.

title: HIL Simulation을 활용한 Multi-phase Interleaved 방식의 Converter 제어보드 성능 검증
keyword: HIL(Hardware-In-the-Loop),Simulation(시뮬레이션),Control Logic(제어로직),Multi-phase Interleaved,Converter(컨버터),FPGA(Field Programmable Gate Arrays)
abstract: The target for HIL simulation test is a controller board which controls power module parts of converter. Multi-phase interleaved DC-DC converter is applied. All parts of the converter expect the controller board need to be developed for making closed loop system between the HIL simulator and the controller board. And the interface model is added for communication between them. A FPGA board with fast sampling time is applied for reading the 100kHz PWM signals that is output of the converter. In this paper, models for JIL simulation are presented in order to explain how to operate the parts of the power module in the simulator. Then, the test result including basic performance and fault insertion test is shown at the last chaper.

title: 산업용 소형디젤엔진의 터보차저 압축기의 파울링 현상 분석을 위한 실험적 연구
keyword: Blow-by gas (블로우바이 가스),Turbocharger Fouling (터보차저 파울링),Aerosol Particle (미세입자),CCV(Closed Crankcase Ventilation (밀폐식 크랭크실 환기),FT-IR (적외선분광법),TGA (열중량 분석법)
abstract: The interest in air pollution and ultrafine dust is increasing. Emission regulations for automobiles and construction machinery are being strengthened globally. The blowby gas discharged from the crankcase of the engine is a gas that passes through the piston-cylinder gap and escapes into the crankcase. In the CCV ventilation system, carbon is deposited in the diffuser of the turbocharger wheel and the 압축기 housing, which lowers the charging efficiency from a long-term point of view and adversely affects engine performance and emission. This phenomenon is defined as Turbocharger Fouling or Turbocharger Oil Coking. In this study, the engine test was conducted on the dynamometer to investigate the mechanism and the root cause of the turbocharger fouling.

title: BLDC 모터를 이용한 CVVD 액추에이터 개발
keyword: CVVD system(연속가변밸브듀레이션 시스템),BLDC motor(BLDC 모터),Motor performance(모터 성능),Smart Actuator (스마트 액추에이터)
abstract:
Recently, vehicles have been equipped with many electric equipment components according to safe, convenient, and environmental requirements. To meet the requirements, development of easy to control, durable, and miniaturized electrical components is essential. Therefore, the CVVD (Continuous Variable Valve Duration) actuator, which produces driving force in the new CVVD system under development, is applying the BLDC (Brushless Direct Current) motor.
  Requirements as automotive parts were analyzed and verified through numerical method and experiments to apply BLDC motors. For this purpose, the required torque, temperature conditions and vibration conditions of the product are clearly identified and reflected in the product design. In particular, it was developed with characteristics as smart actuators. As a result, basic performance such as response time was satisfied and achieved the required performance at last.

title: SCR촉매 열화도에 따른 암모니아 목표흡장량 다원화를 위한 SCR aging factor 개발
keyword: SCR(선택적 환원촉매),Aging Factor(에이징 팩터),NOx(질소산화물),Conversion Efficiency(정화효율),NH₃ loading(암모니아 흡장),Catalyst(촉매),Aging(열화)
abstract: NOx conversion efficiency of Cu-Zeolite SCR catalysts in diesel engines decreases as the catalyst aging progresses. In order to optimize the NOx conversion performance, it is necessary to apply various NH₃ storage amount suitable for degree of aging of the catalyst. In this study, sensitivity coefficient for SCR is derived and by using this coefficient, the amount of NH₃ storage can be calculated according to thermal load. Finally, the development of SCR aging factor for predicting NH₃ storage amount according to degree of catalyst aging was improved NOx conversion performance at real road driving exhaust gas test

title: 알루미늄 주물 하우징을 적용한 알루미늄 EGR 쿨러 구조강도 해석
keyword: Aluminum Die Casting(알루미늄 주물),Aluminum EGR Cooler(알루미늄 이지알 쿨러),Heat Transfer Fin(전열핀),Structural Strength Analysis(구조 강도 해석),Internal Pressure Analysis(내압해석)
abstract: The FEM structural strength analysis was performed on aluminium EGR Cooler with aluminum die casting. The structural reinforced design was developed through internal pressure simulation for EGR Cooler using the aluminum die casting housing to avoid stress concentration site, which exceed fracture stress of material. 83 percent decreased in number of housing part, and Max. 40.5 percent decreased in stress distribution of housing as a result of the study.

title: 적응형 피드-포워드 제어 기법을 이용한 습식 듀얼 클러치 변속기의 유압 클러치 충전 제어기 설계
keyword: Clutch fill control(클러치 충전 제어),feed-forward control(피드-포워드 제어),Adaptive control(적응제어),Wet dual clutch transmission(습식 듀얼 클러치 변속기),Hydraulic actuator(유압 액추에이터)
abstract: 본 논문은 습식 DCT에 적용되는 유압 클러치의 새로운 충전 제어 기법을 제안한다. 습식 DCT는 습식 클러치의 큰 드래그 토크로 인하여 정밀한 사전 충전 제어가 어려우며, 클러치 피스톤이 움직이는 충전 구간 제어 기술이 필수적으로 요구된다. 본 논문에서는 충전 구간을 보상 해주기 위해 여러 실용적인 문제를 고려한 감소 차수 모델을 제안한다. 제안된 감소 차수 모델은 유압 시스템의 충전 구간을 사실적으로 묘사한다. 제안된 감소 차수 모델은 충전 구간을 보상하는 피드-포워드 제어기를 구성하는데 이용된다. 피드-포워드 제어기는 모델 정보를 내포하기 때문에 다양한 입력에 맞춰 제어 출력을 생성하게 된다. 하지만, 유압 시스템의 여러 불확실성 및 외란으로 인해 감소 차수 모델의 변수가 변화하는 경우, 이에 대한 대응이 필요하게 된다. 본 논문에서는 측정된 클러치 내부 압력을 이용하여 모델의 변수를 실시간으로 업데이트 하는 적용형 피드-포워드 제어기를 제안한다. 제안된 제어기는 정확한 시뮬레이션 모델을 이용하여 검증되었다. 시뮬레이션 결과는 제안하는 제어기가 다양한 입력 상황 및 모델 변수의 변화에도 좋은 성능을 나타냄을 보여준다.

title: 가솔린 기관에서 물 분사 시스템 구성을 위한 시뮬레이션 모델 개발 및 검증
keyword: Water injection(물분사),Gasoline Engine(가솔린 엔진),CFD(Computational Fluid Dynamics),ELSA(Eulerian-Lagrangian Spray Atomization),Evaporation rate(증발율),Spray Breakup
abstract: Water spray characterization of a multi-hole water injector is investigated by numerical simulation. Two points of spray characteristics validate spray simulation using CFD. The first validation method is geometrical evaluation involving spray penetration and angles. The second one is conducted concerning heat and mass transfer of water spray, especially for evaporation process of water and resultant cooling effect on air flow. The primary purposes of this study are the development of relevant simulation model and evaluation of the effect of water injection. The ANSYS CFX Software is used to simulate the water spray and gas exchange process of the engine. The 8-hole water injector is applied to water injection, and the spray simulation model for the water injection is developed and calibrated by experimental results.

title: 반능동 스테빌라이저바에 대한 연구
keyword: Stabilizer bar(스테빌라이저바),Active Roll Control(능동 롤 제어),Semi-active Roll Control(반능동 롤 제어),Coil spring(코일 스프링),Finite Element Analysis(유한요소해석)
abstract: The stabilizer bar maintain the stability and attitude of the vehicle when it is travelling in curves. Cornering maneuvers with reduced body roll and without comfort loss are important requirements for car manufacturers. In order to solve these problems, an electric Active Roll Control(ARC) system is being studied, but it is still composed of very complicated parts, which is heavy and expensive. In this thesis, a semi-active stabilizer bar system of mechanical structure is developed, which is weight reduction, cost down and similar performance than the active stabilizer bar. The feasibility of the system was verified from finite element analysis and test.

title: 체결조건을 고려한 차량 전륜너클의 강도해석에 관한 연구
keyword: Knuckle(너클),Finite element method(유한요소법),Strength analysis(강도해석),Assembly condition(체결조건),Assembly torque(조립토크),Ball joint(볼조인트),Tie rod end(타이로드엔드),Strut(스트럿)
abstract: The knuckle strength evaluation in the design stage is done by stress analysis on the knuckle by applying the load acting on each vehicle event at each suspension hard point and applying it. The load transfer is achieved by connecting the knuckle and the hard point with a rigid element. In this study, a new method for strength analysis of knuckle is composed of ball stud of lower arm ball joint, ball stud of tie rod end, bracket of strut/bolt and hub/bolt by finite element model. The influence of the strength of the knuckle caused by contact of these parts when the load was applied was identified. Additionally, Assembly torque effects was investigated on knuckle strength. In this way, this paper propose a method to improve knuckle strength by identifying the root cause of knuckle crack in vehicle test.

title: 자율주행을 위한 공간적 경향성이 고려된 End-to-End Neural Network 설계
keyword: Artificial Intelligence (인공 지능),End-to-End Neural Network (엔드투엔드 신경망),Convolutional Neural Network (CNN, 컨볼류션 신경망),Spatial Dependency (공간적 경향성),Autonomous Driving (자율주행)
abstract: Recently, autonomous driving and advanced driver assistance system (ADAS) have been actively researched in the automotive field. It is very important to consider the improvement of perception ability about a forward driving scene. However, the sensor"s capability maintains high quality when the driving condition is only ideal. There are so many road conditions and an environment in real driving situations. In this paper, we propose a steering wheel angle prediction model using a deep convolutional end-to-end neural network for various driving environments and road shapes. The image data for training and validation is UDACITY Challenge dataset and the experiment was performed through computational simulation.

title: 카메라 기반 자율주행 인식률 평가를 위한 실도로 영상 DB 구축 및 평가 방안 연구
keyword: Image Data Base(영상DB),Ground Truth(기준값),LIDAR sensor,IVN(차량거동정보),DAQ(데이터 수집 장치),인식률(Recognition rate)
abstract: In this paper, we propose a method of generating and evaluating reference values for real - time road image DB construction and quantitative recognition rate evaluation of camera - based autonomous drive recognition rate. As a result of government project to develop camera based recognition algorithm for autonomous driving, we developed a system that can store LIDAR, DGPS and IVN information in real time which can provide original data and reference value of multi-channel camera module. The acquired DB performs the reference value generation operation separately for improving the algorithm performance and quantitatively evaluating the recognition rate. The reference values that are processed frame by frame are stored in the upper pixel of the image converged into one image file and provided to the algorithm developer. In the future, the real road image DB and reference value of the common format are used for algorithm development and performance verification.

title: Low GWP 대체냉매 적용 냉동시스템의 증발기 성능 설계
keyword: Alternative Refrigerant(대체냉매),Refrigeration System(냉동 시스템),Fin&amp,Tube Evaporator(핀-튜브 증발기),Cooling Capacity(냉방 능력),Pressure drop(압력손실)
abstract: By strengthened climate protocols and regulates, recent technology including air conditioning system and refrigerant system industries has been challenged to produce alternative refrigerants corresponding to the conditions. It is necessary to develop a stand-alone refrigeration system with a Low-GWP refrigerant, which has a GWP of 150 or less. A performance design program has been developed for a fin-tube evaporator of a refrigeration system, which is capable of changing the working fluid as low-GWP refrigerants. The program consisted of inputting major geometrical parameters, such as fins and tubes, and operating conditions for the evaporator in the refrigeration system, selecting the calculation methods, and then executing the calculation. In order to apply R455a refrigerant below GWP 150, consideration should be given not only to changes in properties due to temperature and pressure, but also to the refrigerant pressure drop that can significantly increase compared to the existing one. Parametric study has been carried out for the refrigerant tube arrangement. Even if the total number of tubes in the evaporator is the same, the performance change can vary greatly depending on the arrangement of the refrigerant tube.

title: 자동변속기용 4WAY 유로 토크컨번터
keyword: 4WAY,Balance chamber(발란스 챔버),Wave spring(웨이브 스프링),Lock up clutch(록업 클러치),Piston apply pressure(피스톤 작동 압력),Damper controllability(댐퍼 제어성)
abstract: 본 연구에서는 차량 연비 향상을 위해 고안된 4WAY 유로를 가지는 토크컨버터 기술에 대해 제시한다. 이 토크컨버터는 기존 3WAY 유로에서 압력을 보상하는 유로를 추가하여 토크컨버터의 록업 클러치 작동시 내부압에 영향을 받지 않도록 하는 별도의 챔버를 구성였으며, 록업 클러치 작동시 인가되는 압력을 저하시켜 압력 손실을 줄이게 하였다. 또한 별도의 웨이브 스프링을 적용하여 록업 클러치 직결시 피스톤과 마찰판 접촉 시 충격을 저하시키므로써 댐퍼 제어성이 향상되었다. 이러한 효과를 검증하기 위해 시작 샘플을 제작하고, 다이나모 시험기를 통해 록업 클러치 작동시 작동 압력과 토크 변화를 측정하였으며, 기존 3WAY 사양과 비교를 통해 효과를 시험적으로 입증하였다.

title: GDI 인젝터 노즐 설계 변수에 따른 비정상 유동 특성
keyword: GDI(가솔린 직접분사),Cavitation(공동현상),Multiphase(다상),VOF(유체부피),CFD(전산유체역학),UDF(사용자 정의 함수)
abstract: Recently, studies on the dynamic behavior of injector nozzles are actively underway, and studies on the flow characteristics in the nozzles have been actively conducted through the CFD due to the improved computer function. In this study, flow characteristics according to injector nozzle design parameters were analyzed by using commercial analysis program. In order to investigate cavitation and the behavior of air and liquid in the nozzle due to the sudden pressure change inside nozzle, multiphase flow analysis using VOF was used. In addition, UDF function was used to control the force acting on the ball that changes with time and the moving distance of the ball. Remeshing was performed periodically using the dynamic mesh function.

title: 건설기계 Fast Warm-up 시스템용 EGRC HF 히터 모듈 성능평가
keyword: HF heater(작동유 가열기),EGR cooler(배기가스 재순환 장치),Fast warm-up system(급속 웜업 시스템),Construction equipment(건설기계),Heat recovery(회수열량),Heat dissipation(방열량),Pressure drop(압력손실)
abstract: Recently, as automobile exhaust gas regulations are strengthened, the fast warm-up technology that can reduce emission has been studied In the newly developed fast warm-up system of a forklift, the engine coolant which recovers the waste heat from the EGR gas flows into the HF heater and is used for warm-up. Therefore, both of the heat exchangers, i.e., EGR cooler and HF heater, can be developed in a unified form to increase the amount of recovered heat to achieve improvement in fuel economy. In this study, prototype evaluation was performed to compare the performance of both heat exchangers with the unified EGRC HF heater module. The pressure drop of coolant in the module passes through the side of the EGR cooler with relatively low pressure drop and then through the HF heater with high pressure drop is greatly increased compared to the EGR cooler alone. Heat recovery of the HF is greatly affected by the coolant recovered from the exhaust gas according to the investigation results from the evaluation.

title: 플라스틱 기어의 최적화 설계 및 해석 검증
keyword: Actuator(액추에이터),Reducer(감속기),Spur Gear(스퍼기어),Stress(응력),Safety Factor(안전율)
abstract:
This paper deals with the optimization design of plastic gears, which are components of electronic actuators for automobiles. Electronic actuators for automobiles consist of a motor, a reducer, and a controller for controlling the motor. Recently, a conventional steel gear has been replaced by a plastic injection machine. The plastic gear has advantages such as cost, weight, noise reduction, etc. However, there is a problem that the size of the steel gear is increased and the durability is lowered. Therefore, it is necessary to optimize the design of the plastic gear to minimize the disadvantages of the plastic gear, and the safety of the plastic gear should be secured under the maximum operating condition.
  Structural analysis was performed on the design parameters such as material, module, and thickness of plastic gear to select optimal design parameters under maximum operating conditions. Using the selected design parameters, the stress and the safety factor of the optimally designed plastic gear were confirmed. We will verify the correlation of the analytical model with the future test results and build an analytical model that can efficiently verify the design according to the specification change.

title: 아마추어 코어의 진동/감도 성능 향상을 위한 파라미타 연구
keyword: Steering Wheel(스티어링 휠),Armature Core(아마추어 코어),Frequency response analysis(주파수응답해석),Modal analysis(모드해석),실험계획법
abstract: In this study, the vibration / sensitivity performance of the steering wheel amateur core was analyzed and the influence of each factor was analyzed. The factors affecting the parameters are spoke, rim, bass rib, and so on. To understand the influence level of these factors, frequency response analysis was performed based on the experimental design method. The frequency response of the designed amateur core was analyzed to confirm the vibration / sensitivity performance of each model. Based on the influence of the identified factors, we tried to increase the design efficiency by decreasing the initial time of the design by applying the factors showing good performance in the initial stage of the amateur core. Based on the generated parameters, the amateur core was reflected in the design, and the data verification was performed by comparing the expected performance results with the analysis results of actual design data. Based on these analysis techniques, we were able to shorten initial design time and optimize the design by using the created parameters. Based on these analysis techniques, we were able to reduce design time and optimize the design.

title: MR 댐퍼의 상대속도 추정을 위한 Takagi-Sugeno 퍼지 관측기 개발
keyword: Takagi-Sugeno Fuzzy(T-S 퍼지),Magnetorheological damper(MR 댐퍼),Suspension relative velocity(서스펜션 상대속도),Unknown premise variable(전제변수),T-S fuzzy observer(T-S 퍼지 추정기)
abstract: In this paper, the Takagi-Sugeno (T-S) fuzzy observer is proposed to estimate the relative velocity of magnetorheological (MR) damper. MR damper has highly nonlinear dynamics therefore the linear observer design method cannot be adopted. Therefore, T-S modeling technique such as sector nonlinearity is used to design T-S fuzzy model. The T-S model is developed from the experimental dataset. This paper uses two MR damper models. First, the phenomenological model is used as a plant. This model is used to build the damper force for vehicle simulator Carsim. Next, the bouc-wen model is used to design T-S fuzzy observer. This paper proposes T-S fuzzy observer which has unmeasured premise variables. To verify the stability of this observer, Lyapunov stability theorem is used. The proposed observer is verified to vehicle simulator Carsim and Matlab/Simulink. Consequently, this paper proposed the relative velocity estimator which has robustness to unknown road input.

title: RDE 시험 주행 조건에서 디젤 승합차의 NOx 배출 및 연료 소모 특성
keyword: RDE(실도로주행배출가스시험),Diesel RV(디젤승합차),NOx(질소산화물),Fuel consumption(연료소모량),OBD(자기진단장치)
abstract: In order to investigate the characteristics of a RDE test driving, the wheel torque, fuel consumption, NOx emission etc are measured and analyzed. Fundamental study is carried out eventually to develop a short and reduced cycle for the RDE test using a dynamometer. A test cycle within about one hour using a chassis dynamometer is to be developed in the future. The results of this work can be used to develop a vehicle according to the RDE test conditions, which can contribute to saving the cost and time required in the R&D process.

title: 실록산이 리니어 산소센서에 미치는 영향성 평가
keyword: Diesel (디젤),Gasoline(가솔린),Linear Oxygen Sensor (리니어 산소센서),Siloxane (실록산),Exhaust Gas(배기가스),Poisoning (피독),Pumping Electrode (펌핑전극),TWC (Three Way Catalyst,삼원촉매)
abstract:
To control the air fuel ratio of internal combustion engine system, Linear Oxygen Sensor is mostly used in these days. Controlling lambda of exhaust gas is the very important to reduce the emission control and enhance the fuel efficiency. In a gasoline internal combustion engine, TWC (Three Way Catalyst) is widely used to reduce the emission. TWC is operated in lambda 1.0 condition. So, oxygen sensor is important to control the lambda for using TWC in internal combustion engine. However, poisoning worsen the sensor performance.
  The goal of this paper is to evaluate the effects of the siloxane vapor on the linear oxygen sensor. To achieve the goal, selecting the variables those are main factors to worse the sensor performance. Using these factor, separated variable experiment is carried out.
  The result of this study is that the most dominant factor to worse the sensor performance is the cycle number of measuring the sensor performance. Increasing the number of measuring the sensor performance causes the decreasing the sensor performance.

title: 상용차 트레일러 Yaw Stability 향상을 위한 모델링
keyword: Commercial Vehicle(상용차),Articulated Vehicle(연결식 차량),Modeling(모델링),Yaw Stability(요 안정성),5 wheel model(5축 모델),Vehicle stability(차량 안정성)
abstract: This paper investigates the modeling of commercial articulated vehicle for yaw stability improvement. A tractor-semi-trailer vehicle is a large commercial vehicle consisting of a semi-trailer which carries a load and a tractor which tows semi-trailer, Incase of traffic accidents caused by commercial vehicles are especially dangerous. Because the semi-trailer truck has larger size and mass than the vehicles. Most of major accidents occur because of commercial vehicles yaw roll stability. Through modeling of commercial vehicle to 5 wheel model, model can be used simulation with control algorithm. It is verified that the proposed modeling is effective for improvement of commercial vehicle`s yaw and roll stability. The modeling proposed in this paper is validated by computer simulation software, TruckSim and MATLAB/Simulink.

title: 액티브 캠버제어 시스템 개발
keyword: Active(능동),Geometry(지오메트리),Camber(캠버),Toe(토우),Control(제어),Suspension(현가)
abstract: Camber angle is one of the most important geometries influencing the tire force together with toe, caster and many others. Therefore, it is always demanded to have proper camber angle depending on different driving conditions in order to use maximum tire forces. In this research the effects of camber angle control on rear axle of rear wheel drive high performance vehicle have been investigated. Vehicle with camber control system on rear axle tends to be more understeer and have higher damping on yawrate and sideslip angle when it is controlled.

title: 4WD 차량 모델 기반에서 토크제어 시스템 개발을 위한 가상환경 개발
keyword: 4WD Vehicle(4륜구동차량),Torque Control(토크제어),Transfer Case(트랜스퍼케이스),SILS(Software In the Loop Simulation)
abstract: In various fields for the design verification of hardware and for the effective development of system control algorithm development a system virtual environment and perform product development through SIL (Software-In-the Loop) simulation. This paper presents the development of virtual simulation environment for torque controlled system based on 4WD vehicle model. This virtual simulation environment is integrated on base of the vehicle model (CarSim), the transfer case one (AMESim) and the one of control logic (Matlab/Simulink). The results of this paper show that the development virtual simulation environment is related with the behavior of real torque controlled system of 4WD vehicle.

title: SBW 시스템용 반력 장치 연구
keyword: SBW(스티어 바이 와이어),Reaction force(반력),Fully redundant,Autonomous driving(자율주행),EPS(전동스티어링)
abstract: Vehicle steering technology, which is currently being mass produced, uses a steering column to steer the wheels with the linear motion of the OBJ connected to the carrier using a motor-driven actuator connected to the steering column or rack gearbox. In this method, the driver"s manual torque is directly connected to the vehicle"s wheel based on the reliability of the structural connection of the mechanical device. However, in order to implement the active steering technology in the future, SBW is necessary. With the development of various sensors, the new steering technology of the vehicle has developed into the active steering technology of the vehicle by using the sensor for processing software of the recognition information, and the decision subject of the steering has been moved from the person to the ECU. Therefore, Unnecessary time of driver"s operating has increased and the steering column will be a device that measures the steering angle and provides a reaction to the driver in some situations where driver intervention is required. In the present situation that the driver has to intervene in a certain level of steering prior to the fully autonomous driving, in order to make the driver feel the current level of steering feeling for the products driven by the communication using the wire, not only securing the performance of the actuator, A reaction force column device capable of generating a steering feel of the steering wheel by the driving condition is required. In the case of the reaction force device, the motor torque is varied for each vehicle speed only for the purpose of assisting the driver. At this time, the column torque (Nm) sensed by the driver is measured, and this torque will be the reaction force in SBW. The reaction torque of SBW can be variously designed according to the type of reducer and conditions of use. As a result of the measurement, the system output is generally required to be 5Nm for a simple steering condition and 20Nm or more for a complete non-steerable condition.Therefore, the development direction of the reaction force system that can configure the SBW system and the review contents of the actual design for each new part are described.

title: Topography Optimization 기법을 활용한 브레이크 더스트커버 강건 설계
keyword: Topography Optimization (비드 최적화),Brake Dustcover (브레이크 더스트커버),Axle(액슬),Design Space(설계 유효부),Modal Superposition Method (모달중첩법),Natural Frequency(고유진동수)
abstract: Designers always struggle to find the best point in their trade off relationship of increased durability and weight lightening. Recently, with the growing voice of light weight to improve car fuel efficiency, Optimization is being studied in all automotive parts. Brake dust cover is also not an exception. Despite a thin plate structure of less than 1.0t, there are many requirements for additional thickness reduction or for the application of lightweight materials, structures and shapes. The brake dust cover is of a thin plate structure and is fastened to the axle parts of the vehicle and requires durability against vibration, such as road surface vibration. In this paper, the study of robust design is described by maximizing vibration durability within the required layout, structure and material by using the Topography Optimization technique.

title: 전후륜 양력비에 따른 고속주행 안정성 연구
keyword: Lift(양력),High Speed Stability(고속안정성),CL(양력계수),CLf(전륜양력계수),CLr(후륜양력계수),Yaw Rate (횡 변화율),Slip Angle (슬립앵글)
abstract: The Lift acts in the direction corresponding to the vertical direction during the straight running. There is a difference in the high speed stability of the vehicle depending on the lift coefficient (CL). That is, when CL is higher, the high speed stability is more unstable, and when it is lower, stability is more improved. In this paper, I confirmed the correlation between lift coefficient and high speed stability. Also, the lift coefficient is related to the design of the vehicle. If we set the lift coefficient properly, we will be able to develop the vehicle efficiently considering performance and design.

title: 전륜구동 고성능차 핸들링 성능향상 위한 “N 코너 카빙 디퍼런셜” 독자로직 개발
keyword: Electronic Limited Slip Differential,YawDamping,Mu-estimation,Wheel Slip,Friction Circle
abstract: Electric Limit Slip differential is adopted for Reducing Under Steer when corner exit with acceleration which is important to Front driven high performance vehicle. First, Vehicle Modeling of inner wheel traction changing according to weight transfer at cornering is applied. And control logic by monitoring inner wheel slip amount is added for preparing out of case of the inner wheel traction modelling logic prediction. Second, OS control logic is applied by monitoring yaw rate deviation between vehicle yaw rate and target yaw rate for stabilizing vehicle when OS condition detected. Third, cooperative control strategy with ESC system is applied for decoupling of eLSD/ESC system overlapped control timing. Therefore, Weak point of Under steer when corner exit with acceleration of front driven high performance vehicle is overcome by eLSD system applied

title: R&H 성능 최적화를 위한 다중해 기반 대화형 목표전계 기법 개발
keyword: R&amp,H(승차감 및 핸들링),Optimization(최적화),Target cascading (목표전개),Multiple-solution(다중해),Interactive decision making(대화형 의사결정)
abstract: This paper proposes Multiple-solution based interactive target cascading. Compared with a classical point-based design which is aimed to optimize an objective function subjected to given constraints, the proposed method performs sensitivity analysis for the range of design variables (DV) first. Then multiple solutions are obtained by performing optimization for subdivided target performance index (PI) range. The set of all data such as DV and PI is stored in database so that a designer can choose a best design set using DB query and data visualization which provides the insight of the connection between DV and PI graphically. The proposed multiple-solution based interactive target cascading is implemented to improve the vehicle handling performance, particularly enhancing frequency responses of sine sweep steer and maximize the linearity of lateral acceleration during constant radius cornering. It shows that the proposed approach may be useful not only for the conceptual stage in the early phases of vehicle development but also during the development stage to enhance vehicle performance.

title: 디스크 부식에 의한 DTV 변화에 패드 마모가 미치는 영향 연구
keyword: Rust judder (녹 저더),Corrosion (부식),Friction material (마찰재),Wear particle (마모 분진),DTV (디스크 두께 변화)
abstract: The rust judder due to the disc corrosion have been known as a serious problem on automobile. Among various sources on the rust judder of vehicle, in this paper, the influence of brake pad wear particles was investigated using rig unit and vehicle with different friction materials. Results showed that the amount of wear particles critically affected to the change of DTV and to make a contact trace on the disc surface after corrosion test. In the case of pad material with the largest wear amount, the vibration of brake pedal and steering after corrosion was strongly felt during all braking stop in contrast with wear life enhanced pad material. Furthermore, the wear amount of disc was related with the linear change of DTV by corrosion. This study shows that the occurrence level of rust judder due to friction material can be predicted at the development stage of friction material.

title: 샤시계 체결부 재체결에 의한 볼트축력 산포 영향 연구
keyword: Bolt(볼트),Torque Control(토크 제어),Re-Tightening(재체결),Clamp Force Scatter(축력 산포)
abstract: Torque control is used as automotive chassis parts tightening method. Torque controlled tightening method has axial force scatter of bolt. Axial force scatter should be minimized for robust chassis systems.
